Name: Bố Già
Stars: Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan, Diane Keaton
Description: Don Vito Corleone, head of a mafia family, decides to hand over his empire to his youngest son Michael. However, his decision unintentionally puts the lives of his loved ones in grave danger.

Name: Chuyện Tình Thế Chiến
Stars: Humphrey Bogart, Ingrid Bergman, Paul Henreid, Claude Rains
Description: A cynical expatriate American cafe owner struggles to decide whether or not to help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape the Nazis in French Morocco.

Name: Sinh Viên Tốt Nghiệp
Stars: Dustin Hoffman, Anne Bancroft, Katharine Ross, William Daniels
Description: A disillusioned college graduate finds himself torn between his older lover and her daughter.

Name: Công Dân Kane
Stars: Orson Welles, Joseph Cotten, Dorothy Comingore, Agnes Moorehead
Description: Following the death of publishing tycoon Charles Foster Kane, reporters scramble to uncover the meaning of his final utterance: 'Rosebud.'

Name: 12 Người Đàn Ông Giận Dữ
Stars: Henry Fonda, Lee J. Cobb, Martin Balsam, John Fiedler
Description: The jury in a New York City murder trial is frustrated by a single member whose skeptical caution forces them to more carefully consider the evidence before jumping to a hasty verdict.

Name: Bảy Võ Sĩ Đạo
Stars: Toshirô Mifune, Takashi Shimura, Keiko Tsushima, Yukiko Shimazaki
Description: Farmers from a village exploited by bandits hire a veteran samurai for protection, who gathers six other samurai to join him.

Name: Thưở Ấy Miền Viễn Tây
Stars: Henry Fonda, Charles Bronson, Claudia Cardinale, Jason Robards
Description: A mysterious stranger with a harmonica joins forces with a notorious desperado to protect a beautiful widow from a ruthless assassin working for the railroad.

Name: Phố Tàu
Stars: Jack Nicholson, Faye Dunaway, John Huston, Perry Lopez
Description: A private detective hired to expose an adulterer in 1930s Los Angeles finds himself caught up in a web of deceit, corruption, and murder.

Name: Chuyện Tào Lao
Stars: John Travolta, Uma Thurman, Samuel L. Jackson, Bruce Willis
Description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

Name: Phù Thủy Xứ Oz
Stars: King Vidor, Judy Garland, Frank Morgan, Ray Bolger, Bert Lahr
Description: Young Dorothy Gale and her dog Toto are swept away by a tornado from their Kansas farm to the magical Land of Oz, and embark on a quest with three new friends to see the Wizard, who can return her to her home and fulfill the others' wishes.

Name: Chiến Tranh Giữa Các Vì Sao Tập 5: Đế Chế Phản Công
Stars: Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher, Billy Dee Williams
Description: After the Rebels are overpowered by the Empire, Luke Skywalker begins his Jedi training with Yoda, while his friends are pursued across the galaxy by Darth Vader and bounty hunter Boba Fett.

Name: Double Indemnity
Stars: Fred MacMurray, Barbara Stanwyck, Edward G. Robinson, Byron Barr
Description: A Los Angeles insurance representative lets an alluring housewife seduce him into a scheme of insurance fraud and murder that arouses the suspicion of his colleague, an insurance investigator.

Name: Lawrence Xứ Ả Rập
Stars: David Lean, Peter O'Toole, Alec Guinness, Anthony Quinn, Jack Hawkins
Description: The story of T.E. Lawrence, the English officer who successfully united and led the diverse, often warring, Arab tribes during World War I in order to fight the Turks.

Name: Bản Danh Sách Của Schindler
Stars: Steven Spielberg, Liam Neeson, Ralph Fiennes, Ben Kingsley, Caroline Goodall
Description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

Name: Cuộc Sống Tươi Đẹp
Stars: James Stewart, Donna Reed, Lionel Barrymore, Thomas Mitchell
Description: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.

Name: Cuộc Đời Forrest Gump
Stars: Tom Hanks, Robin Wright, Gary Sinise, Sally Field
Description: The history of the United States from the 1950s to the '70s unfolds from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, who yearns to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

Name: Chúa Tể Của Những Chiếc Nhẫn: Những Người Bạn Của Nhẫn
Stars: Elijah Wood, Ian McKellen, Orlando Bloom, Sean Bean
Description: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

Name: Bắc Tây Bắc
Stars: Cary Grant, Eva Marie Saint, James Mason, Jessie Royce Landis
Description: A New York City advertising executive goes on the run after being mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies, and falls for a woman whose loyalties he begins to doubt.

Name: 8½
Stars: Marcello Mastroianni, Anouk Aimée, Claudia Cardinale, Sandra Milo
Description: A harried movie director retreats into his memories and fantasies.

Name: Chiến Tranh Giữa Các Vì Sao Tập 4: Niềm Hi Vọng Mới
Stars: Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher, Alec Guinness
Description: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader.

Name: Annie Hall
Stars: Woody Allen, Diane Keaton, Tony Roberts, Carol Kane
Description: Alvy Singer, a divorced Jewish comedian, reflects on his relationship with ex-lover Annie Hall, an aspiring nightclub singer, which ended abruptly just like his previous marriages.

Name: Buổi Chiều Xui Xẻo
Stars: Al Pacino, John Cazale, Penelope Allen, Sully Boyar
Description: Three amateur bank robbers plan to hold up a bank. A nice simple robbery: Walk in, take the money, and run. Unfortunately, the supposedly uncomplicated heist suddenly becomes a bizarre nightmare as everything that could go wrong does.

Name: Network
Stars: Faye Dunaway, William Holden, Peter Finch, Robert Duvall
Description: A television network cynically exploits a deranged former anchor's ravings and revelations about the news media for its own profit, but finds that his message may be difficult to control.

Name: Cỗ Máy Tội Phạm
Stars: Malcolm McDowell, Patrick Magee, Michael Bates, Warren Clarke
Description: In the future, a sadistic gang leader is imprisoned and volunteers for a conduct-aversion experiment, but it doesn't go as planned.

Name: Quay Cuồng
Stars: James Stewart, Kim Novak, Barbara Bel Geddes, Tom Helmore
Description: A former San Francisco police detective juggles wrestling with his personal demons and becoming obsessed with the hauntingly beautiful woman he has been hired to trail, who may be deeply disturbed.

Name: 2001: Chuyến Du Hành Không Gian
Stars: Keir Dullea, Gary Lockwood, William Sylvester, Daniel Richter
Description: After uncovering a mysterious artifact buried beneath the Lunar surface, a spacecraft is sent to Jupiter to find its origins: a spacecraft manned by two men and the supercomputer HAL 9000.

Name: Ánh Sáng Đô Thị
Stars: Charles Chaplin, Virginia Cherrill, Florence Lee, Harry Myers
Description: With the aid of a wealthy erratic tippler, a dewy-eyed tramp who has fallen in love with a sightless flower girl accumulates money to be able to help her medically.

Name: Ai Sợ Virginia Woolf?
Stars: Elizabeth Taylor, Richard Burton, George Segal, Sandy Dennis
Description: A bitter, aging couple, with the help of alcohol, use their young houseguests to fuel anguish and emotional pain towards each other over the course of a distressing night.

Name: Bố Già Phần II
Stars: Al Pacino, Robert De Niro, Robert Duvall, Diane Keaton
Description: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

Name: Bò Đực Nổi Điên
Stars: Martin Scorsese, Robert De Niro, Cathy Moriarty, Joe Pesci, Frank Vincent
Description: The life of boxer Jake LaMotta, whose violence and temper that led him to the top in the ring destroyed his life outside of it.

Name: Tâm Thần Hoảng Loạn
Stars: Anthony Perkins, Janet Leigh, Vera Miles, John Gavin
Description: A Phoenix secretary embezzles $40,000 from her employer's client, goes on the run and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.

Name: Chuyến Tàu Mang Tên Dục Vọng
Stars: Vivien Leigh, Marlon Brando, Kim Hunter, Karl Malden
Description: Disturbed Blanche DuBois moves in with her sister in New Orleans and is tormented by her brutish brother-in-law while her reality crumbles around her.

Name: Some Like It Hot
Stars: Marilyn Monroe, Tony Curtis, Jack Lemmon, George Raft
Description: After two male musicians witness a mob hit, they flee the state in an all-female band disguised as women, but further complications set in.

Name: Hát Dưới Mưa
Stars: Gene Kelly, Gene Kelly, Donald O'Connor, Debbie Reynolds, Jean Hagen
Description: A silent film star falls for a chorus girl just as he and his delusionally jealous screen partner are trying to make the difficult transition to talking pictures in 1920s Hollywood.

Name: Kẻ Săn Hươu
Stars: Robert De Niro, Christopher Walken, John Cazale, John Savage
Description: An in-depth examination of the ways in which the Vietnam War impacts and disrupts the lives of several friends in a small steel mill town in Pennsylvania.

Name: Mr. Smith Goes to Washington
Stars: James Stewart, Jean Arthur, Claude Rains, Edward Arnold
Description: A naive youth leader is appointed to fill a vacancy in the U.S. Senate. His idealistic plans promptly collide with corruption at home and subterfuge from his hero in Washington, but he tries to forge ahead despite attacks on his character.

Name: Bringing Up Baby
Stars: Katharine Hepburn, Cary Grant, Charles Ruggles, Walter Catlett
Description: While trying to secure a $1 million donation for his museum, a befuddled paleontologist is pursued by a flighty and often irritating heiress and her pet leopard, Baby.

Name: Cuốn Theo Chiều Gió
Stars: George Cukor, Sam Wood, Clark Gable, Vivien Leigh, Thomas Mitchell, Barbara O'Neil
Description: A sheltered and manipulative Southern belle and a roguish profiteer face off in a turbulent romance as the society around them crumbles with the end of slavery and is rebuilt during the Civil War and Reconstruction periods.

Name: The Philadelphia Story
Stars: Cary Grant, Katharine Hepburn, James Stewart, Ruth Hussey
Description: When a rich woman's ex-husband and a tabloid-type reporter turn up just before her planned remarriage, she begins to learn the truth about herself.

Name: Tay Đấm Huyền Thoại
Stars: Sylvester Stallone, Talia Shire, Burt Young, Carl Weathers
Description: A small-time Philadelphia boxer gets a supremely rare chance to fight the world heavyweight champion in a bout in which he strives to go the distance for his self-respect.

Name: Xe Lửa Tình Yêu
Stars: Buster Keaton, Buster Keaton, Marion Mack, Glen Cavender, Jim Farley
Description: After being rejected by the Confederate military, not realizing it was due to his crucial civilian role, an engineer must single-handedly recapture his beloved locomotive after it is seized by Union spies and return it through enemy lines.

Name: Vua Sư Tử
Stars: Rob Minkoff, Matthew Broderick, Jeremy Irons, James Earl Jones, Whoopi Goldberg
Description: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

Name: Phong Ấn Thứ Bảy
Stars: Max von Sydow, Gunnar Björnstrand, Bengt Ekerot, Nils Poppe
Description: A knight returning to Sweden after the Crusades seeks answers about life, death, and the existence of God as he plays chess against the Grim Reaper during the Black Plague.

Name: Giải Cứu Binh Nhì Ryan
Stars: Tom Hanks, Matt Damon, Tom Sizemore, Edward Burns
Description: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

Name: On the Waterfront
Stars: Marlon Brando, Karl Malden, Lee J. Cobb, Rod Steiger
Description: An ex-prize fighter turned New Jersey longshoreman struggles to stand up to his corrupt union bosses, including his older brother, as he starts to connect with the grieving sister of one of the syndicate's victims.

Name: Thiện, Ác, Tà
Stars: Clint Eastwood, Eli Wallach, Lee Van Cleef, Aldo Giuffrè
Description: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

Name: Vụ Án Mạng Nhà Bên
Stars: James Stewart, Grace Kelly, Wendell Corey, Thelma Ritter
Description: A photographer in a wheelchair spies on his neighbors from his Greenwich Village courtyard apartment window, and becomes convinced one of them has committed murder, despite the skepticism of his fashion-model girlfriend.

Name: Bay Trên Tổ Chim Cúc Cu
Stars: Jack Nicholson, Louise Fletcher, Michael Berryman, Peter Brocco
Description: In the Fall of 1963, a Korean War veteran and criminal pleads insanity and is admitted to a mental institution, where he rallies up the scared patients against the tyrannical nurse.

Name: Giai Điệu Hạnh Phúc
Stars: Julie Andrews, Christopher Plummer, Eleanor Parker, Richard Haydn
Description: A young novice is sent by her convent in 1930s Austria to become a governess to the seven children of a widowed naval officer.

Name: Chim Ưng Malta
Stars: Humphrey Bogart, Mary Astor, Gladys George, Peter Lorre
Description: San Francisco private detective Sam Spade takes on a case that involves him with three eccentric criminals, a gorgeous liar and their quest for a priceless statuette, with the stakes rising after his partner is murdered.

Name: La dolce vita
Stars: Marcello Mastroianni, Anita Ekberg, Anouk Aimée, Yvonne Furneaux
Description: A series of stories following a week in the life of a philandering tabloid journalist living in Rome.

Name: Tiến Sĩ Strangelove
Stars: Peter Sellers, George C. Scott, Sterling Hayden, Keenan Wynn
Description: An insane American general orders a bombing attack on the Soviet Union, triggering a path to nuclear holocaust that a war room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.

Name: Vẻ Đẹp Mỹ
Stars: Kevin Spacey, Annette Bening, Thora Birch, Wes Bentley
Description: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.

Name: Nhà tù Shawshank
Stars: Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman, Bob Gunton, William Sadler
Description: Over the course of several years, two convicts form a friendship, seeking consolation and, eventually, redemption through basic compassion.

Name: Chuyện Xảy Ra Trong Đêm
Stars: Clark Gable, Claudette Colbert, Walter Connolly, Roscoe Karns
Description: A renegade reporter trailing a young runaway heiress for a big story joins her on a bus heading from Florida to New York, and they end up stuck with each other when the bus leaves them behind at one of the stops.

Name: Le fabuleux destin d'Amélie Poulain
Stars: Audrey Tautou, Mathieu Kassovitz, Rufus, Lorella Cravotta
Description: Despite being caught in her imaginative world, Amelie, a young waitress, decides to help people find happiness. Her quest to spread joy leads her on a journey where she finds true love.

Name: Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid
Stars: Paul Newman, Robert Redford, Katharine Ross, Strother Martin
Description: In 1890s Wyoming, Butch Cassidy and The Sundance Kid lead a band of outlaws. When a train robbery goes wrong, they find themselves on the run with a posse hard on their heels. After considering their options, they escape to South America.

Name: Indiana Jones Và Chiếc Rương Thánh Tích
Stars: Harrison Ford, Karen Allen, Paul Freeman, John Rhys-Davies
Description: In 1936, archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before the Nazis can obtain its awesome powers.

Name: Thời Đại Tân Kỳ
Stars: Charles Chaplin, Paulette Goddard, Henry Bergman, Tiny Sandford
Description: The Tramp struggles to live in modern industrial society with the help of a young homeless woman.

Name: The Best Years of Our Lives
Stars: Myrna Loy, Dana Andrews, Fredric March, Teresa Wright
Description: Three World War II veterans, two of them traumatized or disabled, return home to the American midwest to discover that they and their families have been irreparably changed.

Name: Tài Xế Taxi
Stars: Robert De Niro, Jodie Foster, Cybill Shepherd, Albert Brooks
Description: A mentally unstable veteran works as a nighttime taxi driver in New York City, where the perceived decadence and sleaze fuels his urge for violent action.

Name: Cuộc Săn Vàng
Stars: Charles Chaplin, Mack Swain, Tom Murray, Henry Bergman
Description: A prospector goes to the Klondike during the 1890s gold rush in hopes of making his fortune, and is smitten with a girl he sees in a dance hall.

Name: Nhật Ký Của Anne Frank
Stars: Millie Perkins, Shelley Winters, Joseph Schildkraut, Richard Beymer
Description: During World War II, a teenage Jewish girl named Anne Frank and her family are forced into hiding in the Nazi-occupied Netherlands.

Name: Câu Chuyện Đồ Chơi
Stars: Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Don Rickles, Jim Varney
Description: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman action figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's bedroom.

Name: Hàm Cá Mập
Stars: Roy Scheider, Robert Shaw, Richard Dreyfuss, Lorraine Gary
Description: When a killer shark unleashes chaos on a beach community off Cape Cod, it's up to a local sheriff, a marine biologist, and an old seafarer to hunt the beast down.

Name: Chúa Tể Của Những Chiếc Nhẫn: Sự Quay Trở Lại Của Nhà Vua
Stars: Elijah Wood, Viggo Mortensen, Ian McKellen, Orlando Bloom
Description: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

Name: Những Kẻ Cướp Nhà Băng
Stars: Clyde Barrow, Arthur Penn, Warren Beatty, Faye Dunaway, Michael J. Pollard, Gene Hackman
Description: Bored waitress Bonnie Parker falls in love with an ex-con named Clyde Barrow and together they start a violent crime spree through the country, stealing cars and robbing banks.

Name: Giết Con Chim Nhại
Stars: Gregory Peck, John Megna, Frank Overton, Rosemary Murphy
Description: Atticus Finch, a widowed lawyer in Depression-era Alabama, defends a Black man against an undeserved rape charge, and tries to educate his young children against prejudice.

Name: All the President's Men
Stars: Carl Bernstein, Richard Nixon, Alan J. Pakula, Dustin Hoffman, Robert Redford, Jack Warden, Martin Balsam
Description: "The Washington Post" reporters Bob Woodward and Carl Bernstein uncover the details of the Watergate scandal that leads to President Richard Nixon's resignation.

Name: Giai Điệu Kỳ Diệu
Stars: Walt Disney, James Algar, Samuel Armstrong, Ford Beebe Jr., Norman Ferguson, David Hand, Jim Handley, T. Hee, Wilfred Jackson, Hamilton Luske, Bill Roberts, Paul Satterfield, Ben Sharpsteen, Leopold Stokowski, Deems Taylor, The Philadelphia Orchestra, Corey Burton
Description: A series of eight famous pieces of classical music, conducted by Leopold Stokowski and interpreted in animation by Walt Disney's team of artists.

Name: Tội Phạm Nhân Bản
Stars: Harrison Ford, Rutger Hauer, Sean Young, Edward James Olmos
Description: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

Name: Les diaboliques
Stars: Simone Signoret, Véra Clouzot, Paul Meurisse, Charles Vanel
Description: The wife and mistress of a loathed school principal plan to murder him with what they believe is the perfect alibi.

Name: Lã Sinh Môn
Stars: Toshirô Mifune, Machiko Kyô, Masayuki Mori, Takashi Shimura
Description: The rape of a bride and the murder of her samurai husband are recalled from the perspectives of a bandit, the bride, the samurai's ghost and a woodcutter.

Name: Doctor Zhivago
Stars: Omar Sharif, Julie Christie, Geraldine Chaplin, Rod Steiger
Description: The life of a Russian physician and poet who, although married to another, falls in love with a political activist's wife and experiences hardship during World War I and then the October Revolution.

Name: Chiến Hữu
Stars: Martin Scorsese, Robert De Niro, Ray Liotta, Joe Pesci, Lorraine Bracco
Description: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mafia, covering his relationship with his wife Karen and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito.

Name: Nàng Bạch Tuyết và Bảy Chú Lùn
Stars: David Hand, Wilfred Jackson, Larry Morey, Perce Pearce, Ben Sharpsteen, Adriana Caselotti, Harry Stockwell, Lucille La Verne, Roy Atwell
Description: Exiled into the dangerous forest by her wicked stepmother, a princess is rescued by seven dwarf miners who make her part of their household.

Name: Điệp Vụ Boston
Stars: Leonardo DiCaprio, Matt Damon, Jack Nicholson, Mark Wahlberg
Description: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

Name: Le salaire de la peur
Stars: Yves Montand, Charles Vanel, Peter van Eyck, Folco Lulli
Description: In a decrepit South American village, four men are hired to transport an urgent nitroglycerine shipment without the equipment that would make it safe.

Name: The Grapes of Wrath
Stars: Henry Fonda, Jane Darwell, John Carradine, Charley Grapewin
Description: An Oklahoma family, driven off their farm by the poverty and hopelessness of the Dust Bowl, joins the westward migration to California, suffering the misfortunes of the homeless in the Great Depression.

Name: Ông Trùm Mặt Sẹo
Stars: Al Pacino, Michelle Pfeiffer, Steven Bauer, Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio
Description: In 1980 Miami, a determined Cuban immigrant takes over a drug cartel and succumbs to greed.

Name: A Face in the Crowd
Stars: Andy Griffith, Patricia Neal, Anthony Franciosa, Walter Matthau
Description: A female radio reporter turns a folk-singing drifter into a powerful media star.

Name: E.T: Sinh vật Ngoài Hành Tinh
Stars: Henry Thomas, Drew Barrymore, Peter Coyote, Dee Wallace
Description: A troubled child summons the courage to help a friendly alien escape from Earth and return to his home planet.

Name: Cô Dâu Báo Thù 1
Stars: Uma Thurman, David Carradine, Daryl Hannah, Michael Madsen
Description: After awakening from a four-year coma, a former assassin wreaks vengeance on the team of assassins who betrayed her.

Name: From Here to Eternity
Stars: Burt Lancaster, Montgomery Clift, Deborah Kerr, Donna Reed
Description: At a U.S. Army base in 1941 Hawaii, a private is cruelly punished for not boxing on his unit's team, while his commanding officer's wife and top aide begin a tentative affair.

Name: Nữ Hoàng Châu Phi
Stars: Humphrey Bogart, Katharine Hepburn, Robert Morley, Peter Bull
Description: In WWI East Africa, a gin-swilling Canadian riverboat captain is persuaded by a strait-laced English missionary to undertake a trip up a treacherous river and use his boat to attack a German gunship.

Name: Warui yatsu hodo yoku nemuru
Stars: Toshirô Mifune, Masayuki Mori, Kyôko Kagawa, Tatsuya Mihashi
Description: A vengeful young man marries the daughter of a corrupt industrialist in order to seek justice for his father's suicide.

Name: Sunset Blvd.
Stars: William Holden, Gloria Swanson, Erich von Stroheim, Nancy Olson
Description: A screenwriter develops a dangerous relationship with a faded film star determined to make a triumphant return.

Name: Lời Sấm Truyền
Stars: Martin Sheen, Marlon Brando, Robert Duvall, Frederic Forrest
Description: A U.S. Army officer serving in Vietnam is tasked with assassinating a renegade Special Forces Colonel who sees himself as a god.

Name: Chén Thánh Phiêu Lưu Ký
Stars: Terry Jones, Graham Chapman, John Cleese, Eric Idle, Terry Gilliam
Description: King Arthur and his Knights of the Round Table embark on a surreal, low-budget search for the Holy Grail, encountering many, very silly obstacles.

Name: Ben-Hur: Truyền Thuyết Đức Chúa Trời
Stars: Charlton Heston, Jack Hawkins, Stephen Boyd, Haya Harareet
Description: After a Jewish prince is betrayed and sent into slavery by a Roman friend in 1st-century Jerusalem, he regains his freedom and comes back for revenge.

Name: Thị Trấn Rio Bravo
Stars: John Wayne, Dean Martin, Ricky Nelson, Angie Dickinson
Description: A small-town sheriff in the American West enlists the help of a disabled man, a drunk, and a young gunfighter in his efforts to hold in jail the brother of the local bad guy.

Name: Playtime
Stars: Jacques Tati, Barbara Dennek, Rita Maiden, France Rumilly
Description: Monsieur Hulot curiously wanders around a high-tech Paris, paralleling a trip with a group of American tourists. Meanwhile, a nightclub/restaurant prepares its opening night, but it's still under construction.

Name: Hương Mộc Lan
Stars: Tom Cruise, Jason Robards, Julianne Moore, Philip Seymour Hoffman
Description: An epic mosaic of interrelated characters in search of love, forgiveness and meaning in the San Fernando Valley.

Name: L'eclisse
Stars: Monica Vitti, Alain Delon, Francisco Rabal, Lilla Brignone
Description: A young woman meets a vital young man, but their love affair is doomed because of the man's materialistic nature.

Name: Sự Im Lặng Của Bầy Cừu
Stars: Jodie Foster, Anthony Hopkins, Scott Glenn, Anthony Heald
Description: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

Name: Đi Tìm Vận May
Stars: Dustin Hoffman, Jon Voight, Sylvia Miles, John McGiver
Description: A naive hustler travels from Texas to New York City to seek personal fortune, finding a new friend in the process.

Name: Smultronstället
Stars: Victor Sjöström, Bibi Andersson, Ingrid Thulin, Gunnar Björnstrand
Description: After living a life marked by coldness, an aging professor is forced to confront the emptiness of his existence.

Name: L'avventura
Stars: Gabriele Ferzetti, Monica Vitti, Lea Massari, Dominique Blanchar
Description: A woman disappears during a Mediterranean boating trip. During the search, her lover and her best friend become attracted to each other.

Name: Sự Đố Kỵ Của Thiên Tài
Stars: Antonio Salieri, Milos Forman, F. Murray Abraham, Tom Hulce, Elizabeth Berridge, Roy Dotrice
Description: The life, success and troubles of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, as told by Antonio Salieri, the contemporaneous composer who was deeply jealous of Mozart's talent and claimed to have murdered him.

Name: Không Chốn Dung Thân
Stars: Joel Coen, Tommy Lee Jones, Javier Bardem, Josh Brolin, Woody Harrelson
Description: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and more than two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.

Name: Rebel Without a Cause
Stars: James Dean, Natalie Wood, Sal Mineo, Jim Backus
Description: A rebellious young man with a troubled past comes to a new town, finding friends and enemies.

Name: Sàn Đấu Sinh Tử
Stars: Brad Pitt, Edward Norton, Meat Loaf, Zach Grenier
Description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.

Name: Cậu Bé Người Gỗ
Stars: T. Hee, Wilfred Jackson, Jack Kinney, Hamilton Luske, Bill Roberts, Ben Sharpsteen, Dickie Jones, Christian Rub, Mel Blanc, Don Brodie
Description: A living puppet, with the help of a cricket as his conscience, must prove himself worthy to become a real boy.

Name: Thị Trấn Fargo
Stars: Ethan Coen, William H. Macy, Frances McDormand, Steve Buscemi, Peter Stormare
Description: Minnesota car salesman Jerry Lundegaard's inept crime falls apart due to his and his henchmen's bungling and the persistent police work of the quite pregnant Marge Gunderson.

Name: The Sting
Stars: Paul Newman, Robert Redford, Robert Shaw, Charles Durning
Description: Two grifters team up to pull off the ultimate con.

Name: Kẻ Mất Trí Nhớ
Stars: Guy Pearce, Carrie-Anne Moss, Joe Pantoliano, Mark Boone Junior
Description: A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer.

Name: Cầu Sông Kwai
Stars: William Holden, Alec Guinness, Jack Hawkins, Sessue Hayakawa
Description: British POWs are forced to build a railway bridge across the river Kwai for their Japanese captors in occupied Burma, not knowing that the allied forces are planning a daring commando raid through the jungle to destroy it.

Name: Roman Holiday
Stars: Gregory Peck, Audrey Hepburn, Eddie Albert, Hartley Power
Description: A bored and sheltered princess escapes her guardians and falls in love with an American newsman in Rome.

Name: Tootsie
Stars: Dustin Hoffman, Jessica Lange, Teri Garr, Dabney Coleman
Description: Michael Dorsey, an unsuccessful actor, disguises himself as a woman in order to get a role on a trashy hospital soap.

Name: Căn Hộ Tình Yêu
Stars: Jack Lemmon, Shirley MacLaine, Fred MacMurray, Ray Walston
Description: A Manhattan insurance clerk tries to rise in his company by letting its executives use his apartment for trysts, but complications and a romance of his own ensue.

Name: Nhà Độc Tài Vĩ Đại
Stars: Charles Chaplin, Paulette Goddard, Jack Oakie, Reginald Gardiner
Description: Dictator Adenoid Hynkel tries to expand his empire while a poor Jewish barber tries to avoid persecution from Hynkel's regime.

Name: Do the Right Thing
Stars: Danny Aiello, Ossie Davis, Ruby Dee, Richard Edson
Description: On the hottest day of the year on a street in the Bedford-Stuyvesant section of Brooklyn, everyone's hate and bigotry smolders and builds until it explodes into violence.

Name: Bá Tước Lebowski
Stars: Ethan Coen, Jeff Bridges, John Goodman, Julianne Moore, Steve Buscemi
Description: Jeff "The Dude" Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire of the same name, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.

Name: Người Đàn Ông Trong Mưa
Stars: Dustin Hoffman, Tom Cruise, Valeria Golino, Gerald R. Molen
Description: After a selfish L.A. yuppie learns his estranged father left a fortune to an autistic-savant brother in Ohio that he didn't know existed, he absconds with his brother and sets out across the country, hoping to gain a larger inheritance.

Name: Meet John Doe
Stars: Gary Cooper, Barbara Stanwyck, Edward Arnold, Walter Brennan
Description: A penniless drifter (Gary Cooper) is recruited by an ambitious columnist (Barbara Stanwyck) to impersonate a non-existent person who said he'd be committing suicide as a protest, and a social movement begins.

Name: Ngày Chuột Chũi
Stars: Bill Murray, Andie MacDowell, Chris Elliott, Stephen Tobolowsky
Description: A narcissistic, self-centered weatherman finds himself in a time loop on Groundhog Day.

Name: Câu Chuyện Phía Tây
Stars: Robert Wise, Natalie Wood, George Chakiris, Richard Beymer, Russ Tamblyn
Description: Two youngsters from rival New York City gangs fall in love, but tensions between their respective friends build toward tragedy.

Name: Trưa Hè Nóng Bỏng
Stars: Gary Cooper, Grace Kelly, Thomas Mitchell, Lloyd Bridges
Description: A town Marshal, despite the disagreements of his newlywed bride and the townspeople around him, must face a gang of deadly killers alone at "high noon" when the gang leader, an outlaw he "sent up" years ago, arrives on the noon train.

Name: The Shop Around the Corner
Stars: Margaret Sullavan, James Stewart, Frank Morgan, Joseph Schildkraut
Description: Two employees at a gift shop can barely stand each other, without realizing that they are falling in love through the post as each other's anonymous pen pal.

Name: Jules et Jim
Stars: Jeanne Moreau, Oskar Werner, Henri Serre, Vanna Urbino
Description: Decades of a love triangle concerning two friends and an impulsive woman.

Name: La règle du jeu
Stars: Marcel Dalio, Nora Gregor, Paulette Dubost, Mila Parély
Description: A bourgeois life in France at the onset of World War II, as the rich and their poor servants meet up at a French chateau.

Name: Kỵ Sĩ Bóng Đêm
Stars: Christian Bale, Heath Ledger, Aaron Eckhart, Michael Caine
Description: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

Name: Tay Lái Nổi Loạn
Stars: Peter Fonda, Dennis Hopper, Jack Nicholson, Antonio Mendoza
Description: Two bikers head from L.A. to New Orleans through the open country and desert lands, and along the way they meet a man who bridges a counter-culture gap of which they had been unaware.

Name: Out of the Past
Stars: Robert Mitchum, Jane Greer, Kirk Douglas, Rhonda Fleming
Description: A private eye escapes his past to run a gas station in a small town, but his past catches up with him. Now he must return to the big city world of danger, corruption, double crosses, and duplicitous dames.

Name: Kẻ Đánh Cắp Giấc Mơ
Stars: Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Elliot Page, Ken Watanabe
Description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O., but his tragic past may doom the project and his team to disaster.

Name: The Odd Couple
Stars: Jack Lemmon, Walter Matthau, John Fiedler, Herb Edelman
Description: A New Yorker newly separated from his wife moves in with his best friend, a divorced sportswriter, but their ideas of housekeeping and lifestyles are as different as night and day.

Name: Công Viên Kỷ Jura
Stars: Sam Neill, Laura Dern, Jeff Goldblum, Richard Attenborough
Description: A pragmatic paleontologist touring an almost complete theme park on an island in Central America is tasked with protecting a couple of kids after a power failure causes the park's cloned dinosaurs to run loose.

Name: Chúa Tể Của Những Chiếc Nhẫn: Hai Tòa Tháp
Stars: Elijah Wood, Ian McKellen, Viggo Mortensen, Orlando Bloom
Description: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

Name: Swing Time
Stars: Fred Astaire, Ginger Rogers, Victor Moore, Helen Broderick
Description: Roguish gambler/dancer "Lucky" Garnett is challenged by his fiance's father to come up with $25,000 to prove he's worthy of her hand. But after he falls in love with a dance instructor, Lucky'll do anything to keep from earning the bucks.

Name: Một Người Mỹ Ở Paris
Stars: Gene Kelly, Leslie Caron, Oscar Levant, Georges Guétary
Description: Three friends struggle to find work in Paris. Things become more complicated when two of them fall in love with the same woman.

Name: All About Eve
Stars: Bette Davis, Anne Baxter, George Sanders, Celeste Holm
Description: A seemingly timid but secretly ruthless ingénue insinuates herself into the lives of an aging Broadway star and her circle of theater friends.

Name: Nghi Phạm Vô Hình
Stars: Kevin Spacey, Gabriel Byrne, Chazz Palminteri, Stephen Baldwin
Description: The sole survivor of a pier shoot-out tells the story of how a notorious criminal influenced the events that began with five criminals meeting in a seemingly random police lineup.

Name: Tòa Án Chiến Tranh
Stars: Spencer Tracy, Burt Lancaster, Richard Widmark, Marlene Dietrich
Description: In 1948, an American court in occupied Germany tries four Nazis judged for war crimes.

Name: Ngôi Nhà Ma
Stars: Jack Nicholson, Shelley Duvall, Danny Lloyd, Scatman Crothers
Description: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from both past and future.

Name: À bout de souffle
Stars: Jean-Paul Belmondo, Jean Seberg, Van Doude, Jean-Luc Godard
Description: A small-time thief steals a car and impulsively murders a motorcycle policeman. Wanted by the authorities, he reunites with a hip American journalism student and attempts to persuade her to run away with him to Italy.

Name: Chàng Will Tốt Bụng
Stars: Robin Williams, Matt Damon, Ben Affleck, Stellan Skarsgård
Description: Will Hunting, a janitor at M.I.T., has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

Name: Kiểu Tiếp Xúc Thứ 3
Stars: Richard Dreyfuss, François Truffaut, Teri Garr, Melinda Dillon
Description: Roy Neary, an Indiana electric lineman, finds his quiet and ordinary daily life turned upside down after a close encounter with a UFO, spurring him to an obsessed cross-country quest for answers as a momentous event approaches.

Name: Kho Báu Ở Sierra Madre
Stars: Humphrey Bogart, Walter Huston, Tim Holt, Bruce Bennett
Description: Two down-on-their-luck Americans searching for work in 1920s Mexico convince an old prospector to help them mine for gold in the Sierra Madre Mountains.

Name: Trung Đội
Stars: Charlie Sheen, Tom Berenger, Willem Dafoe, Keith David
Description: Chris Taylor, a neophyte recruit in Vietnam, finds himself caught in a battle of wills between two sergeants, one good and the other evil. A shrewd examination of the brutality of war and the duality of man in conflict.

Name: Người Đẹp Và Quái Vật
Stars: Kirk Wise, Paige O'Hara, Robby Benson, Jesse Corti, Rex Everhart
Description: A prince cursed to spend his days as a hideous monster sets out to regain his humanity by earning a young woman's love.

Name: It's a Mad Mad Mad Mad World
Stars: Spencer Tracy, Milton Berle, Ethel Merman, Mickey Rooney
Description: A group of motorists witnesses a car crash in the California desert, and after the driver's dying words indicate the location of a hidden stash of loot, they turn against each in a race across the state to get to it.

Name: Định Mệnh
Stars: Brad Pitt, Diane Kruger, Eli Roth, Mélanie Laurent
Description: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

Name: Cuộc Đào Thoát Vĩ Đại
Stars: Steve McQueen, James Garner, Richard Attenborough, Charles Bronson
Description: Allied prisoners of war plan for several hundred of their number to escape from a German camp during World War II.

Name: Inherit the Wind
Stars: Spencer Tracy, Fredric March, Gene Kelly, Dick York
Description: Based on a real-life case in 1925, two great lawyers argue the case for and against a Tennessee science teacher accused of the crime of teaching evolution.

Name: Duck Soup
Stars: Groucho Marx, Harpo Marx, Chico Marx, Zeppo Marx
Description: Rufus T. Firefly is named the dictator of bankrupt Freedonia and declares war on neighboring Sylvania over the love of his wealthy backer Mrs. Teasdale, contending with two inept spies who can't seem to keep straight which side they're on.

Name: Quiz Show
Stars: Ralph Fiennes, John Turturro, Rob Morrow, Paul Scofield
Description: A young lawyer, Richard Goodwin, investigates a potentially fixed game show. Charles Van Doren, a big time show winner, is under Goodwin's investigation.

Name: Bí Mật Los Angeles
Stars: Kevin Spacey, Russell Crowe, Guy Pearce, Kim Basinger
Description: As corruption grows in 1950s Los Angeles, three policemen - one strait-laced, one brutal, and one sleazy - investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice.

Name: Ngọn Đuốc Của Quỷ
Stars: Charlton Heston, Orson Welles, Janet Leigh, Joseph Calleia
Description: A stark, perverse story of murder, kidnapping and police corruption in a Mexican border town.

Name: Sweet Smell of Success
Stars: Burt Lancaster, Tony Curtis, Susan Harrison, Martin Milner
Description: Powerful but unethical Broadway columnist J.J. Hunsecker coerces unscrupulous press agent Sidney Falco into breaking up his sister's romance with a jazz musician.

Name: Arsenic and Old Lace
Stars: Cary Grant, Priscilla Lane, Raymond Massey, Jack Carson
Description: A Brooklyn writer of books on the futility of marriage risks his reputation after he decides to tie the knot. Things get even more complicated when he learns on his wedding day that his beloved maiden aunts are habitual murderers.

Name: Những Kẻ Phản Bội
Stars: Harvey Keitel, Tim Roth, Michael Madsen, Chris Penn
Description: When a simple jewelry heist goes horribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

Name: Đêm Ăn Chơi
Stars: Mark Wahlberg, Julianne Moore, Burt Reynolds, Luis Guzmán
Description: Back when sex was safe, pleasure was a business and business was booming, an idealistic porn producer aspires to elevate his craft to an art when he discovers a hot young talent.

Name: Tirez sur le pianiste
Stars: Charles Aznavour, Marie Dubois, Nicole Berger, Michèle Mercier
Description: A pianist helps his brother escape from two gangsters, who retaliate by abducting their kid brother.

Name: Chú Tôi
Stars: Jacques Tati, Jean-Pierre Zola, Adrienne Servantie, Lucien Frégis
Description: Monsieur Hulot visits the technology-driven world of his sister, brother-in-law, and nephew, but he can't quite fit into the surroundings.

Name: Cô Dâu Báo Thù 2
Stars: Uma Thurman, David Carradine, Michael Madsen, Daryl Hannah
Description: The Bride continues her quest of vengeance against her former boss and lover Bill, the reclusive bouncer Budd, and the treacherous, one-eyed Elle.

Name: Chuộc Lỗi
Stars: Keira Knightley, James McAvoy, Brenda Blethyn, Saoirse Ronan
Description: Thirteen-year-old fledgling writer Briony Tallis irrevocably changes the course of several lives when she accuses her older sister's lover of a crime he did not commit.

Name: The 39 Steps
Stars: Robert Donat, Madeleine Carroll, Lucie Mannheim, Godfrey Tearle
Description: A man in London tries to help a counter-espionage agent, but when the agent is killed and the man stands accused, he must go on the run to save himself and stop a spy ring that is trying to steal top-secret information.

Name: The Big Sleep
Stars: Humphrey Bogart, Lauren Bacall, John Ridgely, Martha Vickers
Description: Private detective Philip Marlowe is hired by a wealthy family. Before the complex case is over, he's seen murder, blackmail and what might be love.

Name: Shane
Stars: Alan Ladd, Jean Arthur, Van Heflin, Brandon De Wilde
Description: A weary gunfighter in 1880s Wyoming begins to envision a quieter life after befriending a homestead family with a young son who idolizes him, but a smoldering range war forces him to act.

Name: The Longest Day
Stars: Andrew Marton, Gerd Oswald, Bernhard Wicki, Darryl F. Zanuck, John Wayne, Robert Ryan, Richard Burton, Henry Fonda
Description: The events of D-Day, told on a grand scale from both the Allied and German points of view.

Name: Brief Encounter
Stars: Celia Johnson, Trevor Howard, Stanley Holloway, Joyce Carey
Description: Meeting a stranger in a railway station, a woman is tempted to cheat on her husband.

Name: Người Thứ Ba
Stars: Orson Welles, Joseph Cotten, Alida Valli, Trevor Howard
Description: Pulp novelist Holly Martins travels to shadowy, postwar Vienna, only to find himself investigating the mysterious death of an old friend, Harry Lime.

Name: Ngọa Hổ Tàng Long
Stars: Chow Yun-Fat, Michelle Yeoh, Ziyi Zhang, Chang Chen
Description: A young Chinese warrior steals a sword from a famed swordsman and then escapes into a world of romantic adventure with a mysterious man in the frontier of the nation.

Name: Trở Về Tương Lai
Stars: Michael J. Fox, Christopher Lloyd, Lea Thompson, Crispin Glover
Description: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.

Name: Willy Wonka và Nhà Máy Sôcôla
Stars: Gene Wilder, Jack Albertson, Peter Ostrum, Roy Kinnear
Description: A poor but hopeful boy seeks one of the five coveted golden tickets that will send him on a tour of Willy Wonka's mysterious chocolate factory.

Name: Tia Nắng Vĩnh Cửu Của Tâm Hồn Tinh Khiết
Stars: Jim Carrey, Kate Winslet, Tom Wilkinson, Gerry Robert Byrne
Description: When their relationship turns sour, a couple undergoes a medical procedure to have each other erased from their memories for ever.

Name: Le Samouraï
Stars: Alain Delon, François Périer, Nathalie Delon, Cathy Rosier
Description: After professional hitman Jef Costello is seen by witnesses his efforts to provide himself an alibi drive him further into a corner.

Name: Bảy Năm Ngứa Ngáy
Stars: Marilyn Monroe, Tom Ewell, Evelyn Keyes, Sonny Tufts
Description: When his family goes away for the summer, a hitherto faithful husband with an overactive imagination is tempted by a beautiful neighbor.

Name: 3 Kẻ Trốn Tù
Stars: Ethan Coen, George Clooney, John Turturro, Tim Blake Nelson, John Goodman
Description: In the deep south during the 1930s, three escaped convicts search for hidden treasure while a relentless lawman pursues them.

Name: La strada
Stars: Anthony Quinn, Giulietta Masina, Richard Basehart, Aldo Silvani
Description: A care-free girl is sold to a traveling entertainer, consequently enduring physical and emotional pain along the way.

Name: Nora inu
Stars: Toshirô Mifune, Takashi Shimura, Keiko Awaji, Eiko Miyoshi
Description: During a sweltering summer, a rookie homicide detective tries to track down his stolen Colt pistol.

Name: Bữa Sáng Ở Tiffany
Stars: Audrey Hepburn, George Peppard, Patricia Neal, Buddy Ebsen
Description: A young New York socialite becomes interested in a young man who has moved into her apartment building, but her past threatens to get in the way.

Name: Harold and Maude
Stars: Ruth Gordon, Bud Cort, Vivian Pickles, Cyril Cusack
Description: Young, rich, and obsessed with death, Harold finds himself changed forever when he meets lively septuagenarian Maude at a funeral.

Name: Fail Safe
Stars: Henry Fonda, Walter Matthau, Fritz Weaver, Dan O'Herlihy
Description: A technical malfunction sends American planes to Moscow to deliver a nuclear attack. Can all-out war be averted?

Name: This Is Spinal Tap
Stars: Rob Reiner, Michael McKean, Christopher Guest, Kimberly Stringer
Description: Spinal Tap, one of England's loudest bands, is chronicled by film director Marty DiBergi on what proves to be a fateful tour.

Name: A Place in the Sun
Stars: Montgomery Clift, Elizabeth Taylor, Shelley Winters, Anne Revere
Description: A poor boy gets a job working for his rich uncle and ends up falling in love with two women.

Name: Sức Nóng Màn Đêm
Stars: Sidney Poitier, Rod Steiger, Warren Oates, Lee Grant
Description: A black Philadelphia police detective is mistakenly suspected of a local murder while passing through a racially hostile Mississippi town, and after being cleared is reluctantly asked by the police chief to investigate the case.

Name: Kỳ Nghỉ Của Ferris Bueller
Stars: Matthew Broderick, Alan Ruck, Mia Sara, Jeffrey Jones
Description: A popular high school student, admired by his peers, decides to take a day off from school and goes to extreme lengths to pull it off, to the chagrin of his Principal, who'll do anything to stop him.

Name: Ace in the Hole
Stars: Kirk Douglas, Jan Sterling, Robert Arthur, Porter Hall
Description: A frustrated former big-city journalist now stuck working for an Albuquerque newspaper exploits a story about a man trapped in a cave to rekindle his career, but the situation quickly escalates into an out-of-control circus.

Name: Cool Hand Luke
Stars: Paul Newman, George Kennedy, Strother Martin, J.D. Cannon
Description: A laid-back Southern man is sentenced to two years in a rural prison, but refuses to conform.

Name: King Kong
Stars: Naomi Watts, Jack Black, Adrien Brody, Thomas Kretschmann
Description: A greedy film producer assembles a team of moviemakers and sets out for the infamous Skull Island, where they find more than just cannibalistic natives.

Name: The Stranger
Stars: Orson Welles, Edward G. Robinson, Loretta Young, Philip Merivale
Description: An investigator from the War Crimes Commission travels to Connecticut to find an infamous Nazi.

Name: Thử Làm John Malkovich
Stars: Spike Jonze, John Cusack, Cameron Diaz, Catherine Keener, John Malkovich
Description: A puppeteer discovers a portal that leads literally into the head of movie star John Malkovich.

Name: Chuyện Tình Manhattan
Stars: Woody Allen, Diane Keaton, Mariel Hemingway, Michael Murphy
Description: The life of a divorced television writer dating a teenage girl is further complicated when he falls in love with his best friend's mistress.

Name: When Harry Met Sally...
Stars: Billy Crystal, Meg Ryan, Carrie Fisher, Bruno Kirby
Description: Harry and Sally have known each other for years, and are very good friends, but they fear sex would ruin the friendship.

Name: Persona
Stars: Bibi Andersson, Liv Ullmann, Margaretha Krook, Gunnar Björnstrand
Description: A nurse is put in charge of a mute actress and finds that their personae are melding together.

Name: Fury
Stars: Sylvia Sidney, Spencer Tracy, Walter Abel, Bruce Cabot
Description: When a wrongly-accused prisoner barely survives a lynch-mob attack and is presumed dead, he vindictively decides to fake his death and frame the mob for his supposed murder.

Name: Võ Sĩ Giác Đấu
Stars: Russell Crowe, Joaquin Phoenix, Connie Nielsen, Oliver Reed
Description: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

Name: Mr. Lucky
Stars: Cary Grant, Laraine Day, Charles Bickford, Gladys Cooper
Description: A gambler has plans to swindle money from a charity program, but starts to have second thoughts when he falls for a rich society girl.

Name: Kẻ Cắp Xe Đạp
Stars: Lamberto Maggiorani, Enzo Staiola, Lianella Carell, Elena Altieri
Description: In post-war Italy, a working-class man's bicycle is stolen, endangering his efforts to find work. He and his son set out to find it.

Name: The Big Chill
Stars: Tom Berenger, Glenn Close, Jeff Goldblum, William Hurt
Description: A group of seven former college friends gather for a weekend reunion at a South Carolina vacation home after the funeral of another of their college friends.

Name: The Last Picture Show
Stars: Timothy Bottoms, Jeff Bridges, Cybill Shepherd, Ben Johnson
Description: In 1951, a group of high schoolers come of age in a bleak, isolated, atrophied North Texas town that is slowly dying, both culturally and economically.

Name: Những Tay Súng Miền Hoang Dã
Stars: William Holden, Ernest Borgnine, Robert Ryan, Edmond O'Brien
Description: An aging group of outlaws look for one last big score as the "traditional" American West is disappearing around them.

Name: A Star Is Born
Stars: Judy Garland, James Mason, Jack Carson, Charles Bickford
Description: A film star helps a young singer and actress find fame, even as age and alcoholism send his own career on a downward spiral.

Name: Kẻ Lạ Trên Chuyến Tàu
Stars: Farley Granger, Robert Walker, Ruth Roman, Leo G. Carroll
Description: A psychopathic man tries to forcibly persuade a tennis star to agree to his theory that two strangers can get away with murder by submitting to his plan to kill the other's most-hated person.

Name: White Heat
Stars: James Cagney, Virginia Mayo, Edmond O'Brien, Margaret Wycherly
Description: A psychopathic criminal with a mother complex makes a daring break from prison and leads his old gang in a chemical plant payroll heist.

Name: Mary Poppins
Stars: Julie Andrews, Dick Van Dyke, David Tomlinson, Glynis Johns
Description: In turn of the century London, a magical nanny employs music and adventure to help two neglected children become closer to their father.

Name: Sophie's Choice
Stars: Meryl Streep, Kevin Kline, Peter MacNicol, Rita Karin
Description: Sophie is the survivor of Nazi concentration camps, who has found a reason to live with Nathan, a sparkling if unsteady American Jew obsessed with the Holocaust.

Name: King Kong
Stars: Ernest B. Schoedsack, Fay Wray, Robert Armstrong, Bruce Cabot, Frank Reicher
Description: A film crew goes to a tropical island for a location shoot, where they capture a colossal ape who takes a shine to their blonde starlet, and bring him back to New York City.

Name: Cuộc Đính Hôn Lâu Dài
Stars: Audrey Tautou, Gaspard Ulliel, Jodie Foster, Dominique Pinon
Description: Tells the story of a young woman's relentless search for her fiancé, who has disappeared from the trenches of the Somme during World War One.

Name: Nashville
Stars: Keith Carradine, Karen Black, Ronee Blakley, Shelley Duvall
Description: Over the course of a few hectic days, numerous interrelated people prepare for a political convention.

Name: Das Cabinet des Dr. Caligari
Stars: Werner Krauss, Conrad Veidt, Friedrich Feher, Lil Dagover
Description: Hypnotist Dr. Caligari uses a somnambulist, Cesare, to commit murders.

Name: Little Caesar
Stars: Edward G. Robinson, Douglas Fairbanks Jr., Glenda Farrell, William Collier Jr.
Description: A small-time criminal moves to a big city to seek bigger fortune.

Name: Ordinary People
Stars: Donald Sutherland, Mary Tyler Moore, Judd Hirsch, Timothy Hutton
Description: The accidental death of the older son of an affluent family deeply strains the relationships among the bitter mother, the good-natured father and the guilt-ridden younger son.

Name: Đi Tìm Nemo
Stars: Lee Unkrich, Albert Brooks, Ellen DeGeneres, Alexander Gould, Willem Dafoe
Description: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

Name: Ba Ngày Của Chim Ưng
Stars: Robert Redford, Faye Dunaway, Cliff Robertson, Max von Sydow
Description: A bookish CIA researcher in Manhattan finds all his co-workers dead, and must outwit those responsible until he figures out who he can really trust.

Name: The Miracle Worker
Stars: Helen Keller, Arthur Penn, Anne Bancroft, Patty Duke, Victor Jory, Inga Swenson
Description: The story of Anne Sullivan's struggle to teach the blind and deaf Helen Keller how to communicate.

Name: Yểu Điệu Thục Nữ
Stars: Audrey Hepburn, Rex Harrison, Stanley Holloway, Wilfrid Hyde-White
Description: In 1910s London, snobbish phonetics professor Henry Higgins agrees to a wager that he can make crude flower girl, Eliza Doolittle, presentable in high society.

Name: Câu Chuyện Về Notorious
Stars: Cary Grant, Ingrid Bergman, Claude Rains, Louis Calhern
Description: The daughter of a convicted Nazi spy is asked by American agents to gather information on a ring of Nazi scientists in South America. How far will she have to go to ingratiate herself with them?

Name: Băng Đảng New York
Stars: Leonardo DiCaprio, Cameron Diaz, Daniel Day-Lewis, Jim Broadbent
Description: In 1862, Amsterdam Vallon returns to the Five Points area of New York City seeking revenge against Bill the Butcher, his father's killer.

Name: Lãng Mạn và Tội Ác
Stars: Christian Slater, Patricia Arquette, Dennis Hopper, Val Kilmer
Description: In Detroit, a pop culture nerd steals cocaine from his new wife's pimp and tries to sell it in Hollywood, prompting the mobsters who own the drugs to pursue the couple.

Name: Seven Chances
Stars: Buster Keaton, Ruth Dwyer, T. Roy Barnes, Snitz Edwards
Description: A man learns that he will inherit a fortune if he marries by 7PM that evening.

Name: Born Yesterday
Stars: Judy Holliday, William Holden, Broderick Crawford, Howard St. John
Description: A tycoon hires a tutor to teach his lover proper etiquette, with unexpected results.

Name: Cat on a Hot Tin Roof
Stars: Elizabeth Taylor, Paul Newman, Burl Ives, Jack Carson
Description: Brick is an alcoholic ex-football player who drinks his days away and resists the affections of his wife. A reunion with his terminal father jogs a host of memories and revelations for both father and son.

Name: You Can't Take It with You
Stars: Jean Arthur, James Stewart, Lionel Barrymore, Edward Arnold
Description: The son of a snobbish Wall Street banker becomes engaged to a woman from a good-natured but decidedly eccentric family not realizing that his father is trying to force her family from their home for a real estate development.

Name: Being There
Stars: Peter Sellers, Shirley MacLaine, Melvyn Douglas, Jack Warden
Description: After the death of his employer forces him out of the only home he's ever known, a simpleminded, sheltered gardener becomes an unlikely trusted advisor to a powerful tycoon and an insider in Washington politics.

Name: JFK
Stars: Oliver Stone, Kevin Costner, Gary Oldman, Jack Lemmon, Walter Matthau
Description: New Orleans District Attorney Jim Garrison discovers there's more to the Kennedy assassination than the official story.

Name: McCabe & Mrs. Miller
Stars: Warren Beatty, Julie Christie, Rene Auberjonois, William Devane
Description: A gambler and a prostitute become business partners in a remote Old West mining town, and their enterprise thrives until a large corporation arrives on the scene.

Name: The Unbearable Lightness of Being
Stars: Daniel Day-Lewis, Juliette Binoche, Lena Olin, Derek de Lint
Description: Central Europe, 1968: A Czech doctor with an active sex life meets a woman who wants monogamy, and then the Soviet invasion further disrupts their lives.

Name: Ryan's Daughter
Stars: Robert Mitchum, Trevor Howard, John Mills, Christopher Jones
Description: Set in the wake of the 1916 Easter Rising, a married woman in a small Irish village has an affair with a troubled British officer.

Name: Glengarry Glen Ross
Stars: Al Pacino, Jack Lemmon, Alec Baldwin, Alan Arkin
Description: An examination of the machinations behind the scenes at a real estate office.

Name: The Assassination of Jesse James by the Coward Robert Ford
Stars: Brad Pitt, Casey Affleck, Sam Shepard, Mary-Louise Parker
Description: Robert Ford, who has idolized Jesse James since childhood, tries hard to join the resurgent gang of the Missouri outlaw, but gradually becomes resentful of the bandit leader.

Name: Câu Đố
Stars: Cary Grant, Audrey Hepburn, Walter Matthau, James Coburn
Description: Romance and suspense ensue in Paris as a woman is pursued by several men who want a fortune her murdered husband had stolen. Whom can she trust?

Name: Gia Đình Siêu Nhân
Stars: Craig T. Nelson, Samuel L. Jackson, Holly Hunter, Jason Lee
Description: While trying to lead a quiet suburban life, a family of undercover superheroes are forced into action to save the world.

Name: Những Cuộc Phiêu Lưu Của Robin Hood
Stars: William Keighley, Errol Flynn, Olivia de Havilland, Basil Rathbone, Claude Rains
Description: When Prince John and the Norman Lords begin oppressing the Saxon masses in King Richard's absence in 1190s England, a Saxon lord fights back as the outlaw leader of a resistance movement.

Name: Frankenstein Trẻ
Stars: Gene Wilder, Madeline Kahn, Marty Feldman, Peter Boyle
Description: An American grandson of the infamous scientist, struggling to prove that his grandfather was not as insane as people believe, is invited to Transylvania, where he discovers the process that reanimates a dead body.

Name: The Lady Eve
Stars: Barbara Stanwyck, Henry Fonda, Charles Coburn, Eugene Pallette
Description: A trio of classy card sharks targets a socially awkward brewery heir, until one of them falls in love with him.

Name: Barton Fink
Stars: Ethan Coen, John Turturro, John Goodman, Judy Davis, Michael Lerner
Description: A renowned New York playwright is enticed to California to write for the movies and discovers the hellish truth of Hollywood.

Name: Hành Tinh Khỉ
Stars: Charlton Heston, Roddy McDowall, Kim Hunter, Maurice Evans
Description: An astronaut crew crash-lands on a planet where highly intelligent non-human ape species are dominant and humans are enslaved.

Name: Mutiny on the Bounty
Stars: Charles Laughton, Clark Gable, Franchot Tone, Herbert Mundin
Description: First mate Fletcher Christian leads a revolt against his sadistic commander, Captain Bligh, in this classic seafaring adventure, based on the real-life 1789 mutiny.

Name: To Have and Have Not
Stars: Humphrey Bogart, Lauren Bacall, Walter Brennan, Dolores Moran
Description: During World War II, American expatriate Harry Morgan helps transport a French Resistance leader and his beautiful wife to Martinique while romancing a sensuous lounge singer.

Name: Ứng Cử Viên Bị Giật Dây
Stars: Frank Sinatra, Laurence Harvey, Janet Leigh, Angela Lansbury
Description: An American POW in the Korean War is brainwashed as an unwitting assassin for an international Communist conspiracy.

Name: Chuyện Tình Sau Núi
Stars: Jake Gyllenhaal, Heath Ledger, Michelle Williams, Randy Quaid
Description: Ennis and Jack are two shepherds who develop a sexual and emotional relationship. Their relationship becomes complicated when both of them get married to their respective girlfriends.

Name: The Postman Always Rings Twice
Stars: Lana Turner, John Garfield, Cecil Kellaway, Hume Cronyn
Description: A married woman and a drifter fall in love and then plot to murder her husband.

Name: What's Up, Doc?
Stars: Barbra Streisand, Ryan O'Neal, Madeline Kahn, Kenneth Mars
Description: The accidental mix-up of four identical plaid overnight bags leads to a series of increasingly wild and wacky situations.

Name: Body Heat
Stars: William Hurt, Kathleen Turner, Richard Crenna, Ted Danson
Description: A beautiful Florida woman seduces a seedy lawyer, with the hidden agenda of having him kill her rich husband.

Name: Thiên Nga Đen
Stars: Natalie Portman, Mila Kunis, Vincent Cassel, Winona Ryder
Description: Nina is a talented but unstable ballerina on the verge of stardom. Pushed to the breaking point by her artistic director and a seductive rival, Nina's grip on reality slips, plunging her into a waking nightmare.

Name: Đứa Trẻ
Stars: Charles Chaplin, Edna Purviance, Jackie Coogan, Carl Miller
Description: The Tramp cares for an abandoned child, but events put their relationship in jeopardy.

Name: Top Hat
Stars: Fred Astaire, Ginger Rogers, Edward Everett Horton, Erik Rhodes
Description: An American dancer comes to Britain and falls for a model whom he initially annoyed, but she mistakes him for his goofy producer.

Name: The Awful Truth
Stars: Irene Dunne, Cary Grant, Ralph Bellamy, Alexander D'Arcy
Description: A married couple file an amicable divorce, but find it harder to let go of each other than they initially thought.

Name: Laura
Stars: Gene Tierney, Dana Andrews, Clifton Webb, Vincent Price
Description: A police detective falls in love with the woman whose murder he is investigating.

Name: Dị Nhân Benjamin
Stars: Brad Pitt, Cate Blanchett, Tilda Swinton, Julia Ormond
Description: Tells the story of Benjamin Button, a man who starts aging backwards with consequences.

Name: The More the Merrier
Stars: Jean Arthur, Joel McCrea, Charles Coburn, Richard Gaines
Description: During the World War II housing shortage in Washington, two men and a woman share a single apartment and the older man plays Cupid to the other two.

Name: Gà Trống Nuôi Con
Stars: Dustin Hoffman, Meryl Streep, Jane Alexander, Justin Henry
Description: After his wife leaves him, a work-obsessed Manhattan advertising executive is forced to learn long-neglected parenting skills, but a heated custody battle over the couple's young son deepens the wounds left by the separation.

Name: Hành Trình Django
Stars: Jamie Foxx, Christoph Waltz, Leonardo DiCaprio, Kerry Washington
Description: With the help of a German bounty-hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation owner in Mississippi.

Name: The Goodbye Girl
Stars: Richard Dreyfuss, Marsha Mason, Quinn Cummings, Paul Benedict
Description: After being dumped by her live-in boyfriend, an unemployed dancer and her 10-year-old daughter are reluctantly forced to live with a struggling off-Broadway actor.

Name: Tiếng Chuông Lặng Và Cánh Bướm
Stars: Julian Schnabel, Mathieu Amalric, Emmanuelle Seigner, Marie-Josée Croze, Anne Consigny
Description: The true story of Elle editor Jean-Dominique Bauby who suffers a stroke and has to live with an almost totally paralyzed body; only his left eye isn't paralyzed.

Name: Grand Hotel
Stars: Greta Garbo, John Barrymore, Joan Crawford, Wallace Beery
Description: A group of very different individuals staying at a luxurious hotel in Berlin deal with each of their respective dramas.

Name: Bố Già Phần III
Stars: Al Pacino, Diane Keaton, Andy Garcia, Talia Shire
Description: Follows Michael Corleone, now in his 60s, as he seeks to free his family from crime and find a suitable successor to his empire.

Name: Léon: Sát Thủ Chuyên Nghiệp
Stars: Jean Reno, Gary Oldman, Natalie Portman, Danny Aiello
Description: 12-year-old Mathilda is reluctantly taken in by Léon, a professional assassin, after her family is murdered. An unusual relationship forms as she becomes his protégée and learns the assassin's trade.

Name: Đèn Lồng Đỏ Treo Cao
Stars: Gong Li, Jingwu Ma, Saifei He, Cuifen Cao
Description: A young woman becomes the fourth wife of a wealthy lord, and must learn to live with the strict rules and tensions within the household.

Name: Alice Ở Xứ Sở Thần Tiên
Stars: Wilfred Jackson, Hamilton Luske, Jack Kinney, Kathryn Beaumont, Ed Wynn, Richard Haydn, Sterling Holloway
Description: Alice stumbles into the world of Wonderland. Will she get home? Not if the Queen of Hearts has her way.

Name: Thành Phố Của Chúa
Stars: Kátia Lund, Alexandre Rodrigues, Leandro Firmino, Matheus Nachtergaele, Phellipe Haagensen
Description: In the slums of Rio, two kids' paths diverge as one struggles to become a photographer and the other a kingpin.

Name: Summertime
Stars: Katharine Hepburn, Rossano Brazzi, Isa Miranda, Darren McGavin
Description: An American spinster's dream of romance finally becomes a bittersweet reality when she meets a handsome--but married--Italian man while vacationing in Venice.

Name: Chiến Tranh Giữa Các Vì Sao Tập 6: Sự Quay Trở Lại Của Jedi
Stars: Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher, Billy Dee Williams
Description: After rescuing Han Solo from Jabba the Hutt, the Rebels attempt to destroy the second Death Star, while Luke struggles to help Darth Vader back from the dark side.

Name: Phi Công Tỷ Phú
Stars: Martin Scorsese, Leonardo DiCaprio, Cate Blanchett, Kate Beckinsale, John C. Reilly
Description: A biopic depicting the early years of legendary director and aviator Howard Hughes' career from the late 1920s to the mid 1940s.

Name: The Lion in Winter
Stars: Peter O'Toole, Katharine Hepburn, Anthony Hopkins, John Castle
Description: 1183 A.D.: King Henry II's three sons all want to inherit the throne, but he won't commit to a choice. When he allows his imprisoned wife Eleanor of Aquitaine out for a Christmas visit, they all variously plot to force him into a decision.

Name: Rebecca
Stars: Laurence Olivier, Joan Fontaine, George Sanders, Judith Anderson
Description: A self-conscious woman juggles adjusting to her new role as an aristocrat's wife and avoiding being intimidated by his first wife's spectral presence.

Name: A Woman Under the Influence
Stars: Gena Rowlands, Peter Falk, Fred Draper, Lady Rowlands
Description: Although wife and mother Mabel is loved by her husband Nick, her mental illness places a strain on the marriage.

Name: His Girl Friday
Stars: Cary Grant, Rosalind Russell, Ralph Bellamy, Gene Lockhart
Description: A newspaper editor uses every trick in the book to keep his ace reporter ex-wife from remarrying.

Name: On the Beach
Stars: Gregory Peck, Ava Gardner, Fred Astaire, Anthony Perkins
Description: After a global nuclear war, the residents of Australia must come to terms with the fact that all life will be destroyed in a matter of months.

Name: Khát Vọng Tình Yêu
Stars: Leonardo DiCaprio, Kate Winslet, Christopher Fitzgerald, Jonathan Roumie
Description: A young couple living in a Connecticut suburb during the mid-1950s struggle to come to terms with their personal problems while trying to raise their two children.

Name: Kẻ Đầu Mối Pháp 2
Stars: Gene Hackman, Fernando Rey, Bernard Fresson, Philippe Léotard
Description: "Popeye" Doyle travels to Marseille to find Alain Charnier, the drug smuggler who eluded him in New York.

Name: Spartacus
Stars: Anthony Mann, Kirk Douglas, Laurence Olivier, Jean Simmons, Charles Laughton
Description: The slave Spartacus survives brutal training as a gladiator and leads a violent revolt against the decadent Roman Republic, as the ambitious Crassus seeks to gain power by crushing the uprising.

Name: Một Mình Trên Hoang Đảo
Stars: Tom Hanks, Helen Hunt, Paul Sanchez, Lari White
Description: A FedEx executive undergoes a physical and emotional transformation after crash landing on a deserted island.

Name: Sergeant York
Stars: Gary Cooper, Walter Brennan, Joan Leslie, George Tobias
Description: A Tennessee farmer and marksman is drafted in World War I, and struggles with his pacifist inclinations before becoming one of the most celebrated war heroes.

Name: Cuộc Đời Của Serpico
Stars: Sidney Lumet, Al Pacino, John Randolph, Jack Kehoe, Biff McGuire
Description: An honest New York cop named Frank Serpico blows the whistle on rampant corruption in the force only to have his comrades turn against him.

Name: Kẻ Đầu Mối Pháp
Stars: Gene Hackman, Roy Scheider, Fernando Rey, Tony Lo Bianco
Description: A pair of NYPD detectives in the Narcotics Bureau stumble onto a heroin smuggling ring based in Marseilles, but stopping them and capturing their leaders proves an elusive goal.

Name: Nước Mỹ Một Thời
Stars: Robert De Niro, James Woods, Elizabeth McGovern, Treat Williams
Description: A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to the Lower East Side of Manhattan 35 years later, where he must once again confront the ghosts and regrets of his old life.

Name: My Man Godfrey
Stars: William Powell, Carole Lombard, Alice Brady, Gail Patrick
Description: A scatterbrained socialite hires a vagrant as a family butler - but there's more to Godfrey than meets the eye.

Name: M - Eine Stadt sucht einen Mörder
Stars: Peter Lorre, Ellen Widmann, Inge Landgut, Otto Wernicke
Description: When the police in a German city are unable to catch a child-murderer, other criminals join in the manhunt.

Name: Giant
Stars: Elizabeth Taylor, Rock Hudson, James Dean, Carroll Baker
Description: Sprawling epic covering the life of a Texas cattle rancher and his family and associates.

Name: Siêu Ngốc Gặp Nhau
Stars: Bobby Farrelly, Jim Carrey, Jeff Daniels, Lauren Holly, Mike Starr
Description: After a woman leaves a briefcase at the airport terminal, a dumb limo driver and his dumber friend set out on a hilarious cross-country road trip to Aspen to return it.

Name: Aladdin
Stars: John Musker, Scott Weinger, Robin Williams, Linda Larkin, Jonathan Freeman
Description: A kind-hearted street urchin and a power-hungry Grand Vizier vie for a magic lamp that has the power to make their deepest wishes come true.

Name: Cặp Đôi Bất Đắc Dĩ
Stars: Steve Martin, John Candy, Laila Robins, Michael McKean
Description: A Chicago advertising man must struggle to travel home from New York for Thanksgiving, with a lovable oaf of a shower-curtain-ring salesman as his only companion.

Name: Children of a Lesser God
Stars: William Hurt, Marlee Matlin, Piper Laurie, Philip Bosco
Description: A new speech teacher at a school for the deaf falls in love with the janitor, a deaf woman speechless by choice.

Name: 7 Tội Lỗi Chết Người
Stars: Morgan Freeman, Brad Pitt, Kevin Spacey, Andrew Kevin Walker
Description: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

Name: Mean Streets
Stars: Robert De Niro, Harvey Keitel, David Proval, Amy Robinson
Description: A small-time hood tries to keep the peace between his friend Johnny and Johnny's creditors.

Name: Người Đẹp Ngủ Trong Rừng
Stars: Clyde Geronimi, Eric Larson, Wolfgang Reitherman, Hamilton Luske, Mary Costa, Bill Shirley, Eleanor Audley, Verna Felton
Description: After being snubbed by the royal family, a malevolent fairy places a curse on a princess which only a prince can break, along with the help of three good fairies.

Name: Something Wild
Stars: Jeff Daniels, Melanie Griffith, George 'Red' Schwartz, Leib Lensky
Description: A free-spirited woman "kidnaps" a yuppie for a weekend of adventure. But the fun quickly takes a dangerous turn when her ex-convict husband shows up.

Name: East of Eden
Stars: James Dean, Raymond Massey, Julie Harris, Burl Ives
Description: Two brothers in 1910s California struggle to maintain their strict, Bible-toting father's favor as an old secret about their long-absent mother comes to light.

Name: Apollo 13: Bí Ẩn Mặt Trăng
Stars: Tom Hanks, Bill Paxton, Kevin Bacon, Gary Sinise
Description: NASA must devise a strategy to return Apollo 13 to Earth safely after the spacecraft undergoes massive internal damage putting the lives of the three astronauts on board in jeopardy.

Name: Ảo Mộng Thiên Đường
Stars: Naomi Watts, Laura Harring, Justin Theroux, Jeanne Bates
Description: After a car wreck on the winding Mulholland Drive renders a woman amnesiac, she and a perky Hollywood-hopeful search for clues and answers across Los Angeles in a twisting venture beyond dreams and reality.

Name: Dặm Xanh
Stars: Tom Hanks, Michael Clarke Duncan, David Morse, Bonnie Hunt
Description: A tale set on death row in a Southern jail, where gentle giant John possesses the mysterious power to heal people's ailments. When the lead guard, Paul, recognizes John's gift, he tries to help stave off the condemned man's execution.

Name: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance
Stars: James Stewart, John Wayne, Vera Miles, Lee Marvin
Description: A senator returns to a Western town for the funeral of an old friend and tells the story of his origins.

Name: Stagecoach
Stars: John Wayne, Claire Trevor, Andy Devine, John Carradine
Description: A group of people traveling on a stagecoach find their journey complicated by the threat of Geronimo and learn something about each other in the process.

Name: Aguirre, der Zorn Gottes
Stars: Klaus Kinski, Ruy Guerra, Helena Rojo, Del Negro
Description: In the 16th century, the ruthless and insane Don Lope de Aguirre leads a Spanish expedition in search of El Dorado.

Name: 11 Tên Cướp Thế Kỷ
Stars: George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts, Matt Damon
Description: Danny Ocean and his ten accomplices plan to rob three Las Vegas casinos simultaneously.

Name: The Navigator
Stars: Buster Keaton, Buster Keaton, Kathryn McGuire, Frederick Vroom, Clarence Burton
Description: Two spoiled rich people find themselves trapped on an empty passenger ship.

Name: Hãy Bắt Tôi Nếu Có Thể
Stars: Leonardo DiCaprio, Tom Hanks, Christopher Walken, Martin Sheen
Description: Barely 21 yet, Frank is a skilled forger who has passed as a doctor, lawyer and pilot. FBI agent Carl becomes obsessed with tracking down the con man, who only revels in the pursuit.

Name: Không Thể Tha Thứ
Stars: Clint Eastwood, Gene Hackman, Morgan Freeman, Richard Harris
Description: Retired Old West gunslinger William Munny reluctantly takes on one last job, with the help of his old partner Ned Logan and a young man, The "Schofield Kid."

Name: Harvey
Stars: James Stewart, Wallace Ford, William H. Lynn, Victoria Horne
Description: Due to his insistence that he has an invisible six foot-tall rabbit for a best friend, a whimsical middle-aged man is thought by his family to be insane - but he may be wiser than anyone knows.

Name: Kakushi-toride no san-akunin
Stars: Toshirô Mifune, Misa Uehara, Minoru Chiaki, Kamatari Fujiwara
Description: Lured by gold, two greedy peasants unknowingly escort a princess and her general across enemy lines.

Name: Khoảnh Khắc Cuộc Đời
Stars: Ulrich Mühe, Martina Gedeck, Sebastian Koch, Ulrich Tukur
Description: In 1984 East Berlin, an agent of the secret police, conducting surveillance on a writer and his lover, finds himself becoming increasingly absorbed by their lives.

Name: Kỳ Phùng Địch Thủ
Stars: Al Pacino, Robert De Niro, Val Kilmer, Jon Voight
Description: A group of high-end professional thieves start to feel the heat from the LAPD when they unknowingly leave a clue at their latest heist.

Name: Sleeper
Stars: Woody Allen, Diane Keaton, John Beck, Mary Gregory
Description: A nerdish store owner is revived out of cryostasis into a future world to fight an oppressive government.

Name: Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas
Stars: Johnny Depp, Benicio Del Toro, Tobey Maguire, Michael Lee Gogin
Description: An oddball journalist and his psychopathic lawyer travel to Las Vegas for a series of psychedelic escapades.

Name: Anh Chàng Hay Mơ
Stars: Jonathan Pryce, Kim Greist, Robert De Niro, Katherine Helmond
Description: A bureaucrat in a dystopic society becomes an enemy of the state as he pursues the woman of his dreams.

Name: Một Tâm Hồn Đẹp
Stars: Ron Howard, Russell Crowe, Ed Harris, Jennifer Connelly, Christopher Plummer
Description: After John Nash, a brilliant but asocial mathematician, accepts secret work in cryptography, his life takes a turn for the nightmarish.

Name: Foreign Correspondent
Stars: Joel McCrea, Laraine Day, Herbert Marshall, George Sanders
Description: On the eve of World War II, a young American reporter tries to expose enemy agents in London.

Name: Solaris
Stars: Natalya Bondarchuk, Donatas Banionis, Jüri Järvet, Vladislav Dvorzhetskiy
Description: A psychologist is sent to a station orbiting a distant planet in order to discover what has caused the crew to go insane.

Name: Laputa: Lâu Đài Trên Không
Stars: Mayumi Tanaka, Keiko Yokozawa, Kotoe Hatsui, Minori Terada
Description: A young boy and a girl with a magic crystal must race against pirates and foreign agents in a search for a legendary floating castle.

Name: Quản Lý Và Người Tình
Stars: Tom Cruise, Cuba Gooding Jr., Renée Zellweger, Kelly Preston
Description: When a sports agent has a moral epiphany and is fired for expressing it, he decides to put his new philosophy to the test as an independent agent with the only athlete who stays with him and his former colleague.

Name: The Man Who Came to Dinner
Stars: Bette Davis, Ann Sheridan, Monty Woolley, Richard Travis
Description: An acerbic critic wreaks havoc when a hip injury forces him to move in with a Midwestern family.

Name: The Sunshine Boys
Stars: Walter Matthau, George Burns, Richard Benjamin, Lee Meredith
Description: A vaudeville duo agree to reunite for a television special, but it turns out that they can't stand each other.

Name: Trở Thành Người Lớn
Stars: Tom Hanks, Elizabeth Perkins, Robert Loggia, John Heard
Description: After wishing to be made big, a teenage boy wakes the next morning to find himself mysteriously in the body of an adult.

Name: Splendor in the Grass
Stars: Natalie Wood, Warren Beatty, Pat Hingle, Audrey Christie
Description: The love of high school sweethearts Deanie and Bud is weighed down by the oppressive expectations of their parents and society in smalltown Kansas in 1928, threatening the future of their relationship.

Name: Chạy Đi Lola
Stars: Franka Potente, Moritz Bleibtreu, Herbert Knaup, Nina Petri
Description: After a botched money delivery, Lola has 20 minutes to come up with 100,000 Deutschmarks.

Name: Người Tù Khổ Sai
Stars: Steve McQueen, Dustin Hoffman, Victor Jory, Don Gordon
Description: A French convict in the 1930s befriends a fellow criminal as the two of them begin serving their sentence in the South American penal colony on Devil's Island, which inspires the man to plot his escape.

Name: Ngủ Ngon và Chúc May Mắn
