Stars: Joseph McCarthy, George Clooney, David Strathairn, George Clooney, Patricia Clarkson, Jeff Daniels
Description: Broadcast journalist Edward R. Murrow looks to bring down Senator Joseph McCarthy.

Name: Faces
Stars: John Marley, Gena Rowlands, Lynn Carlin, Seymour Cassel
Description: A middle-aged man leaves his wife for another woman. Shortly after, his ex-wife also begins a relationship with a younger partner. The film follows their struggles to find love amongst each other.

Name: Raising Arizona
Stars: Ethan Coen, Nicolas Cage, Holly Hunter, Trey Wilson, John Goodman
Description: When a childless couple--an ex-con and an ex-cop--decide to help themselves to one of another family's quintuplets, their lives become more complicated than they anticipated.

Name: Du rififi chez les hommes
Stars: Jean Servais, Carl Möhner, Robert Manuel, Janine Darcey
Description: Four men plan a technically perfect crime, but the human element intervenes...

Name: Nguyện Cầu Cho Một Giấc Mơ
Stars: Ellen Burstyn, Jared Leto, Jennifer Connelly, Marlon Wayans
Description: The drug-induced utopias of four Coney Island people are shattered when their addictions run deep.

Name: Bronenosets Potemkin
Stars: Aleksandr Antonov, Vladimir Barskiy, Grigoriy Aleksandrov, Ivan Bobrov
Description: In the midst of the Russian Revolution of 1905, the crew of the battleship Potemkin mutiny against the brutal, tyrannical regime of the vessel's officers. The resulting street demonstration in Odessa brings on a police massacre.

Name: Máu Sẽ Phải Đổ
Stars: Daniel Day-Lewis, Paul Dano, Ciarán Hinds, Martin Stringer
Description: A story of family, religion, hatred, oil and madness, focusing on a turn-of-the-century prospector in the early days of the business.

Name: The Ox-Bow Incident
Stars: Henry Fonda, Dana Andrews, Mary Beth Hughes, Anthony Quinn
Description: When a posse captures three men suspected of killing a local farmer, they become strongly divided over whether or not to lynch the men.

Name: A Night at the Opera
Stars: Edmund Goulding, Groucho Marx, Chico Marx, Harpo Marx, Kitty Carlisle
Description: A sly business manager and the wacky friends of two opera singers in Italy help them achieve success in America while humiliating their stuffy and snobbish enemies.

Name: Frankenstein
Stars: Colin Clive, Mae Clarke, Boris Karloff, John Boles
Description: Dr Henry Frankenstein is obsessed with assembling a living being from parts of several exhumed corpses.

Name: The Defiant Ones
Stars: Tony Curtis, Sidney Poitier, Cara Williams, Theodore Bikel
Description: Two chained-together escaped convicts, White and Black, must learn to get along in order to elude capture.

Name: Giù la testa
Stars: Rod Steiger, James Coburn, Romolo Valli, Maria Monti
Description: A low-life bandit and an I.R.A. explosives expert rebel against the government and become heroes of the Mexican Revolution.

Name: The Spirit of St. Louis
Stars: James Stewart, Murray Hamilton, Patricia Smith, Bartlett Robinson
Description: Charles 'Slim' Lindbergh struggles to finance and design an airplane that will make his New York to Paris flight the first solo transatlantic crossing.

Name: Cuộc Gọi Chết Người
Stars: Ray Milland, Grace Kelly, Robert Cummings, John Williams
Description: A former tennis star arranges the murder of his adulterous wife.

Name: Rô-bốt Biết Yêu
Stars: Ben Burtt, Elissa Knight, Jeff Garlin, Fred Willard
Description: In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.

Name: Miller's Crossing
Stars: Ethan Coen, Gabriel Byrne, Albert Finney, John Turturro, Marcia Gay Harden
Description: Tom Reagan, an advisor to a Prohibition-era crime boss, tries to keep the peace between warring mobs but gets caught in divided loyalties.

Name: Midnight Express
Stars: Alan Parker, Brad Davis, Irene Miracle, Bo Hopkins, Paolo Bonacelli
Description: Billy Hayes, an American college student, is caught smuggling drugs out of Turkey and thrown into prison.

Name: Kind Hearts and Coronets
Stars: Dennis Price, Alec Guinness, Valerie Hobson, Joan Greenwood
Description: A distant poor relative of the Duke D'Ascoyne plots to inherit the title by murdering the eight other heirs who stand ahead of him in the line of succession.

Name: Seven Brides for Seven Brothers
Stars: Jane Powell, Howard Keel, Jeff Richards, Russ Tamblyn
Description: In 1850 Oregon, when a backwoodsman brings a wife home to his farm, his six brothers decide that they want to get married too.

Name: Dieu Gi Da Xay Ra Voi Baby Jane?
Stars: Bette Davis, Joan Crawford, Victor Buono, Wesley Addy
Description: A former child star torments her paraplegic sister in their decaying Hollywood mansion.

Name: Quái Vật Không Gian
Stars: Sigourney Weaver, Tom Skerritt, John Hurt, Veronica Cartwright
Description: The crew of a commercial spacecraft encounters a deadly lifeform after investigating an unknown transmission.

Name: Nàng Công Chúa Ở Thung Lũng Gió
Stars: Sumi Shimamoto, Mahito Tsujimura, Hisako Kyôda, Gorô Naya
Description: Warrior and pacifist Princess Nausicaä desperately struggles to prevent two warring nations from destroying themselves and their dying planet.

Name: Young Mr. Lincoln
Stars: Henry Fonda, Alice Brady, Marjorie Weaver, Arleen Whelan
Description: A fictionalized account of the early life of the American president as a young lawyer facing his greatest court case.

Name: On Golden Pond
Stars: Katharine Hepburn, Henry Fonda, Jane Fonda, Doug McKeon
Description: Norman is a curmudgeon with an estranged relationship with his daughter Chelsea. At Golden Pond, he and his wife nevertheless agree to care for Billy, the son of Chelsea's new boyfriend, and a most unexpected relationship blooms.

Name: Sullivan's Travels
Stars: Joel McCrea, Veronica Lake, Robert Warwick, William Demarest
Description: Hollywood director John L. Sullivan sets out to experience life as a homeless person in order to gain relevant life experience for his next movie.

Name: Thời Kỳ Đại Suy Thoái
Stars: Joan Crawford, Jack Carson, Zachary Scott, Eve Arden
Description: A hard-working mother inches towards disaster as she divorces her husband and starts a successful restaurant business to support her spoiled daughter.

Name: Marathon Man
Stars: Dustin Hoffman, Laurence Olivier, Roy Scheider, William Devane
Description: After the shocking murder of his older brother, a New York history student finds himself inexplicably hounded by shadowy government agents on the trail of a Nazi war criminal who is trying to retrieve smuggled diamonds.

Name: Mặt Trận Phía Tây Vẫn Yên Tĩnh
Stars: Lew Ayres, Louis Wolheim, John Wray, Arnold Lucy
Description: A German youth eagerly enters World War I, but his enthusiasm wanes as he gets a firsthand view of the horror.

Name: My Favorite Wife
Stars: Irene Dunne, Cary Grant, Randolph Scott, Gail Patrick
Description: Missing for seven years and presumed dead, a woman returns home on the day of her husband's second marriage.

Name: Gần Như Nổi Tiếng
Stars: Billy Crudup, Patrick Fugit, Kate Hudson, Frances McDormand
Description: A high-school boy in the early 1970s is given the chance to write a story for Rolling Stone magazine about an up-and-coming rock band as he accompanies them on their concert tour.

Name: Fitzcarraldo
Stars: Klaus Kinski, Claudia Cardinale, José Lewgoy, Miguel Ángel Fuentes
Description: The story of Brian Sweeney Fitzgerald, an extremely determined man who intends to build an opera house in the middle of a jungle.

Name: Yôjinbô
Stars: Toshirô Mifune, Eijirô Tôno, Tatsuya Nakadai, Yôko Tsukasa
Description: A crafty ronin comes to a town divided by two criminal gangs and decides to play them against each other to free the town.

Name: Malcolm X
Stars: Denzel Washington, Angela Bassett, Delroy Lindo, Spike Lee
Description: Biographical epic of the controversial and influential Black Nationalist leader, from his early life and career as a small-time gangster, to his ministry as a member of the Nation of Islam and his eventual assassination.

Name: Shadow of a Doubt
Stars: Teresa Wright, Joseph Cotten, Macdonald Carey, Henry Travers
Description: A teenage girl, overjoyed when her favorite uncle comes to visit the family in their quiet California town, slowly begins to suspect that he is in fact the "Merry Widow" killer sought by the authorities.

Name: Guess Who's Coming to Dinner
Stars: Spencer Tracy, Sidney Poitier, Katharine Hepburn, Katharine Houghton
Description: A couple's attitudes are challenged when their daughter introduces them to her African-American fiancé.

Name: Mặt Sẹo
Stars: Richard Rosson, Paul Muni, Ann Dvorak, Karen Morley, Osgood Perkins
Description: An ambitious and nearly insane violent gangster climbs the ladder of success in the mob, but his weaknesses prove to be his downfall.

Name: Chú Nai Bambi
Stars: Samuel Armstrong, David Hand, Graham Heid, Bill Roberts, Paul Satterfield, Norman Wright, Arthur Davis, Clyde Geronimi, Hardie Albright, Stan Alexander, Bobette Audrey, Peter Behn
Description: The story of a young deer growing up in the forest.

Name: Mười Điều Răn Của Chúa
Stars: Charlton Heston, Yul Brynner, Anne Baxter, Edward G. Robinson
Description: Moses, raised as a prince of Egypt in the Pharaoh's household, learns of his true heritage as a Hebrew and his divine mission as the deliverer of his people from slavery.

Name: Nửa Đêm Ở Paris
Stars: Owen Wilson, Rachel McAdams, Kathy Bates, Kurt Fuller
Description: While on a trip to Paris with his fiancée's family, a nostalgic screenwriter finds himself mysteriously going back to the 1920s every day at midnight.

Name: Chú Chuột Đầu Bếp
Stars: Jan Pinkava, Brad Garrett, Lou Romano, Patton Oswalt, Ian Holm
Description: A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous Paris restaurant.

Name: The Birth of a Nation
Stars: Lillian Gish, Mae Marsh, Henry B. Walthall, Miriam Cooper
Description: The Stoneman family finds its friendship with the Camerons affected by the Civil War, both fighting in opposite armies. The development of the war in their lives plays through to Lincoln's assassination and the birth of the Ku Klux Klan.

Name: The Birdcage
Stars: Robin Williams, Nathan Lane, Gene Hackman, Dianne Wiest
Description: A gay cabaret owner and his drag queen companion agree to put up a false straight front so that their son can introduce them to his fiancée's right-wing moralistic parents.

Name: Giết Người Yêu Dấu
Stars: Daniel Radcliffe, Dane DeHaan, Michael C. Hall, Ben Foster
Description: A murder in 1944 draws together the great poets of the beat generation: Allen Ginsberg, Jack Kerouac, and William Burroughs.

Name: Our Hospitality
Stars: Buster Keaton, Buster Keaton, Natalie Talmadge, Joe Keaton, Joe Roberts
Description: A man returns to his Appalachian homestead. On the trip, he falls for a young woman. The only problem is her family has vowed to kill every member of his family.

Name: Der letzte Mann
Stars: Emil Jannings, Maly Delschaft, Max Hiller, Emilie Kurz
Description: An aging doorman is forced to face the scorn of his friends, neighbors and society after being fired from his prestigious job at a luxurious hotel.

Name: Only Angels Have Wings
Stars: Cary Grant, Jean Arthur, Rita Hayworth, Richard Barthelmess
Description: At a remote South American trading port, the manager of an air-freight company is forced to risk his pilots' lives in order to win an important contract as a traveling American showgirl stops in town.

Name: Sex, Lies, and Videotape
Stars: James Spader, Andie MacDowell, Peter Gallagher, Laura San Giacomo
Description: A sexually repressed woman's husband is having an affair with her sister. The arrival of a visitor with a rather unusual fetish changes everything.

Name: Great Expectations
Stars: John Mills, Valerie Hobson, Tony Wager, Jean Simmons
Description: A humble orphan boy in 1810s Kent is given the opportunity to go to London and become a gentleman, with the help of an unknown benefactor.

Name: The Right Stuff
Stars: Sam Shepard, Scott Glenn, Ed Harris, Dennis Quaid
Description: The U.S. space program's development from the breaking of the sound barrier to selection of the Mercury 7 astronauts, from a group of test pilots with a more seat-of-the-pants approach than the program's more cautious engineers preferred.

Name: The Hustler
Stars: Paul Newman, Jackie Gleason, Piper Laurie, George C. Scott
Description: An up-and-coming pool player plays a long-time champion in a single high-stakes match.

Name: The Verdict
Stars: Paul Newman, Charlotte Rampling, Jack Warden, James Mason
Description: An outcast, alcoholic Boston lawyer sees the chance to salvage his career and self-respect by taking a medical malpractice case to trial rather than settling.

Name: Đương Đầu Với Thử Thách
Stars: Bruce Willis, Alan Rickman, Bonnie Bedelia, Reginald VelJohnson
Description: A New York City police officer tries to save his estranged wife and several others taken hostage by terrorists during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.

Name: Cái Chết Được Báo Trước
Stars: Philip Seymour Hoffman, Ethan Hawke, Albert Finney, Marisa Tomei
Description: When two brothers organize the robbery of their parents' jewelry store the job goes horribly wrong, triggering a series of events that sends them, their father and one brother's wife barreling towards a shattering climax.

Name: L'Atalante
Stars: Dita Parlo, Jean Dasté, Gilles Margaritis, Louis Lefebvre
Description: Newly married couple Juliette and a ship captain Jean struggle through marriage as they travel on the L'atalante along with the captain's first mate Le père Jules and a cabin boy.

Name: Chỉ Đến Thế Mà Thôi
Stars: Jack Nicholson, Helen Hunt, Greg Kinnear, Cuba Gooding Jr.
Description: A single mother and waitress, a misanthropic author, and a gay artist form an unlikely friendship after the artist is assaulted in a robbery.

Name: Dòng Sông Kì Bí
Stars: Sean Penn, Tim Robbins, Kevin Bacon, Emmy Rossum

Name: Lễ Tình Nhân Buồn
Stars: Ryan Gosling, Michelle Williams, John Doman, Faith Wladyka

Name: Oliver Twist
Stars: David Lean, Robert Newton, Alec Guinness, Kay Walsh, Francis L. Sullivan
Description: In Charles Dickens' classic tale, an orphan wends his way from cruel apprenticeship to den of thieves in search of a true home.

Name: Ship of Fools
Stars: Vivien Leigh, Simone Signoret, José Ferrer, Lee Marvin
Description: A varied group of passengers boarding a ship bound for pre-WWII Germany represents a microcosm of early 1930s society.

Name: Gilda
Stars: Rita Hayworth, Glenn Ford, George Macready, Joseph Calleia
Description: A small-time gambler hired to work in a Buenos Aires casino discovers his employer's new wife is his former lover.

Name: The Jerk
Stars: Steve Martin, Bernadette Peters, Catlin Adams, Mabel King
Description: A simpleminded, sheltered country boy suddenly decides to leave his family home to experience life in the big city, where his naivete is both his best friend and his worst enemy.

Name: Meet Me in St. Louis
Stars: Judy Garland, Margaret O'Brien, Mary Astor, Lucille Bremer
Description: Young love and childish fears highlight a year in the life of a turn-of-the-century family.

Name: Cá Mập Đốm Huyền Thoại
Stars: Bill Murray, Owen Wilson, Anjelica Huston, Cate Blanchett
Description: With a plan to exact revenge on a mythical shark that killed his partner, Oceanographer Steve Zissou (Bill Murray) rallies a crew that includes his estranged wife, a journalist, and a man who may or may not be his son.

Name: Tình thân
Stars: George Clooney, Shailene Woodley, Amara Miller, Nick Krause
Description: A land baron tries to reconnect with his two daughters after his wife is seriously injured in a boating accident.

Name: Oldboy: Báo Thù
Stars: Choi Min-sik, Yoo Ji-tae, Kang Hye-jeong, Kim Byeong-Ok
Description: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for fifteen years, Oh Dae-Su is released, only to find that he must find his captor in five days.

Name: Everything You Always Wanted to Know About Sex * But Were Afraid to Ask
Stars: Woody Allen, Gene Wilder, Louise Lasser, John Carradine
Description: Seven stories are trying to answer the question: what is sex? Or maybe they are not trying.

Name: Mê Cung Của Pan
Stars: Ivana Baquero, Ariadna Gil, Sergi López, Maribel Verdú
Description: In the Falangist Spain of 1944, the bookish young stepdaughter of a sadistic army officer escapes into an eerie but captivating fantasy world.

Name: Born to Kill
Stars: Claire Trevor, Lawrence Tierney, Walter Slezak, Phillip Terry
Description: A calculating divorcée risks her chances at wealth and security with a man she doesn't love by getting involved with the hotheaded murderer romancing her foster sister.

Name: M*A*S*H
Stars: Donald Sutherland, Elliott Gould, Tom Skerritt, Sally Kellerman
Description: The staff of a Korean War field hospital use humor and high jinks to keep their sanity in the face of the horror of war.

Name: Triệu Phú Ổ Chuột
Stars: Loveleen Tandan, Dev Patel, Freida Pinto, Saurabh Shukla, Anil Kapoor
Description: A Mumbai teenager reflects on his life after being accused of cheating on the Indian version of "Who Wants to be a Millionaire?"

Name: Natural Born Killers
Stars: Woody Harrelson, Juliette Lewis, Tom Sizemore, Rodney Dangerfield
Description: Two victims of traumatized childhoods become lovers and psychopathic serial murderers irresponsibly glorified by the mass media.

Name: 12 Con Khỉ
Stars: Bruce Willis, Madeleine Stowe, Brad Pitt, Joseph Melito
Description: In a future world devastated by disease, a convict is sent back in time to gather information about the man-made virus that wiped out most of the human population on the planet.

Name: Les vacances de Monsieur Hulot
Stars: Jacques Tati, Nathalie Pascaud, Micheline Rolla, Valentine Camax
Description: Monsieur Hulot comes to a beachside hotel for a vacation and accidentally, but good-naturedly, causes havoc.

Name: Thám Tử Thú Cưng
Stars: Jim Carrey, Courteney Cox, Sean Young, Tone Loc
Description: A goofy detective specializing in animals goes in search of the missing mascot of the Miami Dolphins.

Name: Hamlet
Stars: Kenneth Branagh, Julie Christie, Derek Jacobi, Kate Winslet
Description: Hamlet, Prince of Denmark, returns home to find his father murdered and his mother remarrying the murderer, his uncle. Meanwhile, war is brewing.

Name: Lincoln
Stars: Daniel Day-Lewis, Sally Field, David Strathairn, Joseph Gordon-Levitt
Description: As the American Civil War continues to rage, America's president struggles with continuing carnage on the battlefield as he fights with many inside his own cabinet on the decision to emancipate the slaves.

Name: Animal Crackers
Stars: Groucho Marx, Harpo Marx, Chico Marx, The Marx Brothers
Description: Mayhem and zaniness ensue when a valuable painting goes missing during a party in honor of famed African explorer Captain Spaulding.

Name: Titanic
Stars: Leonardo DiCaprio, Kate Winslet, Billy Zane, Kathy Bates
Description: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

Name: Sherlock Jr.
Stars: Buster Keaton, Kathryn McGuire, Joe Keaton, Erwin Connelly

Name: The Night of the Iguana
Stars: Richard Burton, Ava Gardner, Deborah Kerr, Sue Lyon
Description: An ostracized Episcopal clergyman leads a busload of middle-aged Baptist women on a tour of the Mexican coast and comes to terms with the failure haunting his life.

Name: Hội Điểm Tâm
Stars: Emilio Estevez, Judd Nelson, Molly Ringwald, Ally Sheedy
Description: Five high school students meet in Saturday detention and discover how they have a great deal more in common than they thought.

Name: Trái Tim Dũng Cảm
Stars: Mel Gibson, Sophie Marceau, Patrick McGoohan, Angus Macfadyen

Name: Phát Súng Trong Đêm
Stars: Peter Sellers, Elke Sommer, George Sanders, Herbert Lom
Description: A clumsy, inept detective is hired to investigate the murder of a chauffeur at a country home.

Name: The Lady Vanishes
Stars: Margaret Lockwood, Michael Redgrave, Paul Lukas, May Whitty
Description: While travelling in continental Europe, a rich young playgirl realizes that an elderly lady seems to have disappeared from the train.

Name: The Player
Stars: Tim Robbins, Greta Scacchi, Fred Ward, Whoopi Goldberg
Description: A Hollywood studio executive is being sent death threats by a writer whose script he rejected, but which one?

Name: Đêm Mở Màn
Stars: Gena Rowlands, John Cassavetes, Ben Gazzara, Joan Blondell
Description: A renowned actress teeters on the edge of a breakdown as she counts down the days toward a big Broadway opening.

Name: Xích Lại Gần Nhau
Stars: Natalie Portman, Jude Law, Clive Owen, Julia Roberts
Description: The relationships of two couples become complicated and deceitful when the man from one couple meets the woman of the other.

Name: Vân Đồ
Stars: Lana Wachowski, Lilly Wachowski, Tom Hanks, Halle Berry, Hugh Grant, Hugo Weaving
Description: An exploration of how the actions of individual lives impact one another in the past, present and future, as one soul is shaped from a killer into a hero, and an act of kindness ripples across centuries to inspire a revolution.

Name: Adaptation.
Stars: Spike Jonze, Nicolas Cage, Meryl Streep, Chris Cooper, Tilda Swinton
Description: A lovelorn screenwriter becomes desperate as he tries and fails to adapt 'The Orchid Thief' by Susan Orlean for the screen.

Name: Bananas
Stars: Woody Allen, Louise Lasser, Carlos Montalbán, Nati Abascal
Description: When a bumbling New Yorker is dumped by his activist girlfriend, he travels to a tiny Latin American nation and becomes involved in its latest rebellion.

Name: Baby Doll
Stars: Karl Malden, Carroll Baker, Eli Wallach, Mildred Dunnock
Description: An immature child bride holds her anxious husband at bay while flirting with an amorous Sicilian farmer.

Name: Chiến Dịch Sinh Tử
Stars: Ben Affleck, Bryan Cranston, John Goodman, Alan Arkin

Name: Cabaret

Name: Con Đường Diệt Vong
Stars: Tom Hanks, Tyler Hoechlin, Rob Maxey, Liam Aiken
Description: A mob enforcer's son in 1930s Illinois witnesses a murder, forcing him and his father to take to the road, and his father down a path of redemption and revenge.

Name: The Purple Rose of Cairo
Stars: Mia Farrow, Jeff Daniels, Danny Aiello, Irving Metzman
Description: In 1935 New Jersey, a movie character walks off the screen and into the real world.

Name: Cậu Bé Rừng Xanh
Stars: Phil Harris, Sebastian Cabot, Louis Prima, Bruce Reitherman

Name: Đảo Kinh Hoàng
Stars: Leonardo DiCaprio, Emily Mortimer, Mark Ruffalo, Ben Kingsley

Name: Gentlemen Prefer Blondes

Name: Nghệ Sĩ
Stars: Jean Dujardin, Bérénice Bejo, John Goodman, James Cromwell
Description: An egomaniacal film star develops a relationship with a young dancer against the backdrop of Hollywood's silent era.

Name: Cuộc Truy Lùng
Stars: John Wayne, Jeffrey Hunter, Vera Miles, Ward Bond

Name: 400 Cú Đấm
Stars: Jean-Pierre Léaud, Albert Rémy, Claire Maurier, Guy Decomble
Description: A young boy, left without attention, delves into a life of petty crime.

Name: Tháp Babel
Stars: Brad Pitt, Cate Blanchett, Gael García Bernal, Mohamed Akhzam
Description: Tragedy strikes a married couple on vacation in the Moroccan desert, touching off an interlocking story involving four different families.

Name: Phóng Viên Reed

Name: Bay Lên Trời Cao

Name: Siêu Điệp Viên 1: Danh Tính Của Bourne
Stars: Franka Potente, Matt Damon, Chris Cooper, Clive Owen
Description: A man is picked up by a fishing boat, bullet-riddled and suffering from amnesia, before racing to elude assassins and attempting to regain his memory.

Name: American Graffiti
Stars: Richard Dreyfuss, Ron Howard, Paul Le Mat, Charles Martin Smith

Name: The Conversation
Stars: Gene Hackman, John Cazale, Allen Garfield, Frederic Forrest
Description: A paranoid, secretive surveillance expert has a crisis of conscience when he suspects that the couple he is spying on will be murdered.

Name: Bobby

Name: The Iceman Cometh
Stars: Lee Marvin, Fredric March, Robert Ryan, Jeff Bridges

Name: Kỵ Sĩ Bóng Đêm Trỗi Dậy
Stars: Christian Bale, Tom Hardy, Anne Hathaway, Gary Oldman

Name: Mr. Arkadin

Description: An elusive billionaire hires an American smuggler to investigate his past, leading to a dizzying descent into a cold-war European landscape.

Name: 127 Giờ Sinh Tử
Stars: James Franco, Amber Tamblyn, Kate Mara, Sean Bott
Description: A mountain climber becomes trapped under a boulder while canyoneering alone near Moab, Utah and resorts to desperate measures in order to survive.

Name: Phố Wall
Stars: Charlie Sheen, Michael Douglas, Tamara Tunie, Franklin Cover

Name: Million Dollar Baby

Name: Thêm Vài Đồng Xu Lẻ
Stars: Clint Eastwood, Lee Van Cleef, Gian Maria Volontè, Mara Krupp
Description: Two bounty hunters with the same intentions team up to track down an escaped Mexican outlaw.

Name: Alfie
Stars: Michael Caine, Shelley Winters, Millicent Martin, Julia Foster
Description: An unrepentant ladies' man gradually begins to understand the consequences of his lifestyle.

Name: Kiss Me, Stupid
Stars: Dean Martin, Kim Novak, Ray Walston, Felicia Farr
Description: Jealous piano teacher Orville Spooner sends his beautiful wife, Zelda, away for the night while he tries to sell a song to famous nightclub singer Dino, who is stranded in town.

Name: Đơn Giản Là Máu
Stars: Ethan Coen, John Getz, Frances McDormand, Dan Hedaya, M. Emmet Walsh
Description: The owner of a seedy small-town Texas bar discovers that one of his employees is having an affair with his wife. A chaotic chain of misunderstandings, lies, and mischief ensues after he devises a plot to have them murdered.

Name: Ảo Thuật Gia Đấu Trí
Stars: Christian Bale, Hugh Jackman, Scarlett Johansson, Michael Caine
Description: After a tragic accident, two stage magicians in 1890s London engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion while sacrificing everything they have to outwit each other.

Name: 9 Tuần Rưỡi
Stars: Mickey Rourke, Kim Basinger, Margaret Whitton, David Margulies
Description: A woman becomes involved with a man she barely knows. Complications develop during their sexual escapades.

Name: Ba Sắc Màu: Trắng
Stars: Zbigniew Zamachowski, Julie Delpy, Janusz Gajos, Jerzy Stuhr
Description: After his wife divorces him, a Polish immigrant plots to get even with her.

Name: The Lavender Hill Mob
Stars: Alec Guinness, Stanley Holloway, Sidney James, Alfie Bass
Description: A meek bank clerk who oversees the shipment of bullion joins with an eccentric neighbor to steal gold bars and smuggle them out of the country as miniature Eiffel Towers.

Name: Một Nắm Đô La
Stars: Clint Eastwood, Gian Maria Volontè, Marianne Koch, Wolfgang Lukschy
Description: A wandering gunfighter plays two rival families against each other in a town torn apart by greed, pride, and revenge.

Name: Trafic
Stars: Jacques Tati, Marcel Fraval, Honoré Bostel, François Maisongrosse
Description: Mr. Hulot drives a recreational vehicle from Paris to Amsterdam in his usual comical, disastrous style.

Name: Cây Đời
Stars: Brad Pitt, Sean Penn, Jessica Chastain, Hunter McCracken
Description: The story of a family in Waco, Texas in 1956. The eldest son witnesses the loss of innocence and struggles with his parents' conflicting teachings.

Name: Cape Fear
Stars: Gregory Peck, Robert Mitchum, Polly Bergen, Lori Martin
Description: A lawyer's family is stalked by a man he once helped put in jail.

Name: Nhung Xanh
Stars: Isabella Rossellini, Kyle MacLachlan, Dennis Hopper, Laura Dern
Description: The discovery of a severed human ear found in a field leads a young man on an investigation related to a beautiful, mysterious nightclub singer and a group of psychopathic criminals who have kidnapped her child.

Name: Mrs. Miniver
Stars: Greer Garson, Walter Pidgeon, Teresa Wright, May Whitty
Description: A British family struggles to survive the first months of World War II.

Name: The Strange Love of Martha Ivers
Stars: Barbara Stanwyck, Van Heflin, Lizabeth Scott, Kirk Douglas
Description: A man is reunited with his childhood friend and her husband, who believe he knows the truth about the death of her rich aunt years earlier.

Name: The Birds
Stars: Rod Taylor, Tippi Hedren, Jessica Tandy, Suzanne Pleshette
Description: A wealthy San Francisco socialite pursues a potential boyfriend to a small Northern California town that slowly takes a turn for the bizarre when birds of all kinds suddenly begin to attack people.

Name: The Lost Weekend
Stars: Ray Milland, Jane Wyman, Phillip Terry, Howard Da Silva

Name: Ai Mưu Hại Thỏ Roger?
Stars: Bob Hoskins, Christopher Lloyd, Joanna Cassidy, Charles Fleischer
Description: A toon-hating detective is a cartoon rabbit's only hope to prove his innocence when he is accused of murder.

Name: Bữa Tối Của Andre
Stars: Andre Gregory, Wallace Shawn, Jean Lenauer, Roy Butler
Description: Two old friends meet for dinner; as one tells anecdotes detailing his experiences, the other notices their differing worldviews.

Name: Mạng Xã Hội
Stars: David Fincher, Jesse Eisenberg, Andrew Garfield, Justin Timberlake, Rooney Mara
Description: As Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, he is sued by the twins who claimed he stole their idea and by the co-founder who was later squeezed out of the business.

Name: Lằn Ranh Đỏ Mỏng Manh
Stars: Terrence Malick, Jim Caviezel, Sean Penn, Nick Nolte, Kirk Acevedo

Name: Câu Chuyện Đồ Chơi 3

Name: Ninotchka

Description: A stern Soviet woman sent to Paris to supervise the sale of jewels seized from Russian nobles finds herself attracted to a man who represents everything she is supposed to detest.

Name: Short Cuts
Stars: Andie MacDowell, Julianne Moore, Tim Robbins, Bruce Davison
Description: The day-to-day lives of several suburban Los Angeles residents.

Name: Lối Sống Sai Lầm
Stars: Shirley MacLaine, Debra Winger, Jack Nicholson, Danny DeVito
Description: Follows hard-to-please Aurora looking for love and her daughter's family problems.

Name: The In-Laws

Description: On the eve of their children's marriage, NYC in-laws Sheldon Kornpett and Vince Ricardo embark on a series of misadventures involving the CIA, the Treasury Department and Central American dictators.

Name: Anchors Aweigh
Stars: Joseph Barbera, William Hanna, Frank Sinatra, Kathryn Grayson, Gene Kelly, José Iturbi
Description: A pair of sailors on leave try to help a movie extra become a singing star.

Name: The Bishop's Wife
Stars: Cary Grant, Loretta Young, David Niven, Monty Woolley
Description: A debonair angel comes to Earth to help an Episcopalian bishop and his wife in their quest to raise money for the new church.

Name: Crossfire
Stars: Robert Young, Robert Mitchum, Robert Ryan, Gloria Grahame
Description: A man is murdered, apparently by one of a group of demobilized soldiers he met in a bar. But which one? And why?

Name: A Raisin in the Sun
Stars: Sidney Poitier, Claudia McNeil, Ruby Dee, Diana Sands
Description: A substantial insurance payment could mean either financial salvation or personal ruin for a poor black family.

Name: The Thin Man
Stars: William Powell, Myrna Loy, Maureen O'Sullivan, Nat Pendleton
Description: Former detective Nick Charles and his wealthy wife Nora investigate a murder case, mostly for the fun of it.

Name: Vút Bay

Description: 78-year-old Carl Fredricksen travels to Paradise Falls in his house equipped with balloons, inadvertently taking a young stowaway.

Name: 101 Chú Chó Đốm

Description: When a litter of Dalmatian puppies are abducted by the minions of Cruella De Vil, the owners must find them before she uses them for a diabolical fashion statement.

Name: Người Hobbit: Hành Trình Vô Định

Name: State of the Union

Description: An industrialist is urged to run for President, but this requires uncomfortable compromises on both political and marital levels.

Name: The Magnificent Ambersons
Stars: Fred Fleck, Robert Wise, Tim Holt, Joseph Cotten, Dolores Costello, Anne Baxter
Description: The spoiled young heir to the decaying Amberson fortune comes between his widowed mother and the man she has always loved.

Name: The Guns of Navarone

Name: Điệp Viên Ngốc Nghếch
Stars: Mike Myers, Elizabeth Hurley, Michael York, Mimi Rogers

Name: The Nutty Professor

Description: A timid, nearsighted chemistry teacher discovers a magical potion that can transform him into a suave and handsome Romeo. The Jekyll and Hyde game works well enough until the concoction starts to wear off at the most embarrassing times.

Description: At a turning point in his life, a former tennis pro falls for an actress who happens to be dating his friend and soon-to-be brother-in-law.

Name: Rosemary's Baby
Stars: Mia Farrow, John Cassavetes, Ruth Gordon, Sidney Blackmer
Description: A young couple trying for a baby moves into an aging, ornate apartment building on Central Park West, where they find themselves surrounded by peculiar neighbors.

Name: Buổi Diễn Của Truman

Name: Tên Cướp Bugsy
Stars: Warren Beatty, Annette Bening, Harvey Keitel, Ben Kingsley

Name: The Nun's Story

Name: Ngờ Vực
Stars: Meryl Streep, Philip Seymour Hoffman, Amy Adams, Viola Davis

Name: California Suite
Stars: Jane Fonda, Alan Alda, Maggie Smith, Michael Caine
Description: Misadventures of four groups of guests at the Beverly Hills Hotel.

Name: Người Đàn Ông Vắng Mặt
Stars: Billy Bob Thornton, Frances McDormand, Michael Badalucco, James Gandolfini
Description: A laconic, chain-smoking barber blackmails his wife's boss and lover for money to invest in dry cleaning, but his plan goes terribly wrong.

Name: Nữ Hoàng Cleopatra

Name: Days of Wine and Roses

Description: An alcoholic marries a young woman and systematically addicts her to booze so that they can share his "passion" together.

Stars: Dudley Moore, Bo Derek, Julie Andrews, Robert Webber
Description: A Hollywood composer goes through a mid-life crisis and becomes infatuated with a sexy, newly married woman.

Name: Bệnh Nhân Người Anh

Name: Chỉ Vài Người Tốt
Stars: Tom Cruise, Jack Nicholson, Demi Moore, Kevin Bacon
Description: Military lawyer Lieutenant Daniel Kaffee defends Marines accused of murder. They contend they were acting under orders.

Name: The Fortune Cookie

Name: Đội Nhặt Banh

Name: Tin Tức Phát Sóng

Stars: Alan Arkin, Sally Kellerman, Paula Prentiss, Renée Taylor
Description: A middle aged restaurateur begins to feel the desire to roam and realizes that one day each week, his mother's apartment will be empty all afternoon. He makes several attempts at seduction,...                See full summary »

Name: Năm Bản Nhạc Dễ
Stars: Jack Nicholson, Karen Black, Billy Green Bush, Fannie Flagg
Description: A dropout from upper-class America picks up work along the way on oil rigs when his life isn't spent in a squalid succession of bars, motels, and other points of interest.

Name: Donnie Darko
Stars: Jake Gyllenhaal, Jena Malone, Mary McDonnell, Holmes Osborne
Description: After narrowly escaping a bizarre accident, a troubled teenager is plagued by visions of a man in a large rabbit suit who manipulates him to commit a series of crimes.

Name: Sideways
Stars: Paul Giamatti, Thomas Haden Church, Virginia Madsen, Sandra Oh
Description: Two men reaching middle age with not much to show but disappointment embark on a week-long road trip through California's wine country, just as one is about to take a trip down the aisle.

Name: The Man Who Knew Too Much
Stars: Leslie Banks, Edna Best, Peter Lorre, Frank Vosper
Description: An ordinary British couple vacationing in Switzerland suddenly find themselves embroiled in a case of international intrigue when their daughter is kidnapped by spies plotting a political assassination.

Name: Coming Home
Stars: Jane Fonda, Jon Voight, Bruce Dern, Penelope Milford
Description: In 1968 California, a woman whose husband is a Marine officer fighting in Vietnam falls in love with a former high school classmate who suffered a paralyzing combat injury in the war.

Name: Woman of the Year
Stars: Spencer Tracy, Katharine Hepburn, Fay Bainter, Reginald Owen
Description: Rival reporters Sam and Tess fall in love and get married, only to find their relationship strained when Sam comes to resent Tess' hectic lifestyle.

Name: Jesse James
Stars: Irving Cummings, Tyrone Power, Henry Fonda, Nancy Kelly, Randolph Scott
Description: After railroad agents forcibly evict the James family from their family farm, Jesse and Frank turn to banditry for revenge.

Name: The Pope of Greenwich Village
Stars: Eric Roberts, Mickey Rourke, Daryl Hannah, Geraldine Page
Description: Two cousins unknowingly rob the mob and face the dangerous consequences.

Name: Lối Sống Đồi Trụy
Stars: Ewan McGregor, Ewen Bremner, Jonny Lee Miller, Kevin McKidd
Description: Renton, deeply immersed in the Edinburgh drug scene, tries to clean up and get out despite the allure of drugs and the influence of friends.

Name: The Ladies Man
Stars: Jerry Lewis, Helen Traubel, Pat Stanley, Kathleen Freeman
Description: A clueless, recently-single graduate unwittingly takes a job as a servant in a mansion inhabited by dozens of young women.

Name: Silver Streak
Stars: Gene Wilder, Richard Pryor, Jill Clayburgh, Patrick McGoohan
Description: On a long-distance train trip, a man finds romance but also finds himself in danger of being killed, or at least pushed off the train.

Name: Cỗ Máy Thời Gian
Stars: Rod Taylor, Alan Young, Yvette Mimieux, Sebastian Cabot
Description: A man's vision for a utopian society is disillusioned when travelling forward into time reveals a dark and dangerous society.

Name: The Man in the White Suit
Stars: Alec Guinness, Joan Greenwood, Cecil Parker, Michael Gough
Description: An altruistic chemist invents a fabric which resists wear and stain as a boon to humanity, but big business and labor realize it must be suppressed for economic reasons.

Name: The King of Comedy
Stars: Robert De Niro, Jerry Lewis, Diahnne Abbott, Sandra Bernhard
Description: Rupert Pupkin is a passionate yet unsuccessful comic who craves nothing more than to be in the spotlight and to achieve this, he stalks and kidnaps his idol to take the spotlight for himself.

Name: Cô Bé Lọ Lem
Stars: Wilfred Jackson, Hamilton Luske, Ilene Woods, James MacDonald, Eleanor Audley, Verna Felton
Description: When Cinderella's cruel stepmother prevents her from attending the Royal Ball, she gets some unexpected help from the lovable mice Gus and Jaq and from her Fairy Godmother.

Name: Câu Chuyện Tokyo
Stars: Chishû Ryû, Chieko Higashiyama, Sô Yamamura, Setsuko Hara
Description: An old couple visit their children and grandchildren in the city, but receive little attention.

Name: Beau Geste
Stars: Gary Cooper, Ray Milland, Robert Preston, Brian Donlevy
Description: Three adopted English brothers join the French Foreign Legion in North Africa after one of them steals their adoptive family's famous heirloom sapphire.

Name: Becket
Stars: Richard Burton, Peter O'Toole, John Gielgud, Gino Cervi
Description: King Henry II of England comes to terms with his affection for his close friend and confidant Thomas Becket, who finds his true honor by observing God's divine will rather than the King's.

Name: Three Ages
Stars: Buster Keaton, Buster Keaton, Margaret Leahy, Wallace Beery, Joe Roberts
Description: The misadventures of Buster in three separate historical periods.

Name: Võ Sĩ Quyền Anh
Stars: Russell Crowe, Renée Zellweger, Craig Bierko, Paul Giamatti
Description: The story of James J. Braddock, a supposedly washed-up boxer who came back to challenge for the heavyweight championship of the world.

Name: Hud
Stars: Paul Newman, Melvyn Douglas, Patricia Neal, Brandon De Wilde
Description: Honest and hard-working Texas rancher Homer Bannon has a conflict with his unscrupulous, selfish, arrogant and egotistical son Hud, who sank into alcoholism after accidentally killing his brother in a car crash.

Name: Cặp Bài Trùng
Stars: James Coburn, Kris Kristofferson, Richard Jaeckel, Katy Jurado
Description: Pat Garrett is hired as a lawman on behalf of a group of wealthy New Mexico cattle barons to bring down his old friend Billy the Kid.

Name: A Perfect World
Stars: Kevin Costner, Clint Eastwood, Laura Dern, T.J. Lowther
Description: A kidnapped boy strikes up a friendship with his captor, an escaped convict on the run from the law, while the search for him continues.

Name: Người Dơi
Stars: Michael Keaton, Jack Nicholson, Kim Basinger, Robert Wuhl
Description: The Dark Knight of Gotham City begins his war on crime with his first major enemy being Jack Napier, a criminal who becomes the clownishly homicidal Joker.

Name: Indiana Jones Và Cuộc Thập Tự Chinh Cuối Cùng
Stars: Harrison Ford, Sean Connery, Alison Doody, Denholm Elliott
Description: In 1938, after his father goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, Indiana Jones finds himself up against the Nazis again to stop them from obtaining its powers.

Name: What's New Pussycat
Stars: Peter Sellers, Peter O'Toole, Romy Schneider, Capucine
Description: A playboy who refuses to give up his hedonistic lifestyle to settle down and marry his true love seeks help from a demented psychoanalyst who is having romantic problems of his own.

Name: A Single Man
Stars: Colin Firth, Julianne Moore, Matthew Goode, Nicholas Hoult
Description: An English professor, one year after the sudden death of his boyfriend, is unable to cope with his typical days in 1960s Los Angeles.

Name: Two for the Road
Stars: Audrey Hepburn, Albert Finney, Eleanor Bron, William Daniels
Description: A couple in the south of France non-sequentially spin down the highways of infidelity in their troubled ten-year marriage.

Name: Another Year
Stars: Jim Broadbent, Ruth Sheen, Lesley Manville, Oliver Maltman
Description: A look at four seasons in the lives of a happily married couple and their relationships with their family and friends.

Name: Không Ngủ Ở Seattle
Stars: Tom Hanks, Meg Ryan, Ross Malinger, Rita Wilson
Description: A recently widowed man's son calls a radio talk-show in an attempt to find his father a partner.

Name: A Serious Man
Stars: Joel Coen, Michael Stuhlbarg, Richard Kind, Sari Lennick, Fred Melamed
Description: Larry Gopnik, a Midwestern physics teacher, watches his life unravel over multiple sudden incidents. Though seeking meaning and answers amidst his turmoils, he seems to keep sinking.

Name: Two-Minute Warning
Stars: Charlton Heston, John Cassavetes, Martin Balsam, Beau Bridges
Description: A crazed sniper is set to kill spectators at an L.A. Coliseum football championship game and the police race against time to eliminate him.

Name: Cuộc Truy Đuổi Dưới Đáy Trùng Khơi
Stars: Sean Connery, Alec Baldwin, Scott Glenn, Sam Neill
Description: In November 1984, the Soviet Union's best submarine captain violates orders and heads for the U.S. in a new undetectable sub. The American CIA and military must quickly determine: Is he trying to defect or to start a war?

Name: Ba Sắc Màu: Xanh
Stars: Juliette Binoche, Zbigniew Zamachowski, Julie Delpy, Benoît Régent
Description: A woman struggles to find a way to live her life after the death of her husband and child.

Name: Mister Roberts
Stars: Mervyn LeRoy, Joshua Logan, Henry Fonda, James Cagney, William Powell, Jack Lemmon
Description: In the waning days of World War II, the cargo officer of a Navy supply ship chafes at its role far from the action in the Pacific's backwater areas, his frustration rising when its captain denies the crew liberty over petty irritations.

Name: Huyền Thoại Ron Burgundy
Stars: Will Ferrell, Christina Applegate, Steve Carell, Paul Rudd
Description: In the 1970s, an anchorman's stint as San Diego's top-rated newsreader is challenged when an ambitious newswoman becomes his co-anchor.

Name: True Grit: Báo Thù
Stars: Joel Coen, Jeff Bridges, Matt Damon, Hailee Steinfeld, Josh Brolin
Description: A stubborn teenager enlists the help of a tough U.S. Marshal to track down her father's murderer.

Name: Ironweed
Stars: Jack Nicholson, Meryl Streep, Carroll Baker, Michael O'Keefe
Description: An alcoholic drifter spends Halloween in his hometown of Albany, New York after returning there for the first time in decades.

Name: The Wild One
Stars: Marlon Brando, Mary Murphy, Robert Keith, Lee Marvin
Description: Two rival motorcycle gangs terrorize a small town after one of their leaders is thrown in jail.

Name: Missing
Stars: Jack Lemmon, Sissy Spacek, Melanie Mayron, John Shea
Description: When an idealistic American writer disappears during the Chilean coup d'état in September 1973, his wife and father try to find him.

Name: Bài Học Đầu Đời
Stars: Carey Mulligan, Peter Sarsgaard, Alfred Molina, Olivia Williams
Description: A coming-of-age story about a teenage girl in 1960s suburban London, and how her life changes with the arrival of a playboy nearly twice her age.

Name: The China Syndrome
Stars: Jane Fonda, Jack Lemmon, Michael Douglas, Scott Brady
Description: A reporter finds what appears to be a cover-up of safety hazards at a nuclear power plant.

Name: Trưa Tím
Stars: Alain Delon, Maurice Ronet, Marie Laforêt, Erno Crisa
Description: Tom Ripley is a talented mimic, moocher, forger and all-around criminal improviser; but there's more to Tom Ripley than even he can guess.

Name: The Misfits
Stars: Clark Gable, Marilyn Monroe, Montgomery Clift, Thelma Ritter
Description: A divorcée falls for an over-the-hill cowboy who is struggling to maintain his romantically independent lifestyle.

Name: Sắc Màu Đồng Tiền
Stars: Paul Newman, Tom Cruise, Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio, Helen Shaver
Description: Fast Eddie Felson teaches a cocky but immensely talented protégé the ropes of pool hustling, which in turn inspires him to make an unlikely comeback.

Name: Z
Stars: Yves Montand, Irene Papas, Jean-Louis Trintignant, François Périer
Description: The public murder of a prominent politician and doctor amid a violent demonstration is covered up by military and government officials. A tenacious magistrate is determined not to let them get away with it.

Name: Si Mê
Stars: Ingrid Bergman, Gregory Peck, Michael Chekhov, Leo G. Carroll
Description: A psychiatrist protects the identity of an amnesia patient accused of murder while attempting to recover his memory.

Name: Grosse Pointe Blank
Stars: John Cusack, Minnie Driver, Dan Aykroyd, Joan Cusack
Description: Martin Blank is a professional assassin. He is sent on a mission to a small Detroit suburb, Grosse Pointe, and, by coincidence, his ten-year high school reunion party is taking place there at the same time.

Name: Foul Play
Stars: Goldie Hawn, Chevy Chase, Burgess Meredith, Rachel Roberts
Description: A San Francisco librarian picks up a hitchhiker whose car has broken down, which leads to her being stalked and hunted by shady individuals. A cop she briefly met during a function eventually comes to her rescue.

Name: Nữ Anh Hùng Misery
Stars: James Caan, Kathy Bates, Richard Farnsworth, Frances Sternhagen
Description: After a famous author is rescued from a car crash by a fan of his novels, he comes to realize that the care he is receiving is only the beginning of a nightmare of captivity and abuse.

Name: A Simple Plan
Stars: Bill Paxton, Billy Bob Thornton, Bridget Fonda, Brent Briscoe
Description: Three blue-collar acquaintances come across millions of dollars in lost cash and make a plan to keep their find from the authorities, but it isn't long before complications and mistrust weave their way into the plan.

Name: Divorzio all'italiana
Stars: Marcello Mastroianni, Daniela Rocca, Stefania Sandrelli, Leopoldo Trieste
Description: A married Sicilian baron falls in love with his cousin and vows to wed her, but with divorce illegal he must concoct a crime of passion to do away with his wife.

Name: Bus Stop
Stars: Marilyn Monroe, Don Murray, Arthur O'Connell, Betty Field
Description: A naive but stubborn cowboy falls in love with a saloon singer and tries to take her away against her will to get married and live on his ranch in Montana.

Name: Chuyện Cổ Tích Nước Mỹ 2: Fievel đi về phía Tây
Stars: Simon Wells, James Stewart, John Cleese, Amy Irving, Phillip Glasser
Description: Fievel's family decides to move out to the West, unaware that they are falling into a trap perpetrated by a smooth-talking cat.

Name: The Courtship of Andy Hardy
Stars: Lewis Stone, Mickey Rooney, Cecilia Parker, Fay Holden
Description: While Judge Hardy handles a couple's divorce, Andy takes a shine to their shy daughter.

Name: Trò Chơi Ma Quỷ
Stars: Michael Douglas, Deborah Kara Unger, Sean Penn, James Rebhorn
Description: After a wealthy San Francisco banker is given an opportunity to participate in a mysterious game, his life is turned upside down as he begins to question if it might really be a concealed conspiracy to destroy him.

Name: Week End
Stars: Mireille Darc, Jean Yanne, Jean-Pierre Kalfon, Yves Afonso
Description: A surreal tale of a married couple going on a road trip to visit the wife's parents with the intention of killing them for the inheritance.

Name: Hương Đàn Bà
Stars: Al Pacino, Chris O'Donnell, James Rebhorn, Gabrielle Anwar
Description: A prep school student needing money agrees to "babysit" a blind man, but the job is not at all what he anticipated.

Name: Moby Dick
Stars: Gregory Peck, Richard Basehart, Leo Genn, James Robertson Justice
Description: The sole survivor of a lost whaling ship relates the tale of his captain's self-destructive obsession to hunt the white whale, Moby Dick.

Name: Đặc Vụ Áo Đen
Stars: Tommy Lee Jones, Will Smith, Linda Fiorentino, Vincent D'Onofrio
Description: A police officer joins a secret organization that polices and monitors extraterrestrial interactions on Earth.

Name: The Natural
Stars: Robert Redford, Robert Duvall, Glenn Close, Kim Basinger
Description: A middle-aged unknown comes seemingly out of nowhere to become a legendary baseball player with almost supernatural talent.

Name: Ray
Stars: Taylor Hackford, Jamie Foxx, Regina King, Kerry Washington, Clifton Powell
Description: The story of the life and career of the legendary rhythm and blues musician Ray Charles, from his humble beginnings in the South, where he went blind at age seven, to his meteoric rise to stardom during the 1950s and 1960s.

Name: Dirty Harry
Stars: Clint Eastwood, Clint Eastwood, Andrew Robinson, Harry Guardino, Reni Santoni
Description: When a man calling himself "the Scorpio Killer" menaces San Francisco, tough-as-nails Police Inspector "Dirty" Harry Callahan is assigned to track down the crazed psychopath.

Name: Hoosiers
Stars: Gene Hackman, Barbara Hershey, Dennis Hopper, Sheb Wooley
Description: A coach with a checkered past and a local drunk train a small-town high school basketball team to become a top contender for the state championship in 1950s Indiana.

Name: Chariots of Fire
Stars: Ben Cross, Ian Charleson, Nicholas Farrell, Nigel Havers
Description: Two British track athletes, one a determined Jew and the other a devout Christian, are driven to win in the 1924 Olympics as they wrestle with issues of pride and conscience.

Name: Love Finds Andy Hardy
Stars: Mickey Rooney, Judy Garland, Lewis Stone, Cecilia Parker
Description: Andy has problems raising the last payment for a used car and juggling three pretty girls with an upcoming country club dance scheduled.

Name: The Great Ziegfeld
Stars: Robert Z. Leonard, William Powell, Myrna Loy, Luise Rainer, Frank Morgan
Description: The ups and downs of Florenz Ziegfeld Jr., famed producer of extravagant stage revues, are portrayed.

Name: The Great Race
Stars: Tony Curtis, Natalie Wood, Jack Lemmon, Peter Falk
Description: In the early 20th century, two rivals, the heroic Leslie and the despicable Professor Fate, engage in an epic automobile race from New York to Paris.

Name: The Princess Comes Across
Stars: Carole Lombard, Fred MacMurray, Douglass Dumbrille, Alison Skipworth
Description: A woman pretends to be royalty in order to get aboard a cruise ship.

Name: Tiến Sĩ No
Stars: Sean Connery, Ursula Andress, Bernard Lee, Joseph Wiseman
Description: A resourceful British government agent seeks answers in a case involving the disappearance of a colleague and the disruption of the American space program.

Name: Wife vs. Secretary
Stars: Clark Gable, Jean Harlow, Myrna Loy, May Robson
Description: The wife of a publishing executive mistakenly believes that her husband's relationship with his attractive secretary is more than professional.

Name: Help!
Stars: The Beatles, Richard Lester, John Lennon, Paul McCartney, George Harrison, Ringo Starr
Description: Sir Ringo Starr finds himself the human sacrifice target of a cult, and his fellow members of The Beatles must try to protect him from it.

Name: Election
Stars: Matthew Broderick, Reese Witherspoon, Loren Nelson, Chris Klein
Description: A high school teacher meets his match in an over-achieving student politician.

Name: The Killing
Stars: Sterling Hayden, Coleen Gray, Vince Edwards, Jay C. Flippen
Description: Crook Johnny Clay assembles a five-man team to plan and execute a daring racetrack robbery.

Name: Một Lần Như Thế
Stars: Glen Hansard, Markéta Irglová, Hugh Walsh, Gerard Hendrick
Description: A modern-day musical about a busker and an immigrant and their eventful week in Dublin, as they write, rehearse and record songs that tell their love story.

Name: Rambo: Đổ Máu
Stars: Sylvester Stallone, Brian Dennehy, Richard Crenna, Bill McKinney
Description: A veteran Green Beret is forced by a cruel Sheriff and his deputies to flee into the mountains and wage an escalating one-man war against his pursuers.

Name: I Call First
Stars: Harvey Keitel, Zina Bethune, Anne Collette, Lennard Kuras
Description: A young man can't accept the girl he likes because of her bitter past.

Name: Superman II
Stars: Richard Donner, Gene Hackman, Christopher Reeve, Margot Kidder, Ned Beatty
Description: Superman agrees to sacrifice his powers to start a relationship with Lois Lane, unaware that three Kryptonian criminals he inadvertently released are conquering Earth.

Name: A Mighty Wind
Stars: Christopher Guest, Eugene Levy, Michael McKean, Harry Shearer
Description: Mockumentary captures the reunion of 1960s folk trio the Folksmen as they prepare for a show at The Town Hall to memorialize a recently deceased concert promoter.

Name: Cơn Cuồng Loạn
Stars: Jon Finch, Barry Foster, Barbara Leigh-Hunt, Anna Massey
Description: A serial murderer is strangling women with a necktie. The London police have a suspect, but he is the wrong man.

Name: Rời Khỏi Las Vegas
Stars: Nicolas Cage, Elisabeth Shue, Julian Sands, Richard Lewis
Description: Ben Sanderson, a Hollywood screenwriter who lost everything because of his alcoholism, arrives in Las Vegas to drink himself to death. There, he meets and forms an uneasy friendship and non-interference pact with prostitute Sera.

Name: Người Nhện
Stars: Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst, Willem Dafoe, James Franco
Description: After being bitten by a genetically-modified spider, a shy teenager gains spider-like abilities that he uses to fight injustice as a masked superhero and face a vengeful enemy.

Name: The Far Country
Stars: James Stewart, Ruth Roman, Corinne Calvet, Walter Brennan
Description: A self-minded adventurer locks horns with a crooked lawman while driving cattle to Dawson.

Name: The Fisher King
Stars: Jeff Bridges, Robin Williams, Adam Bryant, Paul Lombardi
Description: A former radio DJ, suicidally despondent because of a terrible mistake he made, finds redemption in helping a deranged homeless man who was an unwitting victim of that mistake.

Name: Barry Lyndon
Stars: Ryan O'Neal, Marisa Berenson, Patrick Magee, Hardy Krüger
Description: An Irish rogue wins the heart of a rich widow and assumes her dead husband's aristocratic position in 18th-century England.

Name: The Taking of Pelham One Two Three
Stars: Walter Matthau, Robert Shaw, Martin Balsam, Hector Elizondo
Description: Four armed men hijack a New York City subway car and demand a ransom for the passengers. The city's police are faced with a conundrum: Even if it's paid, how could they get away?

Name: Pineapple Express
Stars: Seth Rogen, James Franco, Gary Cole, Danny McBride
Description: A process server and his marijuana dealer wind up on the run from hitmen and a corrupt police officer after he witnesses his dealer's boss murder a competitor while trying to serve papers on him.

Name: Lịch Sử Mĩ Thế Kỉ X
Stars: Edward Norton, Edward Furlong, Beverly D'Angelo, Jennifer Lien
Description: Living a life marked by violence, neo-Nazi Derek finally goes to prison after killing two black youths. Upon his release, Derek vows to change; he hopes to prevent his brother, Danny, who idolizes Derek, from following in his footsteps.

Name: The Pawnbroker
Stars: Rod Steiger, Geraldine Fitzgerald, Brock Peters, Jaime Sánchez
Description: A Jewish pawnbroker, victim of Nazi persecution, loses all faith in his fellow man until he realizes too late the tragedy of his actions.

Name: The Remains of the Day
Stars: Anthony Hopkins, Emma Thompson, John Haycraft, Christopher Reeve
Description: A butler who sacrificed body and soul to service in the years leading up to World War II realizes too late how misguided his loyalty was to his lordly employer.

Name: Bánh Mỹ
Stars: Chris Weitz, Jason Biggs, Chris Klein, Thomas Ian Nicholas, Jennifer Coolidge
Description: Four teenage boys enter a pact to lose their virginity by prom night.

Name: The Errand Boy
Stars: Jerry Lewis, Brian Donlevy, Howard McNear, Dick Wesson
Description: A goofy paperhanger is hired to root out a financial inefficiency on a Hollywood studio lot, wreaking havoc as he goes.

Name: Câu Chuyện Ngọc Lục Bảo
Stars: Michael Douglas, Kathleen Turner, Danny DeVito, Zack Norman
Description: A mousy romance novelist sets off for Colombia to ransom her kidnapped sister, and soon finds herself in the middle of a dangerous adventure hunting for treasure with a mercenary rogue.

Name: Sự Thật Chết Người
Stars: Richard Nixon, Ron Howard, Frank Langella, Michael Sheen, Kevin Bacon, Sam Rockwell
Description: A dramatic retelling of the post-Watergate television interviews between British talk-show host David Frost and former president Richard Nixon.

Name: The Hudsucker Proxy
Stars: Ethan Coen, Tim Robbins, Paul Newman, Jennifer Jason Leigh, Charles Durning
Description: A naive business graduate is installed as president of a manufacturing company as part of a stock scam.

Name: Thời Khắc
Stars: Meryl Streep, Nicole Kidman, Julianne Moore, Stephen Dillane
Description: The story of how the novel "Mrs. Dalloway" affects three generations of women, all of whom, in one way or another, have had to deal with suicide in their lives.

Name: The Party
Stars: Peter Sellers, Claudine Longet, Natalia Borisova, Jean Carson
Description: A clerical mistake results in a bumbling Indian film star being invited to an exclusive Hollywood party instead of being fired.

Name: Bottle Rocket
Stars: Luke Wilson, Owen Wilson, Ned Dowd, Shea Fowler
Description: Three friends plan to pull off a simple robbery and go on the run.

Name: Saboteur
Stars: Priscilla Lane, Robert Cummings, Otto Kruger, Alan Baxter
Description: A young man accused of sabotage goes on the run to prove his innocence.

Name: La Vie En Rose
Stars: Olivier Dahan, Marion Cotillard, Sylvie Testud, Pascal Greggory, Emmanuelle Seigner
Description: Biopic of the iconic French singer Édith Piaf. Raised by her grandmother in a brothel, she was discovered while singing on a street corner at the age of 19. Despite her success, Piaf's life was filled with tragedy.

Name: Love Crazy
Stars: William Powell, Myrna Loy, Gail Patrick, Jack Carson
Description: A wife suspecting infidelity starts divorce proceedings, so the husband pretends to be insane in order to delay the divorce and clear up the misunderstanding.

Name: Only Two Can Play
Stars: Peter Sellers, Mai Zetterling, Virginia Maskell, Kenneth Griffith
Description: A frustrated librarian (Sellers) in Swansea, Wales is torn between his wife Jean (Markell) and the glamorous, married Liz (Zetterling) who wants to have an affair.

Name: Boys Town
Stars: Spencer Tracy, Mickey Rooney, Henry Hull, Leslie Fenton
Description: When a death row prisoner tells him he wouldn't have led a life of crime if only he had had one friend as a child, Father Edward Flanagan decides to start a home for young boys.

Name: Torn Curtain
Stars: Paul Newman, Julie Andrews, Lila Kedrova, Hansjörg Felmy
Description: An American scientist publicly defects to East Germany as part of a cloak and dagger mission to find the solution for a formula resin before planning an escape back to the West.

Name: Night Moves
Stars: Gene Hackman, Jennifer Warren, Edward Binns, Harris Yulin
Description: Los Angeles private investigator Harry Moseby is hired by a client to find her runaway teenage daughter. Moseby tracks the daughter down, only to stumble upon something much more intriguing and sinister.

Name: The Naked Spur
Stars: James Stewart, Janet Leigh, Robert Ryan, Ralph Meeker
Description: A bounty hunter trying to bring a murderer to justice is forced to accept the help of two less-than-trustworthy strangers.

Name: The Lemon Drop Kid
Stars: Frank Tashlin, Bob Hope, Marilyn Maxwell, Lloyd Nolan, Jane Darwell
Description: A New York City swindler has until Christmas to come up with the $10,000 he owes a gangster, prompting him to go into scamming overdrive.

Name: Giang Hồ Mỹ
Stars: Denzel Washington, Russell Crowe, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Josh Brolin
Description: An outcast New York City cop is charged with bringing down Harlem drug lord Frank Lucas, whose real life inspired this partly biographical film.

Name: Night and the City
Stars: Richard Widmark, Gene Tierney, Googie Withers, Hugh Marlowe
Description: A small-time grifter and nightclub tout takes advantage of some fortuitous circumstances and tries to become a big-time player as a wrestling promoter.

Name: Get Carter
Stars: Michael Caine, Ian Hendry, Britt Ekland, John Osborne
Description: When his brother dies under mysterious circumstances in a car accident, London gangster Jack Carter travels to Newcastle to investigate.

Name: The Whole Nine Yards
Stars: Bruce Willis, Matthew Perry, Rosanna Arquette, Michael Clarke Duncan
Description: A struggling dentist's life is turned upside down when a famous gangster moves in next door, and his wife convinces him to inform a notorious mob boss about the gangster's whereabouts.

Name: Tay Đấm Huyền Thoại 4
Stars: Sylvester Stallone, Talia Shire, Burt Young, Carl Weathers
Description: Rocky Balboa proudly holds the world heavyweight boxing championship, but a new challenger has stepped forward: Drago, a six-foot-four, 261-pound fighter who has the backing of the Soviet Union.

Name: The Offence
Stars: Sean Connery, Trevor Howard, Vivien Merchant, Ian Bannen
Description: A burnt-out British police detective finally snaps whilst interrogating a suspected child molester.

Name: Nhiệm Vụ Bất Khả Thi
Stars: Tom Cruise, Jon Voight, Emmanuelle Béart, Henry Czerny
Description: An American agent, under false suspicion of disloyalty, must discover and expose the real spy without the help of his organization.

Name: Buck Privates
Stars: Bud Abbott, Lou Costello, Lee Bowman, Jane Frazee
Description: Two sidewalk salesman enlist in the army in order to avoid jail, only to find that their drill instructor is the police officer who tried having them imprisoned.

Name: Wait Until Dark
Stars: Audrey Hepburn, Alan Arkin, Richard Crenna, Efrem Zimbalist Jr.
Description: A recently blinded woman is terrorized by a trio of thugs while they search for a heroin-stuffed doll they believe is in her apartment.

Name: National Lampoon's Vacation
Stars: Chevy Chase, Beverly D'Angelo, Imogene Coca, Randy Quaid
Description: The Griswold family's cross-country drive to the Walley World theme park proves to be much more arduous than they ever anticipated.

Name: Manhattan Murder Mystery
Stars: Woody Allen, Diane Keaton, Jerry Adler, Lynn Cohen
Description: A middle-aged couple suspects foul play when their neighbor's wife suddenly drops dead.

Name: The End of the Affair
Stars: Ralph Fiennes, Julianne Moore, Stephen Rea, Heather-Jay Jones
Description: A desperate man tries to find out why his beloved left him years ago.

Name: Tôi Là Sam
Stars: Sean Penn, Michelle Pfeiffer, Dakota Fanning, Dianne Wiest
Description: An intellectually disabled man fights for custody of his 7-year-old daughter and in the process teaches his cold-hearted lawyer the value of love and family.

Name: Những Chàng Trai Brazil
Stars: Gregory Peck, Laurence Olivier, James Mason, Lilli Palmer
Description: A Nazi hunter in Paraguay discovers a sinister and bizarre plot to rekindle the Third Reich.

Name: Chính Trị Gia Đồng Tính
Stars: Sean Penn, Josh Brolin, Emile Hirsch, Diego Luna
Description: The story of Harvey Milk, and his struggles as an American gay activist who fought for gay rights and became California's first openly gay elected official.

Name: Super Troopers
Stars: Jay Chandrasekhar, Kevin Heffernan, André Vippolis, Joey Kern
Description: Five Vermont state troopers, avid pranksters with a knack for screwing up, try to save their jobs and out-do the local police department by solving a crime.

Name: Những Lá Thư Từ Iwo Jima
Stars: Ken Watanabe, Kazunari Ninomiya, Tsuyoshi Ihara, Ryo Kase
Description: The story of the battle of Iwo Jima between the United States and Imperial Japan during World War II, as told from the perspective of the Japanese who fought it.

Name: Nixon
Stars: Oliver Stone, Anthony Hopkins, Joan Allen, Powers Boothe, Ed Harris
Description: A biographical story of former U.S. President Richard Nixon, from his days as a young boy, to his eventual Presidency, which ended in shame.

Name: In the Company of Men
Stars: Aaron Eckhart, Matt Malloy, Stacy Edwards, Michael Martin
Description: Two business executives--one an avowed misogynist, the other recently emotionally wounded by his love interest--set out to exact revenge on the female gender by seeking out the most innocent, uncorrupted girl they can find and ruining her life.

Name: Fletch
Stars: Chevy Chase, Joe Don Baker, Dana Wheeler-Nicholson, Richard Libertini
Description: Irwin M. "Fletch" Fletcher is a newspaper reporter being offered a large sum to off a cancerous millionaire, but is on the run, risking his job and finding clues when it's clear the man is healthy.

Name: The Life of Emile Zola
Stars: Paul Muni, Gale Sondergaard, Joseph Schildkraut, Gloria Holden
Description: The biopic of the famous French muckraking writer and his involvement in fighting the injustice of the Dreyfus Affair.

Name: Holiday
Stars: Katharine Hepburn, Cary Grant, Doris Nolan, Lew Ayres
Description: A young man in love with a girl from a rich family finds his unorthodox plan to go on holiday for the early years of his life met with skepticism by everyone except for his fiancée's eccentric sister and long-suffering brother.

Name: Hoa Hậu Nhí
Stars: Valerie Faris, Steve Carell, Toni Collette, Greg Kinnear, Abigail Breslin
Description: A family determined to get their young daughter into the finals of a beauty pageant take a cross-country trip in their VW bus.

Name: 500 Ngày Yêu
Stars: Zooey Deschanel, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Geoffrey Arend, Chloë Grace Moretz
Description: After being dumped by the girl he believes to be his soulmate, hopeless romantic Tom Hansen reflects on their relationship to try and figure out where things went wrong and how he can win her back.

Name: Hổ Thẹn
Stars: Michael Fassbender, Carey Mulligan, James Badge Dale, Lucy Walters
Description: A sex addict's carefully cultivated private life falls apart after his sister arrives for an indefinite stay.

Name: Người Nhện 2
Stars: Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst, Alfred Molina, James Franco
Description: Peter Parker is beset with troubles in his failing personal life as he battles a former brilliant scientist named Otto Octavius.

Name: Sấm Nhiệt Đới
Stars: Ben Stiller, Jack Black, Robert Downey Jr., Jeff Kahn
Description: Through a series of freak occurrences, a group of actors shooting a big-budget war movie are forced to become the soldiers they are portraying.

Name: Harry Potter và Chiếc Cốc Lửa
Stars: Daniel Radcliffe, Emma Watson, Rupert Grint, Eric Sykes
Description: Harry Potter finds himself competing in a hazardous tournament between rival schools of magic, but he is distracted by recurring nightmares.

Name: 30' Sau Nửa Đêm
Stars: Kathryn Bigelow, Jessica Chastain, Joel Edgerton, Chris Pratt, Mark Strong
Description: A chronicle of the decade-long hunt for al-Qaeda terrorist leader Osama bin Laden after the September 2001 attacks, and his death at the hands of the Navy S.E.A.L.s Team 6 in May 2011.

Name: Kẻ Cắp Gặp Bà Già
Stars: Alec Guinness, Peter Sellers, Cecil Parker, Herbert Lom
Description: Five oddball criminals planning a bank robbery rent rooms on a cul-de-sac from an octogenarian widow under the pretext that they are classical musicians.

Name: Nhà Vua Nói Lắp
Stars: Tom Hooper, Colin Firth, Geoffrey Rush, Helena Bonham Carter, Derek Jacobi
Description: The story of King George VI, his unexpected ascension to the throne of the British Empire in 1936, and the speech therapist who helped the unsure monarch overcome his stammer.

Name: The Long, Hot Summer
Stars: Paul Newman, Joanne Woodward, Anthony Franciosa, Orson Welles
Description: Accused barn burner and conman Ben Quick arrives in a small Mississippi town and quickly ingratiates himself with its richest family, the Varners.

Name: Sợi Dây Thừng
Stars: James Stewart, John Dall, Farley Granger, Dick Hogan
Description: Two men attempt to prove they committed the perfect crime by hosting a dinner party after strangling their former classmate to death.

Name: Executive Suite
Stars: William Holden, Barbara Stanwyck, June Allyson, Fredric March
Description: When the head of a large manufacturing firm dies suddenly from a stroke, his vice presidents vie to see who will replace him.

Name: Yêu Điên Dại
Stars: John Requa, Steve Carell, Ryan Gosling, Julianne Moore, Emma Stone
Description: A middle-aged husband's life changes dramatically when his wife asks him for a divorce. He seeks to rediscover his manhood with the help of a newfound friend, Jacob, learning to pick up girls at bars.

Name: Tình Yêu Của Gilbert Grape
Stars: Johnny Depp, Leonardo DiCaprio, Juliette Lewis, Mary Steenburgen
Description: A young man in a small Midwestern town struggles to care for his mentally-disabled younger brother and morbidly obese mother while attempting to pursue his own happiness.

Name: Jungle Fever
Stars: Wesley Snipes, Annabella Sciorra, Spike Lee, Ossie Davis
Description: Friends and family of a married black architect react in different ways to his affair with an Italian secretary.

Name: Mối Tình Tay Ba Trường Rushmore
Stars: Jason Schwartzman, Bill Murray, Olivia Williams, Seymour Cassel
Description: A teenager at Rushmore Academy falls for a much older teacher and befriends a middle-aged industrialist. Later, he finds out that his love interest and his friend are having an affair, which prompts him to begin a vendetta.

Name: Tên Tội Phạm Trẻ Tuổi
Stars: Emile Hirsch, Justin Timberlake, Anton Yelchin, Bruce Willis
Description: Johnny and his pals kidnap Jake's 15-year-old brother Zach, then assign his buddy Frankie to be Zach's minder. They develop a brotherly friendship. Zach parties with his captors as things begin to spin out of control.

Name: Người Mỹ
Stars: George Clooney, Paolo Bonacelli, Violante Placido, Irina Björklund
Description: An assassin hides out in Italy for one last assignment.

Name: Người Đàn Bà Đẹp
Stars: Richard Gere, Julia Roberts, Jason Alexander, Laura San Giacomo
Description: A man in a legal but hurtful business needs an escort for some social events, and hires a beautiful prostitute he meets... only to fall in love.

Name: Thị Trấn Tội Ác
Stars: Ben Affleck, Rebecca Hall, Jon Hamm, Jeremy Renner
Description: A proficient group of thieves rob a bank and hold Claire, the assistant manager, hostage. Things begin to get complicated when one of the crew members falls in love with Claire.

Name: Chuyến Tàu Tới Yuma
Stars: Russell Crowe, Christian Bale, Ben Foster, Logan Lerman
Description: A small-time rancher agrees to hold a captured outlaw who's awaiting a train to go to court in Yuma. A battle of wills ensues as the outlaw tries to psych out the rancher.

Name: Cảm Hứng
Stars: John Travolta, Olivia Newton-John, Stockard Channing, Jeff Conaway
Description: Good girl Sandy Olsson and greaser Danny Zuko fell in love over the summer. When they unexpectedly discover they're now in the same high school, will they be able to rekindle their romance?

Name: Harry Potter và Bảo Bối Tử Thần: Phần 1
Stars: Daniel Radcliffe, Emma Watson, Rupert Grint, Bill Nighy
Description: As Harry, Ron and Hermione race against time and evil to destroy the Horcruxes, they uncover the existence of the three most powerful objects in the wizarding world: the Deathly Hallows.

Name: Kẻ Liều Mạng
Stars: Antonio Banderas, Salma Hayek, Joaquim de Almeida, Cheech Marin
Description: Former musician and gunslinger El Mariachi arrives at a small Mexican border town after being away for a long time. His past quickly catches up with him and he soon gets entangled with the local drug kingpin Bucho and his gang.

Name: The New World
Stars: Colin Farrell, Q'orianka Kilcher, Christopher Plummer, Christian Bale
Description: The story of the English exploration of Virginia, and of the changing world and loves of Pocahontas.

Name: The Prisoner of Second Avenue
Stars: Jack Lemmon, Anne Bancroft, Gene Saks, Elizabeth Wilson
Description: A suddenly-unemployed company executive suffers a nervous breakdown, and his supporting wife tries everything to console him and pick up the slack.

Name: The Great Gatsby
Stars: Robert Redford, Mia Farrow, Bruce Dern, Karen Black
Description: A Midwesterner becomes fascinated with his nouveau riche neighbor, who obsesses over his lost love.

Name: Airport
Stars: Henry Hathaway, Burt Lancaster, Dean Martin, George Kennedy, Jean Seberg
Description: A bomber on board an airplane, an airport almost closed by snow, and various personal problems of the people involved.

Name: The Sugarland Express
Stars: Goldie Hawn, Ben Johnson, Michael Sacks, William Atherton
Description: A woman attempts to reunite her family by helping her husband escape prison and together kidnapping their son. But things don't go as planned when they are forced to take a police hostage on the road.

Name: There's a Girl in My Soup
Stars: Peter Sellers, Goldie Hawn, Tony Britton, Ruth Trouncer
Description: In their sexual game, an egotistical and womanizing television host meets his match, Marion, who seeks to remain one step ahead of him.

Name: The Getaway
Stars: Steve McQueen, Ali MacGraw, Ben Johnson, Sally Struthers
Description: A recently-released ex-con and his loyal wife go on the run after a heist goes awry.

Name: Multiplicity
Stars: Michael Keaton, Andie MacDowell, Zack Duhame, Katie Schlossberg
Description: A man who never has enough time for the things he wants to do is offered the opportunity to have himself duplicated.

Name: That Uncertain Feeling
Stars: Merle Oberon, Melvyn Douglas, Burgess Meredith, Alan Mowbray
Description: A psychoanalyst causes a woman to doubt her happy marriage.

Name: Bound for Glory
Stars: Hal Ashby, David Carradine, Ronny Cox, Melinda Dillon, Gail Strickland
Description: The early life of Woody Guthrie as a vagabond folk singer.

Name: Duel in the Sun
Stars: Otto Brower, William Dieterle, Sidney Franklin, William Cameron Menzies, David O. Selznick, Josef von Sternberg, Jennifer Jones, Joseph Cotten, Gregory Peck, Lionel Barrymore
Description: Beautiful, biracial Pearl Chavez becomes the ward of her dead father's first love and finds herself torn between two brothers, one good and the other bad.

Name: Chú Rể Trình Làng
Stars: Ben Stiller, Robert De Niro, Teri Polo, Blythe Danner
Description: Male nurse Greg Focker meets his girlfriend's parents before proposing, but her suspicious father is every date's worst nightmare.

Name: Dòng Sông Không Trở Lại
Stars: Jean Negulesco, Robert Mitchum, Marilyn Monroe, Rory Calhoun, Tommy Rettig
Description: The titular river unites a farmer recently released from prison, his young son, and an ambitious saloon singer. In order to survive, each must be purged of anger, and each must learn to understand and care for the others.

Name: Brute Force
Stars: Burt Lancaster, Hume Cronyn, Charles Bickford, Yvonne De Carlo
Description: At a tough penitentiary, prisoner Joe Collins plans to rebel against Captain Munsey, the power-mad chief guard.

Name: Avatar
Stars: Sam Worthington, Zoe Saldana, Sigourney Weaver, Michelle Rodriguez
Description: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

Name: All the King's Men
Stars: Broderick Crawford, John Ireland, Joanne Dru, John Derek
Description: The rise and fall of a corrupt politician, who makes his friends richer and retains power by dint of a populist appeal.

Name: Death to Smoochy
Stars: Robin Williams, Edward Norton, Catherine Keener, Danny DeVito
Description: A kids' show host, Rainbow Randolph, is fired in disgrace while his replacement, Sheldon Mopes, A.K.A. Smoochy the Rhino, finds himself a rising star. Unfortunately for Sheldon, the business of kids' television isn't all child's play.

Name: Chuyện Tình Ở Barcelona
Stars: Rebecca Hall, Scarlett Johansson, Javier Bardem, Christopher Evan Welch
Description: Two friends on a summer holiday in Spain become enamored with the same painter, unaware that his ex-wife, with whom he has a tempestuous relationship, is about to re-enter the picture.

Name: Stalag 17
Stars: William Holden, Don Taylor, Otto Preminger, Robert Strauss
Description: After two Americans are killed while escaping from a German P.O.W. camp in World War II, the barracks black marketeer, J.J. Sefton, is suspected of being an informer.

Name: Ngày Huấn Luyện
Stars: Denzel Washington, Ethan Hawke, Scott Glenn, Tom Berenger
Description: A rookie cop spends his first day as a Los Angeles narcotics officer with a rogue detective who isn't what he appears to be.

Name: The Contender
Stars: Joan Allen, Gary Oldman, Jeff Bridges, Christian Slater
Description: Senator Laine Hanson is a contender for U.S. Vice President, but information and disinformation about her past surfaces that threatens to derail her confirmation.

Name: Red River
Stars: Arthur Rosson, John Wayne, Montgomery Clift, Joanne Dru, Walter Brennan
Description: Dunson leads a cattle drive, the culmination of over 14 years of work, to its destination in Missouri. But his tyrannical behavior along the way causes a mutiny, led by his adopted son.

Name: Tù Khổ Sai
Stars: Stuart Graham, Laine Megaw, Brian Milligan, Liam McMahon
Description: Irish republican Bobby Sands leads the inmates of a Northern Irish prison in a hunger strike.

Name: Call Northside 777
Stars: James Stewart, Richard Conte, Lee J. Cobb, Helen Walker
Description: Chicago reporter P.J. McNeal re-opens a decade-old murder case.

Name: Nội Gián
Stars: Russell Crowe, Al Pacino, Christopher Plummer, Diane Venora
Description: A research chemist comes under personal and professional attack when he decides to appear in a 60 Minutes exposé on Big Tobacco.

Name: Mười Giới Luật
Stars: Theodore Roberts, Charles de Rochefort, Estelle Taylor, Julia Faye
