Description: After hearing the story of Moses, the sons of a devout Christian mother go their own ways, and the atheist brother's breaking of the Ten Commandments leads to tragedy.

Name: Easter Parade
Stars: Judy Garland, Fred Astaire, Peter Lawford, Ann Miller
Description: A nightclub performer hires a naive chorus girl to become his new dance partner to make his former partner jealous and to prove he can make any partner a star.

Name: Bốn Đám Cưới Và Một Đám Ma
Stars: Hugh Grant, Andie MacDowell, James Fleet, Simon Callow
Description: Over the course of five social occasions, a committed bachelor must consider the notion that he may have discovered love.

Name: George Washington Slept Here
Stars: Jack Benny, Ann Sheridan, Charles Coburn, Percy Kilbride
Description: When Bill and Connie Fuller are forced to move out of their Manhattan apartment because of their pet dog, Connie purchases a dilapidated old Pennsylvania house that George Washington allegedly slept in. She then persuades Bill to renovate.

Name: Ở Nhà Một Mình
Stars: Macaulay Culkin, Joe Pesci, Daniel Stern, John Heard
Description: An eight-year-old troublemaker, mistakenly left home alone, must defend his home against a pair of burglars on Christmas eve.

Name: Little Big Man
Stars: Dustin Hoffman, Faye Dunaway, Chief Dan George, Martin Balsam
Description: Jack Crabb, looking back from extreme old age, tells of his life being raised by Native Americans and fighting with General Custer.

Name: Naked
Stars: David Thewlis, Lesley Sharp, Katrin Cartlidge, Greg Cruttwell
Description: An unemployed Mancunian vents his rage on unsuspecting strangers as he embarks on a nocturnal London odyssey.

Name: Hanna Bí Ẩn
Stars: Saoirse Ronan, Cate Blanchett, Eric Bana, Vicky Krieps
Description: A sixteen-year-old girl who was raised by her father to be the perfect assassin is dispatched on a mission across Europe, tracked by a ruthless intelligence agent and her operatives.

Name: Người Sơn Cước
Stars: Robert Redford, Will Geer, Delle Bolton, Josh Albee
Description: A mountain man who wishes to live the life of a hermit becomes the unwilling object of a long vendetta by the Crow tribe and proves to be a match for their warriors in single combat on the early frontier.

Name: Khiêu Vũ Với Bầy Sói
Stars: Kevin Costner, Mary McDonnell, Graham Greene, Rodney A. Grant
Description: Lieutenant John Dunbar, assigned to a remote western Civil War outpost, finds himself engaging with a neighbouring Sioux settlement, causing him to question his own purpose.

Name: Bản Năng Gốc
Stars: Michael Douglas, Sharon Stone, George Dzundza, Jeanne Tripplehorn
Description: A violent police detective investigates a brutal murder that might involve a manipulative and seductive novelist.

Name: Watch on the Rhine
Stars: Hal Mohr, Bette Davis, Paul Lukas, Geraldine Fitzgerald, Lucile Watson
Description: A German-born engineer, his American wife and their children travel from Mexico to the United States to visit her family, but a Romanian count complicates their plans.

Name: Long Day's Journey Into Night
Stars: Katharine Hepburn, Ralph Richardson, Jason Robards, Dean Stockwell
Description: At the end of a long and hot summer day, members of one family gather in a large house. Everyone has something painful and offensive to say, and their silence is even worse.

Name: Cảnh Sát Beverly Hills
Stars: Eddie Murphy, Judge Reinhold, John Ashton, Lisa Eilbacher
Description: A freewheeling Detroit cop pursuing a murder investigation finds himself dealing with the very different culture of Beverly Hills.

Name: Queen Christina
Stars: Greta Garbo, John Gilbert, Ian Keith, Lewis Stone
Description: Queen Christina of Sweden is a popular monarch who is loyal to her country. However, when she falls in love with a Spanish envoy, she must choose between the throne and the man she loves.

Name: Bedazzled
Stars: Peter Cook, Dudley Moore, Eleanor Bron, Raquel Welch
Description: A hapless loser sells his soul to the Devil in exchange for seven wishes, but has trouble winning over the girl of his dreams.

Name: Cuộc Nổi Loạn Trên Tàu Caine
Stars: Humphrey Bogart, José Ferrer, Van Johnson, Fred MacMurray
Description: When a U.S. Naval captain shows signs of mental instability that jeopardises the ship, the first officer is urged to consider relieving him of command.

Name: The Citadel
Stars: Robert Donat, Rosalind Russell, Ralph Richardson, Rex Harrison
Description: An enthusiastic young doctor happily embarks on his career, but it isn't long before he finds out what being a doctor really entails.

Name: Bunny Lake Is Missing
Stars: Keir Dullea, Carol Lynley, Laurence Olivier, Martita Hunt
Description: A woman reports that her young daughter is missing, but there seems to be no evidence that she ever existed.

Name: Về Với Thiên Nhiên
Stars: Emile Hirsch, Vince Vaughn, Catherine Keener, Marcia Gay Harden
Description: After graduating from Emory University, top student and athlete Christopher McCandless abandons his possessions, gives his entire $24,000 savings account to charity and hitchhikes to Alaska to live in the wilderness. Along the way, Christopher encounters a series of characters that shape his life.

Name: The Late Show
Stars: Art Carney, Lily Tomlin, Bill Macy, Eugene Roche
Description: A grumpy semi-retired private investigator partners with a quirky female client to catch the people who murdered his partner.

Name: Design for Living
Stars: Fredric March, Gary Cooper, Miriam Hopkins, Edward Everett Horton
Description: A woman cannot decide between two men who love her, and the trio agree to try living together in a platonic friendly relationship.

Name: The Delicate Delinquent
Stars: Jerry Lewis, Jerry Lewis, Martha Hyer, Darren McGavin, Robert Ivers
Description: Sidney Pythias is a bumbling janitor picked up by cop Mike Damon as a teenage gang member worth saving from delinquency. With Damon's help, Sidney works his way through the Police Academy to become a cop too.

Name: Mất Ngủ
Stars: Al Pacino, Robin Williams, Hilary Swank, Martin Donovan
Description: Two Los Angeles homicide detectives are dispatched to a northern town where the sun doesn't set to investigate the methodical murder of a local teen.

Name: Picnic
Stars: William Holden, Kim Novak, Betty Field, Susan Strasberg
Description: Emotions are ignited among the complacent townsfolk when a handsome drifter arrives in a small Kansas community on the morning of the Labor Day picnic.

Name: Woyzeck
Stars: Klaus Kinski, Eva Mattes, Wolfgang Reichmann, Willy Semmelrogge
Description: Franz Woyzeck is a hapless, hopeless soldier, alone and powerless in society, assaulted from all sides by forces he can not control.

Name: Captain Blood
Stars: Errol Flynn, Olivia de Havilland, Lionel Atwill, Basil Rathbone
Description: After treating a Monmouth rebel against King James II in 1680s England, a young Irish doctor is exiled as a slave to Jamaica where he captures a Spanish galleon and becomes the most feared pirate of the Caribbean.

Name: Johnny Guitar
Stars: Joan Crawford, Sterling Hayden, Mercedes McCambridge, Scott Brady
Description: After helping a wounded gang member, a strong-willed female saloon owner is wrongly suspected of murder and bank robbery by a lynch mob.

Name: To Catch a Thief
Stars: Cary Grant, Grace Kelly, Jessie Royce Landis, John Williams
Description: A retired jewel thief sets out to prove his innocence after being suspected of returning to his former occupation.

Name: Lấy Chồng Triệu Phú
Stars: Marilyn Monroe, Betty Grable, Lauren Bacall, David Wayne
Description: Three women set out to find eligible millionaires to marry, but find true love in the process.

Name: Swiss Family Robinson
Stars: John Mills, Dorothy McGuire, James MacArthur, Janet Munro
Description: A Swiss family must survive being shipwrecked on a deserted island.

Name: Hold That Ghost
Stars: Bud Abbott, Lou Costello, Richard Carlson, Joan Davis
Description: After inheriting a fortune from a gangster, two dim-witted service station attendants find themselves stranded in a haunted house.

Name: Mister 880
Stars: Burt Lancaster, Edmund Gwenn, Dorothy McGuire, Millard Mitchell
Description: Gentle romantic comedy about a Secret Service Agent trying to catch a cold case counterfeiter and a United Nations translator.

Name: Suddenly
Stars: Frank Sinatra, Sterling Hayden, James Gleason, Nancy Gates
Description: In the city of Suddenly, three gangsters trap the Benson family in their own house, on the top of a hill nearby the railroad station, with the intention of killing the president of the USA.

Name: Father of the Bride
Stars: Spencer Tracy, Joan Bennett, Elizabeth Taylor, Don Taylor
Description: The father of a young woman deals with the emotional pain of her getting married, along with the financial and organizational trouble of arranging the wedding.

Name: Võ Sĩ
Stars: Mickey Rourke, Marisa Tomei, Evan Rachel Wood, Mark Margolis
Description: A faded professional wrestler must retire, but finds his quest for a new life outside the ring a dispiriting struggle.

Name: Hobson's Choice
Stars: Charles Laughton, John Mills, Brenda de Banzie, Daphne Anderson
Description: Widower Henry Hobson refuses to let his three daughters get married because he doesn't want to pay settlements, so they'll just have to outsmart him.

Name: Cảnh Sát Trưởng Da Đen
Stars: Cleavon Little, Gene Wilder, Slim Pickens, Harvey Korman
Description: In order to ruin a western town, a corrupt politician appoints a black Sheriff, who promptly becomes his most formidable adversary.

Name: Bud Abbott and Lou Costello Meet Frankenstein
Stars: Walter Lantz, Bud Abbott, Lou Costello, Lon Chaney Jr., Bela Lugosi
Description: The Wolf Man tries to warn a dimwitted porter that Dracula wants his brain for Frankenstein monster's body.

Name: Sweetwater
Stars: Noah Miller, Ed Harris, January Jones, Jason Isaacs, Eduardo Noriega
Description: In the late 1800s, a fanatical religious leader, a renegade Sheriff, and a former prostitute collide in a blood triangle on the rugged plains of the New Mexico Territory.

Name: Dòng Sông Mãnh Liệt
Stars: Gene Hackman, Willem Dafoe, Frances McDormand, Brad Dourif
Description: Two F.B.I. Agents with wildly different styles arrive in Mississippi to investigate the disappearance of some civil rights activists.

Name: Alice Doesn't Live Here Anymore
Stars: Ellen Burstyn, Kris Kristofferson, Mia Bendixsen, Alfred Lutter III
Description: A recently widowed woman is on the road with her precocious young son, determined to make a new life for herself as a singer.

Name: Căn Phòng Khủng Khiếp
Stars: Jodie Foster, Kristen Stewart, Forest Whitaker, Dwight Yoakam
Description: A divorced woman and her diabetic daughter take refuge in their newly-purchased house's safe room when three men break-in, searching for a missing fortune.

Name: Thieves Like Us
Stars: Keith Carradine, Shelley Duvall, John Schuck, Bert Remsen
Description: When two men break out of prison, they join up with another and restart their criminal ways, robbing banks across the South.

Name: Giấc Mơ Danh Vọng
Stars: Beyoncé, Jamie Foxx, Eddie Murphy, Danny Glover
Description: A trio of black female soul singers cross over to the pop charts in the early 1960s, facing their own personal struggles along the way.

Name: Quills
Stars: Geoffrey Rush, Kate Winslet, Joaquin Phoenix, Michael Caine
Description: In a Napoleonic era insane asylum, an inmate, the irrepressible Marquis De Sade, fights a battle of wills against a tyrannically prudish doctor.

Name: Màu tía
Stars: Danny Glover, Whoopi Goldberg, Oprah Winfrey, Margaret Avery
Description: A black Southern woman struggles to find her identity after suffering abuse from her father and others over four decades.

Name: Cuộc Đời Gandhi
Stars: Ben Kingsley, John Gielgud, Rohini Hattangadi, Roshan Seth
Description: The life of the lawyer who became the famed leader of the Indian revolts against the British rule through his philosophy of nonviolent protest.

Name: Kinh Doanh Mạo Hiểm
Stars: Tom Cruise, Rebecca De Mornay, Joe Pantoliano, Richard Masur
Description: A Chicago teenager is looking for fun at home while his parents are away, but the situation quickly gets out of hand.

Name: Những Người Vui Tính
Stars: Adam Sandler, Seth Rogen, Leslie Mann, Eric Bana
Description: When seasoned comedian George Simmons learns of his terminal, inoperable health condition, his desire to form a genuine friendship causes him to take a relatively green performer under his wing as his opening act.

Name: Far from Heaven
Stars: Julianne Moore, Dennis Quaid, Dennis Haysbert, Patricia Clarkson
Description: In 1950s Connecticut, a flustered housewife faces a marital crisis and mounting racial tensions in the outside world.

Name: Màu sắc chính trị
Stars: John Travolta, Emma Thompson, Kathy Bates, Larry Hagman
Description: A man joins the political campaign of a smooth-operator candidate for President of the U.S.

Name: Anna Karenina
Stars: Greta Garbo, Fredric March, Freddie Bartholomew, Maureen O'Sullivan
Description: The married Anna Karenina falls in love with Count Vronsky despite her husband's refusal to grant a divorce, and both must contend with the social repercussions.

Name: The Debt
Stars: Helen Mirren, Sam Worthington, Tom Wilkinson, Jessica Chastain
Description: In 1965, three Mossad Agents cross into East Berlin to apprehend a notorious Nazi war criminal. Thirty years later, the secrets the Agents share come back to haunt them.

Name: Suddenly, Last Summer
Stars: Elizabeth Taylor, Katharine Hepburn, Montgomery Clift, Albert Dekker
Description: A surgeon is assigned the case of a young woman whose aunt wants her lobotomized to cover up a family secret.

Name: Phơi Bày Sự Thật
Stars: Elijah Wood, Eugene Hutz, Boris Lyoskin, Jonathan Safran Foer
Description: A young Jewish American man, with the help of an eccentric local, endeavors to find the woman who saved his grandfather during World War II in a Ukrainian village that was ultimately razed by the Nazis.

Name: Arthur
Stars: Dudley Moore, Liza Minnelli, John Gielgud, Geraldine Fitzgerald
Description: Alcoholic billionaire playboy Arthur Bach must marry a woman he does not love, or he will be cut off from his $750,000,000 fortune. But when Arthur falls in love with a poor waitress, he must decide if he wants to choose love or money.

Name: Sức Mạnh Vô Hình
Stars: Dane DeHaan, Alex Russell, Michael B. Jordan, Michael Kelly
Description: Three high school friends gain superpowers after making an incredible discovery underground. Soon they find their lives spinning out of control and their bond tested as they embrace their darker sides.

Name: Ba Chàng Ngự Lâm
Stars: Zach Galifianakis, Bradley Cooper, Justin Bartha, Ed Helms
Description: Three buddies wake up from a bachelor party in Las Vegas, with no memory of the previous night and the bachelor missing. They make their way around the city in order to find their friend before his wedding.

Name: Scrooged
Stars: Bill Murray, Karen Allen, John Forsythe, John Glover
Description: A selfish, cynical television executive is haunted by three spirits bearing lessons on Christmas Eve.

Name: Người Dơi Xuất Hiện
Stars: Christian Bale, Michael Caine, Ken Watanabe, Liam Neeson
Description: After witnessing his parents' death, Bruce learns the art of fighting to confront injustice. When he returns to Gotham as Batman, he must stop a secret society that intends to destroy the city.

Name: Điệp Vụ Kép
Stars: Denzel Washington, Clive Owen, Jodie Foster, Christopher Plummer
Description: A police detective, a bank robber, and a high-power broker enter high-stakes negotiations after the criminal's brilliant heist spirals into a hostage situation.

Name: Clue
Stars: Eileen Brennan, Tim Curry, Madeline Kahn, Christopher Lloyd
Description: Six guests are anonymously invited to a strange mansion for dinner, but after their host is killed, they must cooperate with the staff to identify the murderer as the bodies pile up.

Name: Chiến Dịch Tranh Cử Tổng Thống
Stars: Paul Giamatti, George Clooney, Philip Seymour Hoffman, Ryan Gosling
Description: An idealistic staffer for a new presidential candidate gets a crash course on dirty politics during his stint on the campaign trail.

Name: Pleasantville
Stars: Tobey Maguire, Jeff Daniels, Joan Allen, William H. Macy
Description: Two 1990s teenage siblings find themselves transported to a 1950s sitcom where their influence begins to profoundly change that colorless, complacent world.

Name: Dazed and Confused
Stars: Jason London, Wiley Wiggins, Matthew McConaughey, Rory Cochrane
Description: The adventures of high school and junior high students on the last day of school in May 1976.

Name: Harry and Tonto
Stars: Art Carney, Ellen Burstyn, René Enríquez, Herbert Berghof
Description: When his apartment building is torn down, a retired lifelong New Yorker goes on a cross-country odyssey with his beloved cat Tonto.

Name: Sinh Ngày 4 Tháng 7
Stars: Oliver Stone, Tom Cruise, Bryan Larkin, Raymond J. Barry, Caroline Kava
Description: The biography of Ron Kovic. Paralyzed in the Vietnam war, he becomes an anti-war and pro-human rights political activist after feeling betrayed by the country for which he fought.

Name: Bộ Phim Thứ 9
Stars: Daniel Day-Lewis, Marion Cotillard, Penélope Cruz, Sandro Dori
Description: Famous film director Guido Contini struggles to find harmony in his professional and personal lives, as he engages in dramatic relationships with his wife, his mistress, his muse, his agent, and his mother.

Name: Thế Giới Côn Trùng
Stars: Andrew Stanton, Kevin Spacey, David Foley, Julia Louis-Dreyfus, Hayden Panettiere
Description: A misfit ant, looking for "warriors" to save his colony from greedy grasshoppers, recruits a group of bugs that turn out to be an inept circus troupe.

Name: Khủng Bố Munich
Stars: Eric Bana, Daniel Craig, Marie-Josée Croze, Ciarán Hinds
Description: After the Black September capture and massacre of Israeli athletes at the 1972 Olympics, five men are chosen to eliminate the people responsible for that fateful day.

Name: Ông Già Noel Xấu Tính
Stars: Billy Bob Thornton, Bernie Mac, Lauren Graham, John Ritter
Description: A miserable conman and his partner pose as Santa and his Little Helper to rob department stores on Christmas Eve. But they run into problems when the conman befriends a troubled kid.

Name: Save the Tiger
Stars: Jack Lemmon, Jack Gilford, Laurie Heineman, Norman Burton
Description: A disillusioned war veteran has two days to let go of his shaken morals if he wants his small fashion company to survive.

Name: Husbands
Stars: Ben Gazzara, Peter Falk, John Cassavetes, Jenny Runacre
Description: After the death of a common friend, three married men leave their lives together, seeking pleasure and freedom and ultimately leaving for London.

Name: Tom Jones
Stars: Albert Finney, Susannah York, George Devine, Rachel Kempson
Description: The romantic and chivalrous adventures of adopted bastard Tom Jones in 18th-century England.

Name: The Meaning of Life
Stars: John Cleese, Terry Gilliam, Eric Idle, Terry Jones
Description: The comedy team takes a look at life in all of its stages in their own uniquely silly way.

Name: Andy Hardy's Private Secretary
Stars: Lewis Stone, Mickey Rooney, Fay Holden, Ann Rutherford
Description: Andy is all set to graduate from high school when he flunks his English exam--despite the fact that the Judge went through the trouble of getting him his very own private secretary.

Name: Người Dơi Bất Tử
Stars: Val Kilmer, Tommy Lee Jones, Jim Carrey, Nicole Kidman
Description: Batman must battle former district attorney Harvey Dent, who is now Two-Face and Edward Nygma, The Riddler with help from an amorous psychologist and a young circus acrobat who becomes his sidekick, Robin.

Name: Sát Thủ Tự Do
Stars: Robert De Niro, Jean Reno, Natascha McElhone, Stellan Skarsgård
Description: A freelancing former U.S. Intelligence Agent tries to track down a mysterious package that is wanted by the Irish and the Russians.

Name: Uncle Buck
Stars: John Candy, Macaulay Culkin, Jean Louisa Kelly, Gaby Hoffmann
Description: Laid back commitment-phobe Buck babysits his brother's rebellious teenage daughter and her cute younger brother and sister.

Name: Hình Hài Dấu Yêu
Stars: Rachel Weisz, Mark Wahlberg, Saoirse Ronan, Susan Sarandon
Description: Centers on a young girl who has been murdered and watches over her family - and her killer - from purgatory. She must weigh her desire for vengeance against her desire for her family to heal.

Name: Shakespeare Đang Yêu
Stars: John Madden, Gwyneth Paltrow, Joseph Fiennes, Geoffrey Rush, Tom Wilkinson
Description: The world's greatest ever playwright, William Shakespeare, is young, out of ideas and short of cash, but meets his ideal woman and is inspired to write one of his most famous plays.

Name: Gods and Monsters
Stars: Bill Condon, Ian McKellen, Brendan Fraser, Lynn Redgrave, Lolita Davidovich
Description: The last days of Frankenstein (1931) director James Whale are explored.

Name: Trong Tầm Lửa Đạn
Stars: Clint Eastwood, John Malkovich, Rene Russo, Dylan McDermott
Description: Secret Service agent Frank Horrigan couldn't save Kennedy, but he's determined not to let a clever assassin take out this president.

Name: Lạc Lối Ở Tokyo
Stars: Bill Murray, Scarlett Johansson, Giovanni Ribisi, Anna Faris
Description: A faded movie star and a neglected young woman form an unlikely bond after crossing paths in Tokyo.

Name: Đêm Kinh Hoàng Trước Giáng Sinh
Stars: Danny Elfman, Chris Sarandon, Catherine O'Hara, William Hickey
Description: Jack Skellington, king of Halloween Town, discovers Christmas Town, but his attempts to bring Christmas to his home causes confusion.

Name: After Hours
Stars: Griffin Dunne, Rosanna Arquette, Verna Bloom, Tommy Chong
Description: An ordinary word processor has the worst night of his life after he agrees to visit a girl in Soho he met that evening at a coffee shop.

Name: Gettysburg
Stars: Tom Berenger, Martin Sheen, Stephen Lang, Richard Jordan
Description: In 1863, the Northern and Southern forces fight at Gettysburg in the decisive battle of the American Civil War.

Name: Bản Tango Cuối Cùng Ở Paris
Stars: Marlon Brando, Maria Schneider, Maria Michi, Giovanna Galletti
Description: A young Parisian woman meets a middle-aged American businessman who demands their clandestine relationship be based only on sex.

Name: Quá Khứ Tội Ác
Stars: Viggo Mortensen, Maria Bello, Ed Harris, William Hurt
Description: A mild-mannered man becomes a local hero through an act of violence, which sets off repercussions that will shake his family to its very core.

Name: The Rocky Horror Picture Show
Stars: Tim Curry, Susan Sarandon, Barry Bostwick, Richard O'Brien
Description: A newly-engaged couple have a breakdown in an isolated area and must seek shelter at the bizarre residence of Dr. Frank-n-Furter.

Name: Kẻ Hủy Diệt
Stars: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Linda Hamilton, Michael Biehn, Paul Winfield
Description: A human soldier is sent from 2029 to 1984 to stop an almost indestructible cyborg killing machine, sent from the same year, which has been programmed to execute a young woman whose unborn son is the key to humanity's future salvation.

Name: Julius Caesar
Stars: Louis Calhern, Marlon Brando, James Mason, John Gielgud
Description: The growing ambition of Julius Caesar is a source of major concern to his close friend Brutus. Cassius persuades him to participate in his plot to assassinate Caesar but they have both sorely underestimated Mark Antony.

Name: Robin Hood
Stars: David Hand, Brian Bedford, Phil Harris, Roger Miller, Peter Ustinov
Description: The story of the legendary British outlaw portrayed with the characters as anthropomorphic animals.

Name: The Cocoanuts
Stars: Robert Florey, Joseph Santley, Groucho Marx, Harpo Marx, Chico Marx, Zeppo Marx
Description: During the Florida land boom, The Marx Brothers run a hotel, auction off some land, thwart a jewel robbery, and generally act like themselves.

Name: Siêu Điệp Viên 2: Quyền Lực Của Bourne
Stars: Matt Damon, Franka Potente, Joan Allen, Brian Cox
Description: When Jason Bourne is framed for a CIA operation gone awry, he is forced to resume his former life as a trained assassin to survive.

Name: Life
Stars: Eddie Murphy, Martin Lawrence, Obba Babatundé, Nick Cassavetes
Description: In 1932, two strangers are wrongfully convicted and develop a strong friendship in prison that lasts them through the 20th century.

Name: Blonde Venus
Stars: Marlene Dietrich, Cary Grant, Herbert Marshall, Dickie Moore
Description: A cabaret singer takes up with a millionaire to pay for her gravely-ill husband's operation.

Name: Kẻ Thù Quốc Gia
Stars: Christian Bale, Johnny Depp, Christian Stolte, Jason Clarke
Description: The Feds try to take down notorious American gangsters John Dillinger, Baby Face Nelson, and Pretty Boy Floyd during a booming crime wave in the 1930s.

Name: Ánh Trăng Độc Ác
Stars: Cher, Nicolas Cage, Olympia Dukakis, Danny Aiello
Description: Loretta Castorini, a bookkeeper from Brooklyn, New York, finds herself in a difficult situation when she falls for the brother of the man she has agreed to marry.

Name: Young and Innocent
Stars: Nova Pilbeam, Derrick De Marney, Percy Marmont, Edward Rigby
Description: A man on the run from a murder charge enlists a beautiful stranger who must put herself at risk for his cause.

Name: Capote
Stars: Bennett Miller, Philip Seymour Hoffman, Clifton Collins Jr., Catherine Keener, Allie Mickelson
Description: In 1959, Truman Capote learns of the murder of a Kansas family and decides to write a book about the case. While researching for his novel In Cold Blood, Capote forms a relationship with one of the killers, Perry Smith, who is on death row.

Name: Mãi Đừng Xa Em
Stars: Keira Knightley, Carey Mulligan, Andrew Garfield, Izzy Meikle-Small
Description: The lives of three friends, from their early school days into young adulthood, when the reality of the world they live in comes knocking.

Name: Ngày Tận Thế
Stars: Bruce Willis, Billy Bob Thornton, Ben Affleck, Liv Tyler
Description: After discovering that an asteroid the size of Texas will impact Earth in less than a month, NASA recruits a misfit team of deep-core drillers to save the planet.

Name: Trò Chơi Nước Mắt
Stars: Stephen Rea, Jaye Davidson, Forest Whitaker, Miranda Richardson
Description: A British soldier kidnapped by the IRA soon befriends one of his captors, who then becomes drawn into the soldier's world.

Name: Radio Days
Stars: Mia Farrow, Dianne Wiest, Mike Starr, Paul Herman
Description: A nostalgic look at radio's golden age focusing on one ordinary family and the various performers in the medium.

Name: Bell Book and Candle
Stars: James Stewart, Kim Novak, Jack Lemmon, Ernie Kovacs
Description: A modern-day witch likes her neighbor but despises his fiancée, so she enchants him to love her instead.

Name: Tinh Anh Em
Stars: John Belushi, Dan Aykroyd, Cab Calloway, John Candy
Description: Jake Blues rejoins with his brother Elwood after being released from prison, but the duo has just days to reunite their old R&B band and save the Catholic home where the two were raised, outrunning the police as they tear through Chicago.

Name: Diner
Stars: Steve Guttenberg, Mickey Rourke, Kevin Bacon, Daniel Stern
Description: A group of college-age buddies struggle with their imminent passage into adulthood in 1959 Baltimore.

Name: Adam's Rib
Stars: Spencer Tracy, Katharine Hepburn, Judy Holliday, Tom Ewell
Description: Domestic and professional tensions mount when a husband and wife work as opposing lawyers in a case involving a woman who shot her husband.

Name: Quý Ngài Hai Mặt
Stars: Peter Farrelly, Jim Carrey, Renée Zellweger, Anthony Anderson, Mongo Brownlee
Description: A nice-guy cop with Dissociative Identity Disorder must protect a woman on the run from a corrupt ex-boyfriend and his associates.

Name: Trở Về Tương Lai Phần 3
Stars: Michael J. Fox, Christopher Lloyd, Mary Steenburgen, Tom Wilson
Description: Stranded in 1955, Marty McFly learns about the death of Doc Brown in 1885 and must travel back in time to save him. With no fuel readily available for the DeLorean, the two must figure how to escape the Old West before Emmett is murdered.

Name: Mogambo
Stars: Clark Gable, Grace Kelly, Ava Gardner, Donald Sinden
Description: On a Kenyan safari, white hunter Victor Marswell has a love triangle with seductive American socialite Eloise Kelly and anthropologist Donald Nordley's cheating wife Linda.

Name: Ba Lần Chôn Cất
Stars: Tommy Lee Jones, Barry Pepper, Dwight Yoakam, January Jones
Description: Ranch foreman Pete Perkins looks to fulfill the promise to his recently deceased best friend by burying him in his hometown in Mexico.

Name: Bàn Chân Trái Của Tôi
Stars: Jim Sheridan, Daniel Day-Lewis, Brenda Fricker, Alison Whelan, Kirsten Sheridan
Description: Christy Brown, born with cerebral palsy, learns to paint and write with his only controllable limb - his left foot.

Name: China Seas
Stars: Clark Gable, Jean Harlow, Wallace Beery, Lewis Stone
Description: When earthy Dolly Portland is rejected by Captain Gaskell in favor of a socialite, she aids Jamesy McCardle, in league with Malay pirates, in his plot to seize Gaskell's ship.

Name: Phi Trường
Stars: Tom Hanks, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Chi McBride, Stanley Tucci
Description: An Eastern European tourist unexpectedly finds himself stranded in JFK airport, and must take up temporary residence there.

Name: Manhattan Melodrama
Stars: Jack Conway, George Cukor, Clark Gable, William Powell, Myrna Loy, Leo Carrillo
Description: The friendship between two orphans endures even though they grow up on opposite sides of the law and fall in love with the same woman.

Name: Marked Woman
Stars: Michael Curtiz, Bette Davis, Humphrey Bogart, Lola Lane, Isabel Jewell
Description: A crusading district attorney persuades a clip joint hostess to testify against her mobster boss after her innocent sister is accidentally murdered during one of his unsavory parties.

Name: Family Plot
Stars: Karen Black, Bruce Dern, Barbara Harris, William Devane
Description: A phony psychic/con artist and her taxi driver/actor boyfriend encounter a pair of serial kidnappers while trailing a missing heir in California.

Name: Giáo Lý
Stars: Ben Affleck, Matt Damon, Linda Fiorentino, Bud Cort
Description: An abortion clinic worker with a special heritage is called upon to save the existence of humanity from being negated by two renegade angels trying to exploit a loop-hole and reenter Heaven.

Name: Ở Nhà Một Mình 2: Lạc Ở New York
Stars: Macaulay Culkin, Joe Pesci, Daniel Stern, Catherine O'Hara
Description: One year after Kevin McCallister was left home alone and had to defeat a pair of bumbling burglars, he accidentally finds himself stranded in New York City - and the same criminals are not far behind.

Name: Hủy Sau Khi Đọc
Stars: Joel Coen, Brad Pitt, Frances McDormand, George Clooney, John Malkovich
Description: A disk containing mysterious information from a CIA agent ends up in the hands of two unscrupulous and daft gym employees who attempt to sell it.

Name: Chaplin
Stars: Robert Downey Jr., Geraldine Chaplin, Paul Rhys, John Thaw
Description: An elderly Charlie Chaplin discusses his autobiography with his editor, recounting his amazing journey from his poverty-stricken childhood to world-wide success after the ingenious invention of the Little Tramp.

Name: The Candidate
Stars: Robert Redford, Peter Boyle, Melvyn Douglas, Don Porter
Description: Bill McKay is a candidate for the U.S. Senate from California. He has no hope of winning, so he is willing to tweak the establishment.

Name: The Pride of the Yankees
Stars: Sam Wood, Gary Cooper, Teresa Wright, Babe Ruth, Walter Brennan
Description: The story of the life and career of famed baseball player Lou Gehrig.

Name: Bảy Tay Súng Huyền Thoại
Stars: Yul Brynner, Steve McQueen, Charles Bronson, Eli Wallach
Description: Seven gunfighters are hired by Mexican peasants to liberate their village from oppressive bandits.

Name: College
Stars: Buster Keaton, Buster Keaton, Anne Cornwall, Flora Bramley, Harold Goodwin
Description: Ronald's high-school valedictory address praises books and condemns sports. His girlfriend Mary condemns his attitude. Fearing to lose her to rival Jeff, he decides to go to college and pay more attentions to sports.

Name: Câu Chuyện Tình Yêu
Stars: Ali MacGraw, Ryan O'Neal, John Marley, Ray Milland
Description: A boy and a girl from different backgrounds fall in love regardless of their upbringing - and then tragedy strikes.

Name: Chàng Tommy
Stars: Chris Farley, David Spade, Brian Dennehy, Bo Derek
Description: After his auto-parts tycoon father dies, the overweight, underachieving son teams up with a snide accountant to try and save the family business.

Name: I Heart Huckabees
Stars: Jason Schwartzman, Jude Law, Naomi Watts, Mark Wahlberg
Description: A husband-and-wife team play detective, but not in the traditional sense. Instead, the happy duo helps others solve their existential issues, the kind that keep you up at night, wondering what it all means.

Name: Sweet Bird of Youth
Stars: Paul Newman, Geraldine Page, Shirley Knight, Ed Begley
Description: A drifter and a faded film star, both traumatized by Hollywood, arrive to the guy's hometown, where the old bitter memories revive again.

Name: Quái Vật Biến Hình
Stars: Kurt Russell, Wilford Brimley, Keith David, Richard Masur
Description: A research team in Antarctica is hunted by a shape-shifting alien that assumes the appearance of its victims.

Name: 13 Tên Cướp Thế Kỷ
Stars: George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Matt Damon, Michael Mantell
Description: Danny Ocean rounds up the boys for a third heist after casino owner Willy Bank double-crosses one of the original eleven, Reuben Tishkoff.

Name: Separate Tables
Stars: Rita Hayworth, Deborah Kerr, David Niven, Burt Lancaster
Description: The stories of several people are told as they stay at a seaside hotel in Bournemouth which features dining at "Separate Tables."

Name: Casualties of War
Stars: Michael J. Fox, Sean Penn, Don Harvey, John C. Reilly
Description: During the Vietnam War, a soldier finds himself the outsider of his own squad when they unnecessarily kidnap a female villager.

Name: Hợp Đồng Hôn Nhân
Stars: Ethan Coen, George Clooney, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Billy Bob Thornton, Geoffrey Rush
Description: A beautiful gold digger matches wits with a shrewd Beverly Hills divorce lawyer who is increasingly attracted to her.

Name: Công Ty
Stars: Tom Cruise, Jeanne Tripplehorn, Gene Hackman, Hal Holbrook
Description: A young lawyer joins a prestigious law firm only to discover that it has a sinister dark side.

Name: Người Dơi Trở Lại
Stars: Michael Keaton, Danny DeVito, Michelle Pfeiffer, Christopher Walken
Description: While Batman deals with a deformed man calling himself the Penguin wreaking havoc across Gotham with the help of a cruel businessman, a female employee of the latter becomes the Catwoman with her own vendetta.

Name: All of Me
Stars: Steve Martin, Lily Tomlin, Victoria Tennant, Madolyn Smith Osborne
Description: A dying millionaire has her soul transferred into a younger, willing woman. However, something goes wrong, and she finds herself in her lawyer's body - together with the lawyer.

Name: Firecreek
Stars: James Stewart, Henry Fonda, Inger Stevens, Gary Lockwood
Description: A peace-loving, part-time Sheriff in the small town of Firecreek must take a stand when a gang of vicious outlaws takes over his town.

Name: The Darjeeling Limited
Stars: Owen Wilson, Adrien Brody, Jason Schwartzman, Amara Karan
Description: A year after their father's funeral, three brothers travel across India by train in an attempt to bond with each other.

Name: Royal Wedding
Stars: Fred Astaire, Jane Powell, Peter Lawford, Sarah Churchill
Description: A brother and sister dance act encounter challenges and romance when booked in London during the Royal Wedding.

Name: Hàng Xóm Của Tôi Là Totoro
Stars: Hitoshi Takagi, Noriko Hidaka, Chika Sakamoto, Shigesato Itoi
Description: When two girls move to the country to be near their ailing mother, they have adventures with the wondrous forest spirits who live nearby.

Name: Trapeze
Stars: Burt Lancaster, Tony Curtis, Gina Lollobrigida, Katy Jurado
Description: A crippled circus acrobat is torn emotionally between two ambitious young trapeze artists, one a talented young American and a less-gifted but beautiful Italian.

Name: The Prince and the Showgirl
Stars: Marilyn Monroe, Laurence Olivier, Richard Wattis, David Horne
Description: An American showgirl becomes entangled in political intrigue when the Prince Regent of a foreign country attempts to seduce her.

Name: Giới Hạn
Stars: Lilly Wachowski, Jennifer Tilly, Gina Gershon, Joe Pantoliano, John P. Ryan
Description: Tough ex-con Corky and her lover Violet concoct a scheme to steal millions of stashed mob money and pin the blame on Violet's crooked boyfriend Caesar.

Name: Don't Bother to Knock
Stars: Richard Widmark, Marilyn Monroe, Anne Bancroft, Donna Corcoran
Description: After being dumped by his girlfriend, an airline pilot pursues a babysitter in his hotel and gradually realizes she's dangerous.

Name: Tình Yêu Tìm Lại
Stars: Bradley Cooper, Jennifer Lawrence, Robert De Niro, Jacki Weaver
Description: After a stint in a mental institution, former teacher Pat Solitano moves back in with his parents and tries to reconcile with his ex-wife. Things get more challenging when Pat meets Tiffany, a mysterious girl with problems of her own.

Name: Interiors
Stars: Diane Keaton, Geraldine Page, Kristin Griffith, Mary Beth Hurt
Description: Three sisters find their lives spinning out of control in the wake of their parents' sudden, unexpected divorce.

Name: To Sir, with Love
Stars: Sidney Poitier, Judy Geeson, Christian Roberts, Suzy Kendall
Description: Idealistic engineer-trainee and his experiences in teaching a group of rambunctious white high school students from the slums of London's East End.

Name: The Three Faces of Eve
Stars: Joanne Woodward, David Wayne, Lee J. Cobb, Edwin Jerome
Description: A doctor treats a woman suffering from Multiple Personality Disorder.

Name: Chasing Amy
Stars: Ben Affleck, Joey Lauren Adams, Ethan Suplee, Scott Mosier
Description: Holden and Banky are comic book artists. Everything's going good for them until they meet Alyssa, also a comic book artist. Holden falls for her, but his hopes are crushed when he finds out she's a lesbian.

Name: Suspicion
Stars: Cary Grant, Joan Fontaine, Cedric Hardwicke, Nigel Bruce
Description: A shy young heiress marries a charming gentleman, and soon begins to suspect he is planning to murder her.

Name: Blackmail
Stars: Anny Ondra, John Longden, Sara Allgood, Charles Paton
Description: After killing a man in self-defense, a young woman is blackmailed by a witness to the killing.

Name: Người Đến Từ Quá Khứ
Stars: Brendan Fraser, Alicia Silverstone, Christopher Walken, Sissy Spacek
Description: A naive man comes out into the world after spending 35 years in a nuclear fallout shelter.

Name: The Tender Trap
Stars: Frank Sinatra, Debbie Reynolds, David Wayne, Celeste Holm
Description: Successful theater agent Charlie Reader lives a playboy's life in New York City. When his childhood friend shows up with a desire to leave his wife, the two are awestruck by each other's lifestyle.

Name: Cảm Ơn Vì Hút Thuốc
Stars: Aaron Eckhart, Cameron Bright, Maria Bello, Joan Lunden
Description: Satirical comedy follows the machinations of Big Tobacco's chief spokesman, Nick Naylor, who spins on behalf of cigarettes while trying to remain a role model for his 12-year old son.

Name: San Francisco
Stars: Clark Gable, Jeanette MacDonald, Spencer Tracy, Jack Holt
Description: A Barbary Coast saloonkeeper and a Nob Hill impresario are rivals for the affections of a beautiful singer, both personally and professionally, in 1906 San Francisco.

Name: Tình Yêu Ban Chiều
Stars: Gary Cooper, Audrey Hepburn, Maurice Chevalier, John McGiver
Description: A middle-aged playboy becomes fascinated by the daughter of a private detective who has been hired to entrap him with the wife of a client.

Name: Đường Tới Vinh Quang
Stars: Kirk Douglas, Ralph Meeker, Adolphe Menjou, George Macready
Description: After refusing to attack an enemy position, a general accuses the soldiers of cowardice and their commanding officer must defend them.

Name: Gia Đình Thiên Tài
Stars: Gene Hackman, Gwyneth Paltrow, Anjelica Huston, Ben Stiller
Description: The eccentric members of a dysfunctional family reluctantly gather under the same roof for various reasons.

Name: Con Đường Tình Dục
Stars: Breckin Meyer, Seann William Scott, Amy Smart, Paulo Costanzo
Description: Four college buddies embark on a road trip to retrieve an illicit tape mistakenly mailed to a female friend.

Name: Jezebel
Stars: Bette Davis, Henry Fonda, George Brent, Margaret Lindsay
Description: In 1850s Louisiana, a free-spirited Southern belle loses her fiancé due to her stubborn vanity and pride, and vows to win him back.

Name: The Family Jewels
Stars: Jerry Lewis, Sebastian Cabot, Neil Hamilton, Jay Adler
Description: A young heiress must choose among six uncles, one of whom is up to no good and out to harm the girl's beloved bodyguard who practically raised her.

Name: Phi Công Siêu Đẳng
Stars: Tom Cruise, Tim Robbins, Kelly McGillis, Val Kilmer
Description: As students at the United States Navy's elite fighter weapons school compete to be best in the class, one daring young pilot learns a few things from a civilian instructor that are not taught in the classroom.

Name: The Facts of Life
Stars: Bob Hope, Lucille Ball, Ruth Hussey, Don DeFore
Description: Sophisticated comedy with Larry and Kitty leaving their spouses for an interlude together.

Name: Sụp Đổ
Stars: Michael Douglas, Robert Duvall, Barbara Hershey, Rachel Ticotin
Description: An ordinary man frustrated with the various flaws he sees in society begins to psychotically and violently lash out against them.

Name: The Sand Pebbles
Stars: Steve McQueen, Richard Attenborough, Richard Crenna, Candice Bergen
Description: In 1926, a U.S. Naval engineer gets assigned to a gunboat on a rescue mission in war-torn China.

Name: Boyz n the Hood
Stars: Cuba Gooding Jr., Laurence Fishburne, Hudhail Al-Amir, Lloyd Avery II
Description: Follows the lives of three young males living in the Crenshaw ghetto of Los Angeles, dissecting questions of race, relationships, violence, and future prospects.

Name: Treo Cổ Chúng Lên
Stars: Clint Eastwood, Inger Stevens, Pat Hingle, Ed Begley
Description: When an innocent man barely survives a lynching, he returns as a lawman determined to bring the vigilantes to justice.

Name: Kẻ Lừa Đảo
Stars: Nicolas Cage, Alison Lohman, Sam Rockwell, Bruce Altman
Description: A phobic con artist and his protégé are on the verge of pulling off a lucrative swindle when the former's teenage daughter arrives unexpectedly.

Name: Grumpy Old Men
Stars: Jack Lemmon, Walter Matthau, Ann-Margret, Burgess Meredith
Description: A lifelong feud between two neighbors since childhood only gets worse when a new female neighbor moves across the street.

Name: Casino Royale
Stars: Ken Hughes, John Huston, Joseph McGrath, Robert Parrish, Richard Talmadge, David Niven, Peter Sellers, Ursula Andress, Orson Welles
Description: In an early spy spoof, aging Sir James Bond comes out of retirement to take on SMERSH.

Name: Escape from New York
Stars: Kurt Russell, Lee Van Cleef, Ernest Borgnine, Donald Pleasence
Description: In 1997, when the U.S. president crashes into Manhattan, now a giant maximum security prison, a convicted bank robber is sent in to rescue him.

Name: Honey, I Shrunk the Kids
Stars: Rick Moranis, Matt Frewer, Marcia Strassman, Kristine Sutherland
Description: The scientist father of a teenage girl and boy accidentally shrinks his and two other neighborhood teens to the size of insects. Now the teens must fight diminutive dangers as the father searches for them.

Name: Kẻ Đánh Cắp Giáng Sinh
Stars: Jim Carrey, Taylor Momsen, Kelley, Jeffrey Tambor
Description: On the outskirts of Whoville lives a green, revenge-seeking Grinch who plans to ruin Christmas for all of the citizens of the town.

Name: Đám Cưới Của Rachel
Stars: Anne Hathaway, Rosemarie DeWitt, Debra Winger, Sebastian Stan
Description: A young woman who has been in and out of rehab for the past ten years returns home for the weekend for her sister's wedding.

Name: Guys and Dolls
Stars: Marlon Brando, Jean Simmons, Frank Sinatra, Vivian Blaine
Description: In New York, a gambler is challenged to take a cold female missionary to Havana, but they fall for each other, and the bet has a hidden motive to finance a crap game.

Name: Crimes of the Heart
Stars: Diane Keaton, Jessica Lange, Sissy Spacek, Sam Shepard
Description: Three southern sisters try to come to grips with the meaning of their mother's suicide.

Name: The Accused

Name: In the Bedroom
Stars: Tom Wilkinson, Sissy Spacek, Nick Stahl, Marisa Tomei
Description: A New England couple's college-aged son dates an older woman who has two small children and an unwelcome ex-husband.

Name: 2010: The Year We Make Contact

Name: Breaking Away

Name: 12 Tên Cướp Thế Kỷ

Name: Judge Hardy's Children

Name: Norma Rae

Name: The Wrong Man
Stars: Henry Fonda, Vera Miles, Anthony Quayle, Harold J. Stone

Name: Phố Quyến Rũ

Name: An Affair to Remember
Stars: Cary Grant, Deborah Kerr, Richard Denning, Neva Patterson

Name: Điệp Vụ Nữ Hoàng

Name: Mr. Blandings Builds His Dream House

Description: A man and his wife decide they can afford to have a house in the country built to their specifications. It's a lot more trouble than they think.

Name: X-Men: Thế Hệ Thứ Nhất

Name: Kiss Me Deadly

Name: Here Comes Mr. Jordan

Name: Bandits
Stars: Bruce Willis, Billy Bob Thornton, Cate Blanchett, Troy Garity

Name: The Scarlet Pimpernel

Name: Mật Mã Cá Kiếm

Name: Gia Đình Addams

Name: Xác Thịt Và Ác Quỷ

Name: Amour

Name: Hồ Sơ Một Điệp Viên

Name: The Devil's Disciple

Name: Kho Báu Quốc Gia

Name: Madeleine

Name: Magnum Force

Name: The Greatest Show on Earth

Name: Trước Ngày Đền Tội

Name: Wise Blood
Stars: Brad Dourif, John Huston, Dan Shor, Harry Dean Stanton

Name: Mũi Sợ Hãi
Stars: Robert De Niro, Nick Nolte, Jessica Lange, Juliette Lewis
Description: A convicted rapist, released from prison after serving a fourteen-year sentence, stalks the family of the lawyer who originally defended him.

Name: Những Tay Chuyên Nghiệp
Stars: Burt Lancaster, Lee Marvin, Robert Ryan, Woody Strode

Name: Joe Kidd
Stars: Clint Eastwood, Robert Duvall, John Saxon, Don Stroud
Description: An ex-bounty hunter reluctantly helps a wealthy landowner and his henchmen track down a Mexican revolutionary leader.

Name: Klute
Stars: Jane Fonda, Donald Sutherland, Charles Cioffi, Roy Scheider

Name: Vinh Quang

Name: Gambit

Name: Lý Trí Và Tình Cảm

Name: Number Seventeen
Stars: Leon M. Lion, Anne Grey, John Stuart, Donald Calthrop
Description: A gang of thieves gather at a safe house following a robbery, but a detective is on their trail.

Name: Chế Ngự Cuồng Nộ

Name: Giang Hồ Mê Điện Ảnh

Name: Cặp Bài Trùng

Name: Night Shift

Name: How to Steal a Million

Name: Câu Chuyện Tuổi Teen

Name: Mr. & Mrs. Smith

Name: Scarecrow

Name: Kim Cương Máu
Stars: Leonardo DiCaprio, Djimon Hounsou, Jennifer Connelly, Kagiso Kuypers

Name: Người Điệp Viên Tôi Yêu

Stars: William Daniels, Howard Da Silva, Ken Howard, Donald Madden

Name: Tiền Bi

Name: Vương Quốc Trăng Lên

Name: Go West

Name: The Lives of a Bengal Lancer

Name: A League of Their Own

Name: Bình Minh Đỏ

Name: Long Tranh Hổ Đấu

Name: Oan Hồn

Name: Man on the Moon
Stars: Milos Forman, Jim Carrey, Danny DeVito, Gerry Becker, Greyson Erik Pendry

Name: The Way We Were
Stars: Barbra Streisand, Robert Redford, Bradford Dillman, Lois Chiles

Name: The Last Detail

Name: Sweeney Todd: Gã thợ cạo ma quỷ trên phố Fleet

Name: Drums Along the Mohawk

Name: Cầu Thủ Xách Nước

Name: Tình Yêu Đến Từ Nước Nga

Name: Dị Nhân

Name: Chuyện Tình Nàng Jane Eyre

Description: A mousy governess who softens the heart of her employer soon discovers that he's hiding a terrible secret.

Name: Thanh Gươm Trong Đá

Name: Tìm Lại Ký Ức

Name: Night and Day
Stars: Michael Curtiz, Cary Grant, Alexis Smith, Monty Woolley, Ginny Simms

Name: Ngày Độc Lập

Name: Cơn Bão Kinh Hoàng
Stars: George Clooney, Mark Wahlberg, John C. Reilly, Diane Lane
Description: An unusually intense storm pattern catches some commercial fishermen unaware and puts them in mortal danger.

Name: Vị Vua Cuối Cùng Của Scotland

Name: Xin Chào Việt Nam

Name: Dumbo: Chú Voi Biết Bay

Description: Ridiculed because of his enormous ears, a young circus elephant is assisted by a mouse to achieve his full potential.

Name: Đội Bóng Phi Thường
Stars: Denzel Washington, Will Patton, Wood Harris, Ryan Hurst

Name: Trading Places
Stars: Eddie Murphy, Dan Aykroyd, Ralph Bellamy, Don Ameche
Description: A snobbish investor and a wily street con artist find their positions reversed as part of a bet by two callous millionaires.

Name: Chuyến Tàu Nô Lệ

Name: Con Đường Tôi Chọn

Description: When young Father O'Malley arrives at St. Dominic's, old Father Fitzgibbon doesn't think much of the church's newest member.

Name: Trở Lại Trường Học
Stars: Adam Sandler, Darren McGavin, Bridgette Wilson-Sampras, Bradley Whitford
Description: In order to inherit his fed up father's hotel empire, an immature and lazy man must repeat grades 1-12 all over again.

Name: A Guide for the Married Man

Description: A man gives his friend a series of lessons on how to cheat on his wife without being caught.

Name: The Millionairess
Stars: Sophia Loren, Peter Sellers, Alastair Sim, Vittorio De Sica
Description: A millionairess and a doctor cannot marry until they meet conditions set up by their respective parents.

Name: Joe Dirt
Stars: David Spade, Brittany Daniel, Dennis Miller, Adam Beach

Name: Đừng Nói Dối, Bố Ơi
Stars: Jim Carrey, Maura Tierney, Amanda Donohoe, Jennifer Tilly
Description: A pathological liar-lawyer finds his career turned upside down when he inexplicably cannot physically lie for 24 whole hours.

Name: Cactus Flower

Description: A dentist pretends to be married to avoid commitment, but when he falls for his girlfriend and proposes, he must recruit his lovelorn nurse to pose as his wife.

Name: How the West Was Won

Name: Người Hùng Thành Troy

Name: Người Sắt
Stars: Robert Downey Jr., Gwyneth Paltrow, Terrence Howard, Jeff Bridges

Name: Lũ Quỷ Nhỏ

Name: Ali
Stars: Michael Mann, Will Smith, Jamie Foxx, Jon Voight, Mario Van Peebles
Description: A biography of sports legend Muhammad Ali, focusing on his triumphs and controversies between 1964 and 1974.

Name: The Princess and the Pirate

Name: Dodsworth
Stars: Walter Huston, Ruth Chatterton, Paul Lukas, Mary Astor

Name: Đổ Vỡ

Description: Los Angeles citizens with vastly separate lives collide in interweaving stories of race, loss and redemption.

Name: Một Ngày Làm Thượng Đế

Name: The First Great Train Robbery

Description: England, 1850s. A master criminal aims to rob a train of a large sum of gold. Security is incredibly tight and the task seems an impossible one. However, he has a plan and just the right people to carry it out.

Name: Tột Cùng Sợ Hãi
Stars: Richard Gere, Laura Linney, Edward Norton, John Mahoney

Name: Tombstone
Stars: Kevin Jarre, Kurt Russell, Val Kilmer, Sam Elliott, Bill Paxton

Name: Say Anything...

Name: Vùng Đất Tiền Sử

Name: The Captain's Paradise

Description: The captain of a ferry boat between the restricted British colony in Gibraltar and Spanish Morocco has a woman of differing appeal and temperament in each port.

Name: Thế Giới Bên Kia

Name: Judge Hardy and Son

Name: Imitation of Life

Name: Cyrano de Bergerac

Name: Diều Hâu Gãy Cánh

Name: What Women Want

Name: Vạch Quân Hàm

Name: The Ring
Stars: Carl Brisson, Lillian Hall-Davis, Ian Hunter, Forrester Harvey

Name: Thế giới của Wayne

Name: Mystery, Alaska

Name: Người Tình Trong Mộng

Name: Deception

Name: Harper
Stars: Paul Newman, Lauren Bacall, Julie Harris, Arthur Hill

Name: I Was a Male War Bride

Name: On the Town

Name: Sự Trỗi Dậy Của Hành Tinh Khỉ

Name: Chớp Lấy Thời Cơ

Name: The General Died at Dawn

Name: Dick Tracy

Name: Taps

Name: Impact

Name: Nick of Time

Name: Nhà Ái Quốc

Name: Girl, Interrupted

Name: Cradle Will Rock

Name: Rat Race

Name: Gypsy

Name: Girlfight

Name: Cocoon

Name: The Out of Towners

Name: The Lonely Guy

Name: Đồn Apache

Name: Chuyến Tàu Vĩnh Biệt

Name: St. Elmo's Fire

Name: Walk on the Wild Side

Name: Cuộc Phiêu Lưu Của Hugo

Name: Swingers

Name: Tin Men

Name: Ghostbusters II

Description: The discovery of a massive river of ectoplasm and a resurgence of spectral activity allows the staff of Ghostbusters to revive the business.

Name: Less Than Zero

Name: Videodrome
