Name: Ca Sĩ Đám Cưới
Stars: Adam Sandler, Drew Barrymore, Christine Taylor, Allen Covert
Description: Robbie, a singer, and Julia, a waitress, are both engaged, but to the wrong people. Fortune intervenes to help them discover each other.

Name: Tàu Tốc Hành Bắc Cực
Stars: Tom Hanks, Chris Coppola, Michael Jeter, Leslie Zemeckis
Description: On Christmas Eve, a young boy embarks on a magical adventure to the North Pole on the Polar Express, while learning about friendship, bravery, and the spirit of Christmas.

Name: Quicksand
Stars: Mickey Rooney, Jeanne Cagney, Barbara Bates, Peter Lorre
Description: After taking 20 dollars from his employer to go on a date with plans to repay it the next day, an auto mechanic falls into increasingly disastrous circumstances for more and more money which rapidly spirals out of his control.

Name: Cinderfella
Stars: Jerry Lewis, Ed Wynn, Judith Anderson, Henry Silva
Description: A gender-swapped retelling of Charles Perrault's classic, where Cinderfella is visited by a fairy godfather to help him escape from his wicked stepmother and stepbrothers.

Name: Moscow on the Hudson
Stars: Robin Williams, Maria Conchita Alonso, Cleavant Derricks, Alejandro Rey
Description: A Russian saxophonist visiting New York with a circus troupe suddenly decides to defect from the USSR during a shopping trip to a department store, but he finds adjusting to American life more difficult than he imagined.

Name: What About Bob?
Stars: Bill Murray, Richard Dreyfuss, Julie Hagerty, Charlie Korsmo
Description: A successful psychotherapist loses his mind after one of his most dependent patients, an obsessive-compulsive neurotic, tracks him down during his family vacation.

Name: Người Chỉ Điểm
Stars: Matt Damon, Tony Hale, Patton Oswalt, Lucas McHugh Carroll
Description: The U.S. government decides to go after an agro-business giant with a price-fixing accusation, based on the evidence submitted by their star witness, vice president-turned-informant Mark Whitacre.

Name: In the Name of the Father
Stars: Daniel Day-Lewis, Pete Postlethwaite, Alison Crosbie, Philip King
Description: A man's coerced confession to an I.R.A. bombing he did not commit results in the imprisonment of his father as well. An English lawyer fights to free them.

Name: Michael
Stars: John Travolta, Andie MacDowell, William Hurt, Bob Hoskins
Description: Two tabloid reporters checking out a report of the Archangel Michael living with an old woman find that it's true. But that's not the only surprise.

Name: Đi Tìm Miền Đất Hứa
Stars: Marc Forster, Johnny Depp, Kate Winslet, Julie Christie, Radha Mitchell
Description: The story of Sir J.M. Barrie's friendship with a family who inspired him to create Peter Pan.

Name: Marvin's Room
Stars: Meryl Streep, Leonardo DiCaprio, Diane Keaton, Robert De Niro
Description: After seventeen years, a fiercely independent woman and her rebellious son return home and together they turn the family she left behind upside down.

Name: Cặp Đôi Khó Xơi
Stars: Albert Magnoli, Sylvester Stallone, Kurt Russell, Teri Hatcher, Jack Palance
Description: Framed by their ruthless arch-nemesis, a pair of mismatched LAPD officers must put their differences aside to get even with the brutal crime baron who sent them to rot in a maximum-security prison.

Name: Đứa Bé Mất Tích
Stars: Morgan Freeman, Ed Harris, Casey Affleck, Michelle Monaghan
Description: Two Boston area detectives investigate a little girl's kidnapping, which ultimately turns into a crisis both professionally and personally.

Name: The Trouble with Harry
Stars: John Forsythe, Shirley MacLaine, Edmund Gwenn, Mildred Natwick
Description: Harry's dead and, while no one really minds, everyone feels responsible. After Harry's body is found in the woods, several locals must determine not only how and why he was killed but what to do with the body.

Name: Giấc Mơ Kỳ Lạ
Stars: Marjane Satrapi, Chiara Mastroianni, Catherine Deneuve, Gena Rowlands, Danielle Darrieux
Description: A precocious and outspoken Iranian girl grows up during the Islamic Revolution.

Name: Làm Cha Mẹ
Stars: Steve Martin, Mary Steenburgen, Dianne Wiest, Jason Robards
Description: Four Buckman siblings attempt to raise their children - each in their own different style - and deal with the joys and sorrows that the process brings.

Name: Quái Vật
Stars: Patty Jenkins, Charlize Theron, Christina Ricci, Bruce Dern, Lee Tergesen
Description: Based on the life of Aileen Wuornos, a Daytona Beach prostitute who became a serial killer.

Name: Nhiệm Vụ Bất Khả Thi 3
Stars: Tom Cruise, Michelle Monaghan, Ving Rhames, Philip Seymour Hoffman
Description: IMF agent Ethan Hunt comes into conflict with a dangerous and sadistic arms dealer who threatens his life and his fiancée in response.

Name: The Return of the Pink Panther
Stars: Peter Sellers, Christopher Plummer, Catherine Schell, Herbert Lom
Description: Inspector Jacques Clouseau is put on the case when the Pink Panther diamond is stolen, with the Phantom's trademark glove the only clue.

Name: Sống Và Hãy Chết
Stars: Roger Moore, Yaphet Kotto, Jane Seymour, Clifton James
Description: James Bond is sent to stop a diabolically brilliant heroin magnate armed with a complex organisation and a reliable psychic tarot card reader.

Name: Tay Đấm Huyền Thoại 2
Stars: Sylvester Stallone, Talia Shire, Burt Young, Carl Weathers
Description: Rocky struggles in family life after his bout with Apollo Creed, while the embarrassed champ insistently goads him to accept a challenge for a rematch.

Name: Không Tặc
Stars: Nicolas Cage, John Cusack, John Malkovich, Colm Meaney
Description: Newly-paroled ex-con and former U.S. Ranger Cameron Poe finds himself trapped in a prisoner-transport plane when the passengers seize control.

Name: Ban Nhạc Vui Nhộn
Stars: Tom Hanks, Liv Tyler, Charlize Theron, Tom Everett Scott
Description: A local Pennsylvania band scores a one-hit wonder in 1964 and rides the star-making machinery as long as they can, with lots of help from their manager.

Name: Seabiscuit
Stars: Tobey Maguire, Jeff Bridges, Elizabeth Banks, Chris Cooper
Description: True story of the undersized Depression-era racehorse whose victories lifted not only the spirits of the team behind it but also those of their nation.

Name: Shadows and Fog
Stars: Woody Allen, Mia Farrow, Michael Kirby, David Ogden Stiers
Description: With a serial strangler on the loose, a bookkeeper wanders around town searching for the vigilante group intent on catching the killer.

Name: All This, and Heaven Too
Stars: Bette Davis, Charles Boyer, Jeffrey Lynn, Barbara O'Neil
Description: A duchess' irrational behavior toward her children's governess triggers tragic events that will change her family's lives forever.

Name: Love Before Breakfast
Stars: Carole Lombard, Preston Foster, Cesar Romero, Janet Beecher
Description: A rich businessman stalks another man's fiancée.

Name: Con Đường Tội Lỗi Của Carlito
Stars: Al Pacino, Sean Penn, Penelope Ann Miller, John Leguizamo
Description: A Puerto Rican former convict, just released from prison, pledges to stay away from drugs and violence despite the pressure around him and lead on to a better life outside of N.Y.C.

Name: The Killing of a Chinese Bookie
Stars: Ben Gazzara, Timothy Carey, Seymour Cassel, Robert Phillips
Description: A proud strip club owner is forced to come to terms with himself as a man when his gambling addiction gets him in hot water with the mob, who offer him only one alternative.

Name: Khu Vườn Lạc Quan
Stars: Zach Braff, Peter Sarsgaard, Natalie Portman, Ian Holm
Description: A quietly troubled young man returns home for his mother's funeral after being estranged from his family for a decade.

Name: Cướp Nhà Băng
Stars: Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Jeff Daniels, Matthew Goode, Isla Fisher
Description: Chris is a once promising high school athlete whose life is turned upside down following a tragic accident. As he tries to maintain a normal life, he takes a job as a janitor at a bank, where he ultimately finds himself caught up in a planned heist.

Name: Đen Đủ Đường
Stars: Robert Downey Jr., Zach Galifianakis, Michelle Monaghan, Jamie Foxx
Description: High-strung father-to-be Peter Highman is forced to hitch a ride with aspiring actor Ethan Tremblay on a road trip in order to make it to his child's birth on time.

Name: Places in the Heart
Stars: Sally Field, Lindsay Crouse, Ed Harris, Amy Madigan
Description: In central Texas in the 1930s, a widow with two small children tries to save her small 40-acre farm with the help of a blind boarder and an itinerant black handyman.

Name: House of Sand and Fog
Stars: Jennifer Connelly, Ben Kingsley, Ron Eldard, Frances Fisher
Description: An abandoned wife is evicted from her house and starts a tragic conflict with her house's new owners.

Name: The Old Maid
Stars: Bette Davis, Miriam Hopkins, George Brent, Donald Crisp
Description: The arrival of an ex-lover on a young woman's wedding day sets in motion a chain of events which will alter her and her cousin's lives forever.

Name: Chuyến Bay
Stars: Denzel Washington, Nadine Velazquez, Don Cheadle, John Goodman
Description: An airline pilot saves almost all his passengers on his malfunctioning airliner which eventually crashed, but an investigation into the accident reveals something troubling.

Name: Những Gã Trai Hư
Stars: Will Smith, Martin Lawrence, Lisa Boyle, Michael Taliferro
Description: Two hip detectives protect a witness to a murder while investigating a case of stolen heroin from the evidence storage room from their police precinct.

Name: Dẫn Độ Chúa Tể Nhạc Rock
Stars: Jonah Hill, Russell Brand, Elisabeth Moss, Rose Byrne
Description: A record company intern is hired to accompany out-of-control British rock star Aldous Snow to a concert at L.A.'s Greek Theater.

Name: Một Thời Ở Mexico
Stars: Antonio Banderas, Salma Hayek, Johnny Depp, Willem Dafoe
Description: Hitman "El Mariachi" becomes involved in international espionage involving a psychotic CIA agent and a corrupt Mexican general.

Name: History of the World: Part I
Stars: Mel Brooks, Gregory Hines, Dom DeLuise, Madeline Kahn
Description: Mel Brooks brings his one-of-a-kind comic touch to the history of mankind covering events from the Old Testament to the French Revolution in a series of episodic comedy vignettes.

Name: Melinda and Melinda
Stars: Will Ferrell, Vinessa Shaw, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Wallace Shawn
Description: Two alternating stories, one comedy and the other tragedy, about Melinda's attempts to straighten out her life.

Name: The FBI Story
Stars: James Stewart, Vera Miles, Murray Hamilton, Larry Pennell
Description: A dedicated FBI agent recalls the agency's battles against the Klan, organized crime and Communist spies.

Name: Dòng Máu Sát Thủ
Stars: Kurt Russell, Zoë Bell, Rosario Dawson, Vanessa Ferlito
Description: Two separate sets of voluptuous women are stalked at different times by a scarred stuntman who uses his "death proof" cars to execute his murderous plans.

Name: Du Khách
Stars: Richard Jenkins, Haaz Sleiman, Danai Gurira, Hiam Abbass
Description: A college professor travels to New York City to attend a conference and finds a young couple living in his apartment.

Name: Tình Một Đêm
Stars: Seth Rogen, Katherine Heigl, Paul Rudd, Leslie Mann
Description: For fun-loving party animal Ben Stone, the last thing he ever expected was for his one-night stand to show up on his doorstep eight weeks later to tell him she's pregnant with his child.

Name: Trò Chơi Gián Điệp
Stars: Robert Redford, Brad Pitt, Catherine McCormack, Stephen Dillane
Description: Retiring CIA agent Nathan Muir recalls his training of Tom Bishop while working against agency politics to free him from his Chinese captors.

Name: The Doors
Stars: Jim Morrison, Oliver Stone, Val Kilmer, Meg Ryan, Kyle MacLachlan, Frank Whaley
Description: The story of the famous and influential 1960s rock band The Doors and its lead singer and composer, Jim Morrison, from his days as a UCLA film student in Los Angeles, to his untimely death in Paris, France at age 27 in 1971.

Name: Chuyến Bay Số Hiệu 93
Stars: David Alan Basche, Olivia Thirlby, Liza Colón-Zayas, J.J. Johnson
Description: A real-time account of the events on United Flight 93, one of the planes hijacked on September 11th, 2001 that crashed near Shanksville, Pennsylvania when passengers foiled the terrorist plot.

Name: Võ Sĩ Cuồng Phong
Stars: Norman Jewison, Denzel Washington, Vicellous Shannon, Deborah Kara Unger, Liev Schreiber
Description: The story of Rubin 'Hurricane' Carter, a boxer wrongly imprisoned for murder, and the people who aided in his fight to prove his innocence.

Name: Another Woman
Stars: Gena Rowlands, Mia Farrow, Ian Holm, Blythe Danner
Description: Facing a mid-life crisis, a woman rents an apartment next to a psychiatrist's office to write a new book, only to become drawn to the plight of a pregnant woman seeking that doctor's help.

Name: At Close Range
Stars: Sean Penn, Christopher Walken, Mary Stuart Masterson, Chris Penn
Description: Reunited with his career criminal father, tough teen Brad thinks he's found his ticket to an exciting life of crime, only to find out he's wrong.

Name: Nghị Lực Sống
Stars: Julia Roberts, Albert Finney, David Brisbin, Dawn Didawick
Description: An unemployed single mother becomes a legal assistant and almost single-handedly brings down a California power company accused of polluting a city's water supply.

Name: Đội Tuần Tra Mê Gái
Stars: Seth Rogen, Anna Faris, Ray Liotta, Michael Peña
Description: Bi-polar mall security guard Ronnie Barnhardt is called into action to stop a flasher from turning shopper's paradise into his personal peep show. But when Barnhardt can't bring the culprit to justice, a surly police detective is recruited to close the case.

Name: Cuộc Chiến Của Charlie Wilson
Stars: Tom Hanks, Julia Roberts, Philip Seymour Hoffman, Amy Adams
Description: A drama based on a Texas congressman Charlie Wilson's covert dealings in Afghanistan, where his efforts to assist rebels in their war with the Soviets have some unforeseen and long-reaching effects.

Name: Trở Lại Dương Gian
Stars: Scarlett Johansson, Hugh Jackman, Jim Dunk, Robert Bathurst
Description: An American journalism student in London scoops a big story, and begins an affair with an aristocrat as the incident unfurls.

Name: Khách Sạn Rwanda
Stars: Terry George, Don Cheadle, Sophie Okonedo, Joaquin Phoenix, Xolani Mali
Description: Paul Rusesabagina, a hotel manager, houses over a thousand Tutsi refugees during their struggle against the Hutu militia in Rwanda, Africa.

Name: Chiến Tranh Giữa Các Vì Sao 1: Hiểm Họa Bóng Ma
Stars: Ewan McGregor, Liam Neeson, Natalie Portman, Jake Lloyd
Description: Two Jedi escape a hostile blockade to find allies and come across a young boy who may bring balance to the Force, but the long dormant Sith resurface to claim their original glory.

Name: Người Bí Ẩn
Stars: Ben Stiller, Janeane Garofalo, William H. Macy, Hank Azaria
Description: A group of inept amateur superheroes must try to save the day when a supervillain threatens to destroy a major superhero and the city.

Name: Hearts in Atlantis
Stars: Anthony Hopkins, Anton Yelchin, Hope Davis, Mika Boorem
Description: Widowed Liz Garfield and her son Bobby change when mysterious stranger Ted Brautigan enters their lives.

Name: Thuyền Trưởng và Đại Úy
Stars: Russell Crowe, Paul Bettany, Billy Boyd, James D'Arcy
Description: During the Napoleonic Wars, a brash British captain pushes his ship and crew to their limits in pursuit of a formidable French war vessel around South America.

Name: Khung Trời Ảo Mộng
Stars: Tom Cruise, Penélope Cruz, Cameron Diaz, Kurt Russell
Description: A self-indulgent and vain publishing magnate finds his privileged life upended after a vehicular accident with a resentful lover.

Name: Điều Chia Sẻ Ngọt Ngào
Stars: Jack Nicholson, Diane Keaton, Keanu Reeves, Amanda Peet
Description: A swinger on the cusp of being a senior citizen with a taste for young women falls in love with an accomplished woman closer to his age.

Name: Bill & Ted's Excellent Adventure
Stars: Keanu Reeves, Alex Winter, George Carlin, Terry Camilleri
Description: Two rock-'n-rolling teens, on the verge of failing their class, set out on a quest to make the ultimate school history report after being presented with a time machine.

Name: The Queen
Stars: Queen Elizabeth II, Stephen Frears, Helen Mirren, Michael Sheen, James Cromwell, Alex Jennings
Description: After the death of Princess Diana, Queen Elizabeth II struggles with her reaction to a sequence of events nobody could have predicted.

Name: Yêu Nữ Thích Hàng Hiệu
Stars: Anne Hathaway, Meryl Streep, Adrian Grenier, Emily Blunt
Description: A smart but sensible new graduate lands a job as an assistant to Miranda Priestly, the demanding editor-in-chief of a high fashion magazine.

Name: Vegas Vacation
Stars: Chevy Chase, Beverly D'Angelo, Randy Quaid, Ethan Embry
Description: In the fourth outing for the vacation franchise, the Griswolds have to survive Vegas fever when they go to Las Vegas for a fun family vacation.

Name: Funny Girl
Stars: William Wyler, Barbra Streisand, Omar Sharif, Kay Medford, Anne Francis
Description: The life of Fanny Brice, famed comedienne and entertainer of the early 1900s. We see her rise to fame as a Ziegfeld girl, subsequent career, and her personal life, particularly her relationship with Nick Arnstein.

Name: The Kennel Murder Case
Stars: William Powell, Mary Astor, Eugene Pallette, Ralph Morgan
Description: Philo Vance, accompanied by his prize-losing Scottish terrier, investigates the locked-room murder of a prominent and much-hated collector whose broken Chinese vase provides an important clue.

Name: The Inspector General
Stars: Danny Kaye, Walter Slezak, Barbara Bates, Elsa Lanchester
Description: A town's corrupt officials think a fool is actually an investigator in disguise.

Name: Chiến Binh Tự Do
Stars: Hugo Weaving, Natalie Portman, Rupert Graves, Stephen Rea
Description: In a future British dystopian society, a shadowy freedom fighter, known only by the alias of "V", plots to overthrow the tyrannical government - with the help of a young woman.

Name: The Dock Brief
Stars: Peter Sellers, Richard Attenborough, Beryl Reid, David Lodge
Description: An incompetent barrister is assigned to defend an accused wife murderer.

Name: The Absent Minded Professor
Stars: Fred MacMurray, Nancy Olson, Keenan Wynn, Tommy Kirk
Description: A college professor invents an anti-gravity substance which a corrupt businessman wants for himself.

Name: Đội Bóng Kì Tài
Stars: Ben Stiller, Christine Taylor, Vince Vaughn, Rip Torn
Description: A group of misfits enter a Las Vegas dodgeball tournament in order to save their cherished local gym from the onslaught of a corporate health fitness chain.

Name: A Scanner Darkly
Stars: Keanu Reeves, Winona Ryder, Robert Downey Jr., Rory Cochrane
Description: An undercover cop in a not-too-distant future becomes involved with a dangerous new drug and begins to lose his own identity as a result.

Name: The Passionate Friends
Stars: Ann Todd, Trevor Howard, Claude Rains, Betty Ann Davies
Description: A woman meets a man whose love she rejected years ago.

Name: The Set-Up
Stars: Robert Ryan, Audrey Totter, George Tobias, Alan Baxter
Description: Expecting the usual loss, a boxing manager takes bribes from a betting gangster without telling his fighter.

Name: None But the Brave
Stars: Frank Sinatra, Clint Walker, Tatsuya Mihashi, Takeshi Katô
Description: During WW2, a platoon of Marines crash-lands on a tiny Pacific island occupied by a small Japanese unit.

Name: All the King's Men
Stars: Sean Penn, Jude Law, Kate Winslet, Anthony Hopkins
Description: Based on the Robert Penn Warren novel. The life of populist Southerner Willie Stark, a political creature loosely based on Governor Huey Long of Louisiana.

Name: The Heart Is a Lonely Hunter
Stars: Alan Arkin, Sondra Locke, Chuck McCann, Peter Mamakos
Description: When deaf-mute Singer moves to a new town to be near his hospitalized friend, he makes an indelible impression on the lives of those around him.

Name: Lời Nói Dối Chân Thật
Stars: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Jamie Lee Curtis, Tom Arnold, Bill Paxton
Description: A fearless, globe-trotting, terrorist-battling secret agent has his life turned upside down when he discovers his wife might be having an affair with a used-car salesman while terrorists smuggle nuclear war heads into the United States.

Name: The Bellboy
Stars: Jerry Lewis, Alex Gerry, Bob Clayton, Sonnie Sands
Description: Mute bellboy Stanley works at the luxurious Fontainebleau Hotel in Miami Beach. In spite of being a serviceable and friendly employee, the clumsy Stanley gets successively into trouble with his mistakes.

Name: Dude, Where's My Car?
Stars: Ashton Kutcher, Seann William Scott, Jennifer Garner, Marla Sokoloff
Description: Two potheads wake up after a night of partying and cannot remember where they parked their car.

Name: Trai Đẹp Lên Sàn
Stars: Ben Stiller, Owen Wilson, Christine Taylor, Will Ferrell
Description: At the end of his career, a clueless fashion model is brainwashed to kill the Prime Minister of Malaysia.

Name: Sát Thủ Với Khẩu Súng Vàng
Stars: Roger Moore, Christopher Lee, Britt Ekland, Maud Adams
Description: James Bond is targeted by the world's most expensive assassin, while he attempts to recover sensitive solar cell technology that is being sold to the highest bidder.

Name: Rock Học Trò
Stars: Jack Black, Mike White, Joan Cusack, Adam Pascal
Description: After being kicked out of his rock band, Dewey Finn becomes a substitute teacher of an uptight elementary private school, only to try and turn his class into a rock band.

Name: Cruising
Stars: Al Pacino, Paul Sorvino, Karen Allen, Richard Cox
Description: A police detective goes undercover in the underground S&M gay subculture of New York City to catch a serial killer who is preying on gay men.

Name: A Family Affair
Stars: Lionel Barrymore, Cecilia Parker, Eric Linden, Mickey Rooney
Description: Judge Hardy faces problems at work and at home. Powerful men in town are upset with his decisions and want to see him impeached; his daughters, Joan and Marion, have romantic problems; and ...                See full summary »

Name: The Sea of Grass
Stars: Katharine Hepburn, Spencer Tracy, Robert Walker, Melvyn Douglas
Description: On America's frontier, a St. Louis woman marries a New Mexico cattleman who is seen as a tyrant by the locals.

Name: Sát Thủ Giết Thuê
Stars: Tom Cruise, Jamie Foxx, Jada Pinkett Smith, Mark Ruffalo
Description: A cab driver finds himself the hostage of an engaging contract killer as he makes his rounds from hit to hit during one night in Los Angeles.

Name: Odd Man Out
Stars: James Mason, Robert Newton, Cyril Cusack, F.J. McCormick
Description: A wounded Irish nationalist leader attempts to evade police following a failed robbery in Belfast.

Name: Choke
Stars: Sam Rockwell, Anjelica Huston, Kelly Macdonald, Kathryn Alexander
Description: A sex-addicted con-man pays for his mother's hospital bills by playing on the sympathies of those who rescue him from choking to death.

Name: 10 Điều Em Ghét Anh
Stars: Heath Ledger, Julia Stiles, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Larisa Oleynik
Description: A high-school boy, Cameron, cannot date Bianca until her anti-social older sister, Kat, has a boyfriend. So, Cameron pays a mysterious boy, Patrick, to charm Kat.

Name: This Happy Breed
Stars: Robert Newton, Celia Johnson, John Mills, Kay Walsh
Description: Just after World War I, the Gibbons family moves to a nice house in the suburbs. They live an ordinary life throughout the years, but everything changes when World War II breaks out.

Name: Chỉ Còn Một Chữ Tình
Stars: Adam Sandler, Don Cheadle, Jada Pinkett Smith, Liv Tyler
Description: A man who lost his family in the September 11 attack on New York City runs into his old college roommate. Rekindling the friendship is the one thing that appears able to help the man recover from his grief.

Name: Nhật Ký Tình Yêu
Stars: Gena Rowlands, James Garner, Rachel McAdams, Ryan Gosling
Description: An elderly man reads to a woman with dementia the story of two young lovers whose romance is threatened by the difference in their respective social classes.

Name: Bốt Điện Thoại
Stars: Colin Farrell, Kiefer Sutherland, Forest Whitaker, Radha Mitchell
Description: Publicist Stuart Shepard finds himself trapped in a phone booth, pinned down by an extortionist's sniper rifle. Unable to leave or receive outside help, Stuart's negotiation with the caller leads to a jaw-dropping climax.

Name: The Naked City
Stars: Barry Fitzgerald, Howard Duff, Dorothy Hart, Don Taylor
Description: A step-by-step look at a murder investigation on the streets of New York.

Name: Sita Sings the Blues
Stars: Annette Hanshaw, Aseem Chhabra, Bhavana Nagulapally, Manish Acharya
Description: An animated version of the epic Indian tale of Ramayana set to the 1920s jazz vocals of Annette Hanshaw.

Name: Những Gã Trai Hư 2
Stars: Will Smith, Martin Lawrence, Gabrielle Union, Jordi Mollà
Description: Two loose-cannon narcotics cops investigate the flow of Ecstasy into Florida from a Cuban drug cartel.

Name: Cat Ballou
Stars: Jane Fonda, Lee Marvin, Michael Callan, Dwayne Hickman
Description: A young schoolteacher turns into an outlaw to avenge her murdered father.

Name: D2: The Mighty Ducks
Stars: Emilio Estevez, Kathryn Erbe, Michael Tucker, Jan Rubes
Description: Can Gordon's team win the Junior Goodwill Games in California in spite of all the set-backs?

Name: The Scout
Stars: Albert Brooks, Brendan Fraser, Dianne Wiest, Anne Twomey
Description: The story of a baseball scout who discovers a talented but troubled baseball player.

Name: Cash McCall
Stars: James Garner, Natalie Wood, Nina Foch, Dean Jagger
Description: James Garner put in a winning performance as a similarly unreconstructed capitalist in the grip of merger mania.

Name: Luật Sư Tài Ba
Stars: Matt Damon, Danny DeVito, Claire Danes, Jon Voight
Description: An underdog lawyer takes on a fraudulent insurance company.

Name: The Gauntlet
Stars: Clint Eastwood, Sondra Locke, Pat Hingle, William Prince
Description: A hard but mediocre cop is assigned to escort a prostitute into custody from Las Vegas to Phoenix, so that she can testify in a mob trial. But a lot of people are literally betting that they won't make it into town alive.

Name: Desperate Hours
Stars: Mickey Rourke, Anthony Hopkins, Mimi Rogers, Lindsay Crouse
Description: An escaped con, on the run from the law, moves into a married couple's house and takes over their lives.

Name: The Rainmaker
Stars: Burt Lancaster, Katharine Hepburn, Wendell Corey, Lloyd Bridges
Description: During the Depression, a con-man promises rain to a desperate drought-ridden Kansas town and marriage to a local desperate spinster.

Name: Lean on Me
Stars: Morgan Freeman, Beverly Todd, Robert Guillaume, Alan North
Description: The dedicated but tyrannical Joe Clark is appointed the principal of a decaying inner-city school he is determined to improve by any and all means.

Name: The Organization
Stars: Sidney Poitier, Barbara McNair, Gerald S. O'Loughlin, Sheree North
Description: In San Francisco, Police Lieutenant Virgil Tibbs helps a group of idealistic vigilantes expose a drug ring controlled by powerful businessmen.

Name: The Pledge
Stars: Jack Nicholson, Benicio Del Toro, Patricia Clarkson, Beau Daniels
Description: A retiring police detective pledges to catch the killer of a young child.

Name: Sex and the Single Girl
Stars: Lauren Bacall, Tony Curtis, Natalie Wood, Henry Fonda
Description: A womanizing reporter for a sleazy tabloid magazine impersonates his hen-pecked neighbor in order to get an expose on renowned psychologist Helen Gurley Brown.

Name: Heathers
Stars: Winona Ryder, Christian Slater, Shannen Doherty, Lisanne Falk
Description: At Westerburg High where cliques rule, jocks dominate and all the popular girls are named Heather, it's going to take a Veronica and mysterious new kid to give teen angst a body count.

Name: Tinh Cầu
Stars: Dustin Hoffman, Sharon Stone, Samuel L. Jackson, Peter Coyote
Description: A spaceship is discovered under three hundred years' worth of coral growth at the bottom of the ocean.

Name: Ông bà Smith
Stars: Brad Pitt, Angelina Jolie, Adam Brody, Vince Vaughn
Description: A bored married couple is surprised to learn that they are both assassins hired by competing agencies to kill each other.

Name: Người Cha Vĩ Đại
Stars: Adam Sandler, Joey Lauren Adams, Jon Stewart, Cole Sprouse
Description: A lazy law school graduate adopts a kid to impress his girlfriend, but everything doesn't go as planned and he becomes the unlikely foster father.

Name: Melvin and Howard
Stars: Howard Hughes, Jonathan Demme, Paul Le Mat, Jason Robards, Elizabeth Cheshire, Mary Steenburgen
Description: The story of hard-luck Melvin E. Dummar, who claimed to have received a will naming him an heir to the fortune of Howard Hughes.

Name: The Juror
Stars: Demi Moore, Alec Baldwin, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, James Gandolfini
Description: A juror in a Mafia trial is forced to convince the other jurors to vote not guilty by an obsessive mob enforcer.

Name: Postcards from the Edge
Stars: Meryl Streep, Shirley MacLaine, Dennis Quaid, Gene Hackman
Description: A substance-addicted actress tries to look on the bright side even as she is forced to move back in with her mother to avoid unemployment.

Name: Một Thời Để Giết
Stars: Matthew McConaughey, Sandra Bullock, Samuel L. Jackson, Kevin Spacey
Description: In Canton, Mississippi, a fearless young lawyer and his assistant defend a black man accused of murdering two white men who raped his ten-year-old daughter, inciting violent retribution and revenge from the Ku Klux Klan.

Name: The Rare Breed
Stars: James Stewart, Maureen O'Hara, Brian Keith, Juliet Mills
Description: An English woman and her daughter enlist the aid of a cowboy to try and get their hardy hornless bull to mate with the longhorns of Texas, but have to overcome greedy criminals and the natural elements.

Name: Pat and Mike
Stars: Spencer Tracy, Katharine Hepburn, Aldo Ray, William Ching
Description: Pat is a women's sports sensation unless her fiancé is around. Her new shady manager Mike keeps them apart and develops feelings for her.

Name: Danh Vọng
Stars: Renée Zellweger, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Richard Gere, Taye Diggs
Description: Two death-row murderesses develop a fierce rivalry while competing for publicity, celebrity, and a sleazy lawyer's attention.

Name: Born Free
Stars: Tom McGowan, Virginia McKenna, Bill Travers, Geoffrey Keen, Peter Lukoye
Description: The story of George and Joy Adamson and the orphaned lion cub, Elsa, they adopt.

Name: Killing Them Softly
Stars: Brad Pitt, Ray Liotta, Richard Jenkins, Scoot McNairy
Description: Jackie Cogan is an enforcer hired to restore order after three dumb guys rob a Mob protected card game, causing the local criminal economy to collapse.

Name: Nhạc Phẩm Của Thầy Holland
Stars: Richard Dreyfuss, Glenne Headly, Jay Thomas, Olympia Dukakis
Description: A frustrated composer finds fulfillment as a high school music teacher.

Name: Súng Thần
Stars: Willem Dafoe, Sean Patrick Flanery, Norman Reedus, David Della Rocco
Description: Two Irish Catholic brothers become vigilantes and wipe out Boston's criminal underworld in the name of God.

Name: Old Yeller
Stars: Dorothy McGuire, Fess Parker, Tommy Kirk, Jeff York
Description: A teenage boy grows to love a stray yellow dog while helping his mother and younger brother run their Texas homestead while their father is away on a cattle drive. First thought to be good-for-nothing mutt, Old Yeller is soon beloved by all.

Name: Nosferatu - Phantom der Nacht
Stars: Klaus Kinski, Isabelle Adjani, Bruno Ganz, Roland Topor
Description: Count Dracula moves from Transylvania to Wismar, spreading the Black Plague across the land. Only a woman pure of heart can bring an end to his reign of horror.

Name: Điệp Vụ Mắt Vàng
Stars: Pierce Brosnan, Sean Bean, Izabella Scorupco, Famke Janssen
Description: Years after a friend and fellow 00 agent is killed on a joint mission, a secret space based weapons program known as "GoldenEye" is stolen. James Bond is assigned to stop a Russian crime syndicate from using the weapon.

Name: Alias Jesse James
Stars: Bob Hope, Rhonda Fleming, Wendell Corey, Gloria Talbott
Description: Outlaw T.J. "Jesse" James tries to kill insurance agent Milford Farnsworth, who has been mistaken for him in order to collect on a big policy.

Name: We're Not Dressing
Stars: Bing Crosby, Carole Lombard, George Burns, Gracie Allen
Description: Yacht owner is stranded on island with her socialite friends, a wacky husband and wife research team, and a singing sailor.

Name: The Squid and the Whale
Stars: Owen Kline, Jeff Daniels, Laura Linney, Jesse Eisenberg
Description: Follows two young boys dealing with their parents' divorce in Brooklyn in the 1980s.

Name: Batman: The Movie
Stars: Adam West, Burt Ward, Lee Meriwether, Cesar Romero
Description: The Dynamic Duo faces four supervillains who plan to hold the world for ransom with the help of a secret invention that instantly dehydrates people.

Name: Ngày Kinh Hoàng
Stars: Dennis Quaid, Jake Gyllenhaal, Emmy Rossum, Dash Mihok
Description: Jack Hall, paleoclimatologist, must make a daring trek from Washington, D.C. to New York City to reach his son, trapped in the cross-hairs of a sudden international storm which plunges the planet into a new Ice Age.

Name: Reversal of Fortune
Stars: Jeremy Irons, Glenn Close, Ron Silver, Annabella Sciorra
Description: Wealthy Sunny von Bülow lies brain-dead, husband Claus guilty of attempted murder; but he says he's innocent and hires Alan Dershowitz for his appeal.

Name: The Disorderly Orderly
Stars: Jerry Lewis, Glenda Farrell, Susan Oliver, Everett Sloane
Description: Medical student Jerome Littlefield works as an orderly at a private clinic where he creates havoc due to his ineptitude.

Name: National Lampoon's Van Wilder
Stars: Ryan Reynolds, Tara Reid, Tim Matheson, Kal Penn
Description: The most popular kid on campus meets a beautiful journalist who makes him realize that maybe he's afraid to graduate.

Name: Huyền Thoại Hiệp Sĩ
Stars: Heath Ledger, Mark Addy, Rufus Sewell, Shannyn Sossamon
Description: After his master dies, a peasant squire, fueled by his desire for food and glory, creates a new identity for himself as a knight.

Name: Midnight in the Garden of Good and Evil
Stars: John Cusack, Kevin Spacey, Jack Thompson, Irma P. Hall
Description: A visiting city reporter's assignment suddenly revolves around the murder trial of a local millionaire, whom he befriends.

Name: National Lampoon's Christmas Vacation
Stars: Chevy Chase, Beverly D'Angelo, Juliette Lewis, Johnny Galecki
Description: The Griswold family's plans for a big family Christmas predictably turn into a big disaster.

Name: Tay Phóng Viên Kỳ Quái
Stars: Larry Charles, Sacha Baron Cohen, Ken Davitian, Luenell, Chester
Description: Kazakh TV talking head Borat is dispatched to the United States to report on the greatest country in the world. With a documentary crew in tow, Borat becomes more interested in locating and marrying Pamela Anderson.

Name: Wag the Dog
Stars: Dustin Hoffman, Robert De Niro, Anne Heche, Woody Harrelson
Description: Shortly before an election, a spin-doctor and a Hollywood producer join efforts to fabricate a war in order to cover up a Presidential sex scandal.

Name: In This Our Life
Stars: Raoul Walsh, Bette Davis, Olivia de Havilland, George Brent, Dennis Morgan
Description: The day before her wedding, a pampered young woman absconds with her sister's husband. Her sister begins seeing the woman's former fiancé.

Name: Gigi
Stars: Charles Walters, Leslie Caron, Maurice Chevalier, Louis Jourdan, Hermione Gingold
Description: Weary of the conventions of Parisian society, a rich playboy and a youthful courtesan-in-training enjoy a platonic friendship which may not stay platonic for long.

Name: Private Benjamin
Stars: Goldie Hawn, Eileen Brennan, Armand Assante, Robert Webber
Description: A sheltered young high-society woman joins the United States Army on a whim and finds herself in a trickier situation than she ever expected.

Name: Lãng Tử Cao Nguyên
Stars: Clint Eastwood, Verna Bloom, Marianna Hill, Mitchell Ryan
Description: A gun-fighting stranger comes to the small settlement of Lago and is hired to bring the townsfolk together in an attempt to hold off three outlaws who are on their way.

Name: The Mighty Ducks
Stars: Emilio Estevez, Joss Ackland, Lane Smith, Heidi Kling
Description: A self-centered Minnesota lawyer is sentenced to community service coaching a rag tag youth hockey team.

Name: Angel Face
Stars: Robert Mitchum, Jean Simmons, Mona Freeman, Herbert Marshall
Description: Ambulance driver Frank Jessup is ensnared in the schemes of the sensuous but dangerous Diane Tremayne.

Name: Of Mice and Men
Stars: John Malkovich, Gary Sinise, Ray Walston, Casey Siemaszko
Description: A nomadic farm worker looks after his dimwitted, gentle-giant friend during the Great Depression.

Name: He Got Game
Stars: Denzel Washington, Milla Jovovich, Ray Allen, Rosario Dawson
Description: A basketball player's father must try to convince him to go to a college so he can get a shorter sentence.

Name: Rumble Fish
Stars: Matt Dillon, Mickey Rourke, Diane Lane, Dennis Hopper
Description: Absent-minded street thug Rusty James struggles to live up to his legendary older brother's reputation, and longs for the days of gang warfare.

Name: Murder by Death
Stars: Peter Falk, Alec Guinness, Peter Sellers, Eileen Brennan
Description: Five famous literary detective characters and their sidekicks are invited to a bizarre mansion to solve an even stranger mystery.

Name: Divorce American Style
Stars: Dick Van Dyke, Debbie Reynolds, Jason Robards, Jean Simmons
Description: Dick Van Dyke and Debbie Reynolds star as a suburban couple who learn that not even divorce can solve all their problems.

Name: Harry Potter và Phòng Chứa Bí Mật
Stars: Daniel Radcliffe, Rupert Grint, Emma Watson, Richard Harris
Description: An ancient prophecy seems to be coming true when a mysterious presence begins stalking the corridors of a school of magic and leaving its victims paralyzed.

Name: Những Kẻ Săn Vàng
Stars: George Clooney, Mark Wahlberg, Ice Cube, Spike Jonze
Description: In the aftermath of the Persian Gulf War, four soldiers set out to steal gold that was stolen from Kuwait, but they discover people who desperately need their help.

Name: The Patsy
Stars: Jerry Lewis, Ina Balin, Everett Sloane, Phil Harris
Description: An incompetent bellhop is recruited to fill in for a deceased comedian.

Name: The Sound Barrier
Stars: Ralph Richardson, Ann Todd, Nigel Patrick, John Justin
Description: Fictionalized story of British aerospace engineers solving the problem of supersonic flight.

Name: Những Kẻ Ngoài Cuộc
Stars: C. Thomas Howell, Matt Dillon, Ralph Macchio, Patrick Swayze
Description: In a small Oklahoma town in 1964, the rivalry between two gangs, the poor Greasers and the rich Socs, heats up when one gang member accidentally kills a member of the other.

Name: At War with the Army
Stars: Dean Martin, Jerry Lewis, Mike Kellin, Jimmie Dundee
Description: Alvin Corwin is low man on the totem pole, and goes from one mishap to another at an army training camp in World War II.

Name: French Kiss
Stars: Meg Ryan, Kevin Kline, Timothy Hutton, Jean Reno
Description: A woman flying to France to confront her straying fiance gets into trouble when the charming crook seated next to her uses her for smuggling.

Name: Tomb Raider: Kẻ Cướp Lăng Mộ
Stars: Angelina Jolie, Jon Voight, Iain Glen, Noah Taylor
Description: Video game adventurer Lara Croft comes to life in a movie where she races against time and villains to recover powerful ancient artifacts.

Name: Carmen Jones
Stars: Harry Belafonte, Dorothy Dandridge, Pearl Bailey, Olga James
Description: Contemporary version of the Bizet opera, with new lyrics and an African-American cast.

Name: Chiếc Dương Cầm
Stars: Holly Hunter, Harvey Keitel, Sam Neill, Anna Paquin
Description: In the mid-19th century a mute woman is sent to New Zealand along with her young daughter and prized piano for an arranged marriage to a farmer, but is soon lusted after by a farm worker.

Name: Mặt Nạ Xanh
Stars: Jim Carrey, Cameron Diaz, Peter Riegert, Peter Greene
Description: Bank clerk Stanley Ipkiss is transformed into a manic superhero when he wears a mysterious mask.

Name: Catch-22
Stars: Alan Arkin, Martin Balsam, Richard Benjamin, Art Garfunkel
Description: A man is trying desperately to be certified insane during World War II, so he can stop flying missions.

Name: Slap Shot
Stars: Paul Newman, Michael Ontkean, Strother Martin, Jennifer Warren
Description: A failing ice hockey team finds success with outrageously violent hockey goonery.

Name: Khách Sạn Diệu Kỳ
Stars: Judi Dench, Bill Nighy, Maggie Smith, Tom Wilkinson
Description: British retirees travel to India to take up residence in what they believe is a newly restored hotel. Less luxurious than advertised, the Marigold Hotel nevertheless slowly begins to charm in unexpected ways.

Name: Beat the Devil
Stars: Humphrey Bogart, Jennifer Jones, Gina Lollobrigida, Robert Morley
Description: On their way to Africa are a group of rogues who hope to get rich there, and a seemingly innocent British couple. They meet and things happen...

Name: Mallrats
Stars: Shannen Doherty, Jeremy London, Jason Lee, Claire Forlani
Description: Both dumped by their girlfriends, two best friends seek refuge in the local mall.

Name: Out of Africa
Stars: Meryl Streep, Robert Redford, Klaus Maria Brandauer, Michael Kitchen
Description: In 20th-century colonial Kenya, a Danish baroness/plantation owner has a passionate love affair with a free-spirited big-game hunter.

Name: White Men Can't Jump
Stars: Wesley Snipes, Woody Harrelson, Rosie Perez, Tyra Ferrell
Description: Black and white basketball hustlers join forces to double their chances of winning money on the street courts and in a basketball tournament.

Name: Weird Science
Stars: Anthony Michael Hall, Ilan Mitchell-Smith, Kelly LeBrock, Bill Paxton
Description: Two high-school nerds use a computer program to literally create the perfect woman, who promptly turns their lives upside-down.

Name: Cyrus
Stars: Mark Duplass, John C. Reilly, Marisa Tomei, Jonah Hill, Catherine Keener
Description: John and Molly, a divorced middle aged man and a single mother meet at a friends party and start up a small relationship, all John has to do now is meet Molly's son... Cyrus

Name: Boy, Did I Get a Wrong Number!
Stars: Bob Hope, Elke Sommer, Phyllis Diller, Cesare Danova
Description: A seductive starlet flees Hollywood and causes chaos for a real estate agent.

Name: Laurel Canyon
Stars: Frances McDormand, Alessandro Nivola, Christian Bale, Kate Beckinsale
Description: When an uptight young man and his fiancée move into his libertine mother's house, the resulting clash of life attitudes shakes everyone up.

Name: Nổ Tung
Stars: Jeff Bridges, Tommy Lee Jones, Suzy Amis, Lloyd Bridges
Description: An Irish bomber escapes from prison and targets a member of the Boston bomb squad.

Name: Điệp Viên Bám Dai
Stars: Mike Myers, Heather Graham, Michael York, Robert Wagner
Description: Dr. Evil is back and has invented a new time machine that allows him to go back to the 1960s and steal Austin Powers' mojo, inadvertently leaving him "shagless".

Name: Angels in the Outfield
Stars: Danny Glover, Brenda Fricker, Tony Danza, Christopher Lloyd
Description: When a boy prays for a chance to have a family if the California Angels win the pennant, angels are assigned to make that possible.

Name: Con Ma Vui Vẻ
Stars: Bill Pullman, Christina Ricci, Cathy Moriarty, Eric Idle
Description: An afterlife therapist and his daughter meet a friendly young ghost when they move into a crumbling mansion in order to rid the premises of wicked spirits.

Name: Huyết Hận
Stars: Clint Eastwood, Clint Eastwood, Jeff Daniels, Anjelica Huston, Wanda De Jesus
Description: Still recovering from a heart transplant, retired F.B.I. profiler Terry McCaleb (Clint Eastwood) returns to service when his own blood analysis offers clues to the identity of a serial killer.

Name: Spaceballs
Stars: Mel Brooks, John Candy, Rick Moranis, Bill Pullman
Description: A star-pilot for hire and his trusty sidekick must come to the rescue of a princess and save Planet Druidia from the clutches of the evil Spaceballs.

Name: Hoàn Lương
Stars: Robert De Niro, Billy Crystal, Lisa Kudrow, Chazz Palminteri
Description: A comedy about a psychiatrist whose number-one patient is an insecure mob boss.

Name: Thánh Vật Cá Sấu
Stars: Paul Hogan, Linda Kozlowski, John Meillon, David Gulpilil
Description: An American reporter goes to the Australian outback to meet an eccentric crocodile poacher and invites him to New York City.

Name: Author! Author!
Stars: Al Pacino, Dyan Cannon, Tuesday Weld, Bob Dishy
Description: While facing the stress of his play being produced on Broadway, a playwright deals with having to raise his son, his stepdaughters, and his stepsons.

Name: Heaven Can Wait
Stars: Buck Henry, Warren Beatty, James Mason, Julie Christie, Jack Warden
Description: A Los Angeles Rams quarterback, accidentally taken away from his body by an overanxious angel before he was meant to die, returns to life in the body of a recently murdered millionaire.

Name: Sa Lầy
Stars: Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Devin Brochu, Natalie Portman, Rainn Wilson
Description: A young boy has lost his mother and is losing touch with his father and the world around him. Then he meets Hesher who manages to make his life even more chaotic.

Name: The Accidental Tourist
Stars: William Hurt, Kathleen Turner, Geena Davis, Amy Wright
Description: An emotionally distant writer of travel guides must carry on with his life after his son is killed and his marriage crumbles.

Name: Người Đỡ Đạn
Stars: Denzel Washington, Christopher Walken, Dakota Fanning, Radha Mitchell
Description: In Mexico City, a former CIA operative swears vengeance on those who committed an unspeakable act against the family he was hired to protect.

Name: A Bridge Too Far
Stars: Sean Connery, Ryan O'Neal, Michael Caine, Laurence Olivier
Description: Operation Market Garden, September 1944: The Allies attempt to capture several strategically important bridges in the Netherlands in the hope of breaking the German lines.

Name: Tai Họa Báo Trước
Stars: Colin Farrell, Ewan McGregor, Hayley Atwell, Peter-Hugo Daly
Description: The tale of two brothers with serious financial woes. When a third party proposes they turn to crime, things go badly and the two become enemies.

Name: The War of the Roses
Stars: Michael Douglas, Kathleen Turner, Danny DeVito, Marianne Sägebrecht
Description: A married couple tries everything to drive each other out of the house in a vicious divorce battle.

Name: The Entertainer
Stars: Laurence Olivier, Brenda de Banzie, Roger Livesey, Joan Plowright
Description: Archie Rice, an old-time British music hall performer sinking into final defeat, schemes to stay in show business.

Name: Charlotte's Web
Stars: Iwao Takamoto, Debbie Reynolds, Henry Gibson, Paul Lynde, Rex Allen
Description: Wilbur is a farm pig who's terrified that he'll end up on the dinner table. His friend Charlotte, a charming spider, comes to his rescue. She weaves words into her web, convincing the farmer that Wilbur is too special a pig to kill.

Name: Yêu Dại Khờ
Stars: Felicity Jones, Anton Yelchin, Jennifer Lawrence, Charlie Bewley
Description: A British college student falls for an American student, only to be separated from him when she's banned from the U.S. after overstaying her visa.

Name: The Adventures of Huckleberry Finn
Stars: Mickey Rooney, Walter Connolly, William Frawley, Rex Ingram
Description: To avoid his abusive father, a rambunctious boy rafts the Mississippi River with a slave, encountering many wild characters.

Name: They Got Me Covered
Stars: Bob Hope, Dorothy Lamour, Lenore Aubert, Otto Preminger
Description: Fired by his editor for incompetence, idiotic reporter Robert Kittredge sees a chance at redeeming himself when he accidentally uncovers a network of Nazi spies in Washington, D.C.

Name: Quyền Lực Tuyệt Đối
Stars: Gene Hackman, Clint Eastwood, Clint Eastwood, Gene Hackman, Ed Harris, Laura Linney
Description: Career thief Luther Whitney (Clint Eastwood) witnesses a horrific crime involving U.S. President Alan Richmond (Gene Hackman).

Name: The Petrified Forest
Stars: Leslie Howard, Humphrey Bogart, Bette Davis, Genevieve Tobin
Description: A waitress, a hobo and a bank robber get mixed up at a lonely diner in the desert.

Name: Sydney
Stars: Philip Baker Hall, John C. Reilly, Gwyneth Paltrow, Samuel L. Jackson
Description: Professional gambler Sydney teaches John the tricks of the trade. John does well until he falls for cocktail waitress Clementine.

Name: Tay Đấm Huyền Thoại 3
Stars: Sylvester Stallone, Talia Shire, Burt Young, Carl Weathers
Description: Rocky faces the ultimate challenge from a powerful new contender, and must turn to a former rival to help regain his throne as the undisputed fighting champion.

Name: Blue Caprice
Stars: Isaiah Washington, Tequan Richmond, Tim Blake Nelson, Joey Lauren Adams
Description: An abandoned boy is lured to America and drawn into the shadow of a dangerous father figure. Inspired by the real-life events that led to the 2002 Beltway sniper attacks.

Name: Công Viên Kỷ Jura 2: Thế Giới Bị Mất
Stars: Jeff Goldblum, Julianne Moore, Pete Postlethwaite, Vince Vaughn
Description: A research team is sent to the Jurassic Park Site B island to study the dinosaurs there, while an InGen team approaches with another agenda.

Name: Quái Thú Vô Hình
Stars: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Carl Weathers, Kevin Peter Hall, Elpidia Carrillo
Description: A team of commandos on a mission in a Central American jungle find themselves hunted by an extraterrestrial warrior.

Name: Chuyến Du Lịch Châu Âu
Stars: Alec Berg, David Mandel, Scott Mechlowicz, Jacob Pitts, Michelle Trachtenberg, Travis Wester
Description: Dumped by his girlfriend, a high school grad decides to embark on an overseas adventure in Europe with his friends.

Name: Champagne
Stars: Betty Balfour, Jean Bradin, Ferdinand von Alten, Gordon Harker
Description: A spoiled heiress defies her father by running off to marry her lover. However, Daddy has a few tricks up his sleeve.

Name: Thế Giới Không Đủ
Stars: Pierce Brosnan, Sophie Marceau, Robert Carlyle, Denise Richards
Description: James Bond uncovers a nuclear plot while protecting an oil heiress from her former kidnapper, an international terrorist who can't feel pain.

Name: You Gotta Stay Happy
Stars: Walter Lantz, Joan Fontaine, James Stewart, Eddie Albert, Roland Young
Description: A spoiled heiress who has jilted multiple fiancés embroils a commercial pilot in a series of wacky misadventures.
